For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程之內容包括:化學動力學及反應機構之基本理論,動力學數據之處理,各式理想反應器之設計,非理想狀態反應器之討論,單獨觸媒中非均勻相反應器之討論.
description.en: The subjects of the course include 1) fundamental theories of chemical kinetics and reaction mechanisms, 2) kinetic data collection and manipulation, 3) design equations for ideal reactors, 4) discussions on nonideal reactors, and 5) nonhomogeneous catalytic reactions.

description.zh: 本課程介紹利用質量、能量守恆定律(熱力學第一定律)及均衡方程式(熱力學第二定律)，並在導入逸壓（Fugacity）觀念下，討論單成份系相平衡問題。最後延伸至多成份系統的熱力學性質的探討。此外還介紹化工程序中真實流體流動熱力學、機械能均衡、熱力學機械之設計與作功原理、熱機循環之熱力函數及熱機效率。
description.en: This course is designed as an introductory course in thermodynamics of chemical engineering.  Topics include the first and second law of thermodynamics, open and closed system, thermodynamics properties of materials, generalied correlations with real fluids and multicomponent systems.  Emphasis is placed on the chemical potential and its use in phase equilibria and chemical reaction equilibria.

name.zh: 單元操作與輸送現象(二)

description.zh: 本課程內容包括熱量傳送操作及其應用。
description.en: This course contents heat transfer and its application.

description.zh: 本課程屬於生物技術的基礎課程，授課內容強調基本生化原理，介紹細胞組成份〈包括核酸、蛋白質、醣類和脂質〉的化學、生物活性及代謝，並分別闡明代謝作用與基因表現的調節機轉，輔以現今生化尖端學術研究的介紹，希望能以一學期的緊密課程，讓學生瞭解現代生化科技領域的輪廓，作為日後深造或從事生化科技行業的奠基。
description.en: A one-term introductory biochemistry course that covers the biochemistry of the living state; the chemistry of amino acids, proteins, nucleic acids, carbohydrates, lipids, and steroids; energy transformations and chemical reactions in living cells; action of hormones; and self-regulation and self-replication of living organisms.

description.zh:
應用單元操作的原理與知識，使學生從實際操作中瞭解各種單元操 
作設備的操作及性能。
description.en: The course provides facilities for students to apply theoretical and fundamental knowledge of unit operations. In such an environment, much emphasis is placed upon the operation and performance of various experimental units.

description.zh: 介紹各種精密化學分析儀器之原理及應用﹐學習組成結構之 鑑定、物種之分離及分析之工作方法。
description.en: Instruments are the tools for gathering qualitative and quantitative information about the composition and structure of matter, students must develop an understanding of these tools and how they are used to solve analytical problems.

notes: 化工大三合開,初選人數限制40人

description.zh: 以科學方法探討聚合物特性，使學生了解分子結構與物性的關係、物性之測定方法及物性與加工應用上之關係。
description.en:
The unique features of polymers are introduced.  Special
emphasis is given to the structuring effects of processing
on polymer morphology and properties.

name.zh: 藥用及化妝用高分子材料

description.zh: 本課程在教授學生藥用及化妝用高分子材料之相關產業製程及配方技術的實務知識，課程設計將首先介紹高分子材料的基本合成方法、物理化學性能、界面活性劑、乳化膠體及生物分解安全性。並教授高分子材料之應用區分為兩大類：其一是指在製藥之劑型加工時所用的和為改善藥物傳輸性能而採用的輔助材料(Excipients)，例如稀釋劑、潤滑劑、黏合劑、崩解劑、助流劑、緩和劑、穩定劑、保濕劑、膜包衣及膠囊殼等。藥用及化妝用輔助材料本身並不具有藥理作用，只是在藥品及化妝品的製造和使用中起從屬或輔助的作用。另一類高分子藥物則不同於前一類，它依靠連接在聚合物分子鏈上的藥理活性基團或高分子本身的藥理作用，進入人體後，能與機體組織發生生理反應，從而產生醫療美容或預防性效果。
description.en: The course is to provide the core knowledge for the development of pharmaceutical and cosmetic technology. It aims to educate and train students with the fundamental principles and applications of biodegradable polymers, surfactants, colloids, emulsions and their related physico-chemical properties. Then potential prospects of pharmaceutical and cosmetic polymers will be taught in two parts to help students understand the future frontiers in polymer science and technology. The first part of lectures will cover the wide range of polymer excipients such as diluents, lubricants, binders, disintegrants, glidants, demulcents, stabilizers, humercants, coatings, and capsules etc, which are inactive pharmaceutical ingredients used for assisting drug delivery. The second part will focus on polymer drugs, which are active pharmaceutical ingredients conjugated to polymer matrices such as polymeric micelles, liposomes, colloidosomes, and solid phase nanoparticle

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程之內容包括:化學動力學及反應機構之基本理論,動力學數據之處理,各式理想反應器之設計,非理想狀態反應器之討論,單獨觸媒中非均勻相反應器之討論.
description.en: The subjects of the course include 1) fundamental theories of chemical kinetics and reaction mechanisms, 2) kinetic data collection and manipulation, 3) design equations for ideal reactors, 4) discussions on nonideal reactors, and 5) nonhomogeneous catalytic reactions.

description.zh: 本課程介紹利用質量、能量守恆定律(熱力學第一定律)及均衡方程式(熱力學第二定律)，並在導入逸壓（Fugacity）觀念下，討論單成份系相平衡問題。最後延伸至多成份系統的熱力學性質的探討。此外還介紹化工程序中真實流體流動熱力學、機械能均衡、熱力學機械之設計與作功原理、熱機循環之熱力函數及熱機效率。
description.en: This course is designed as an introductory course in thermodynamics of chemical engineering.  Topics include the first and second law of thermodynamics, open and closed system, thermodynamics properties of materials, generalied correlations with real fluids and multicomponent systems.  Emphasis is placed on the chemical potential and its use in phase equilibria and chemical reaction equilibria.

name.zh: 單元操作與輸送現象(二)

description.zh: 本課程內容包括熱量傳送操作及其應用。
description.en: This course contents heat transfer and its application.

description.zh: 本課程屬於生物技術的基礎課程，授課內容強調基本生化原理，介紹細胞組成份〈包括核酸、蛋白質、醣類和脂質〉的化學、生物活性及代謝，並分別闡明代謝作用與基因表現的調節機轉，輔以現今生化尖端學術研究的介紹，希望能以一學期的緊密課程，讓學生瞭解現代生化科技領域的輪廓，作為日後深造或從事生化科技行業的奠基。
description.en: A one-term introductory biochemistry course that covers the biochemistry of the living state; the chemistry of amino acids, proteins, nucleic acids, carbohydrates, lipids, and steroids; energy transformations and chemical reactions in living cells; action of hormones; and self-regulation and self-replication of living organisms.

description.zh:
應用單元操作的原理與知識，使學生從實際操作中瞭解各種單元操 
作設備的操作及性能。
description.en: The course provides facilities for students to apply theoretical and fundamental knowledge of unit operations. In such an environment, much emphasis is placed upon the operation and performance of various experimental units.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 使學生瞭解塑性變形對材料機械性質物理性質化學性質之影響，實習內容如下： 1. 鋼鐵、非鐵材料在各種加工度下之機械性質變化實驗。 2.不銹鋼料（18-8不銹鋼）在各種加工度下之耐蝕性比較實驗。 3. 線材之抽拉實驗，各種潤滑劑對抽拉力之影響。 4. 加工硬化對退火處理之組織變化，結晶粒大小之影響。 5. 塑性試驗模（plastic thinmold）操作及在壓軋加工下之變形模擬實驗。 6. 鍛造加工實驗。7. 板材之引伸加工實驗。
description.en: It makes students understand how plastic deformation influence mechanical , physical and chemical properties, the course content includes the following items: 1.The mechanical property change under all kinds of work degree for steel, iron and non-ferrous metal. 2.The comparative anti-corrosion test under all kinds of work degree for stainless steel(18-8 stainless steel) 3.The tension test of metal material, and how lubricator influences drawing force. 4.How work hardening influence tissue change at the tempering treatment, and how it influences crystal grain size. 5.The deformation simulation test under plastic thinmold operation and rolling & pressing processing. 6.Forging processing text. 7.The tensile processing test of plates.

description.zh:
材料科學為工程教育的重要科技，材料的性質與特性，為現代工程
設計中佔有相當重要的地位，金屬材料的各種性質，都基於其內部
構造的變化，其內部原子聚集成規則的結晶構造，亦或聚集成非結
晶構造，其所形成的各種物理特性，由最基本的結晶構造開始了解。電子顯微鏡，破壞力學，超導性，電傳導，超塑性，動態回復，動態時效應變。差排理論、結晶核的形成與成長，合金相理論，晶界自由度，鑄造物的成核與均質化，硬化現象，固體擴散現象，破壞現象及理論，潛變的形成與原因等，充分了解金屬材料特性上的理論基礎與變化軌跡。
description.en:
Properties and characteristics of materials play important role in modern engineering design.Each property of materials is based on its transformation at inner structure,
its atoms inside converge either a regulated crystal structure or a noncrystal structure,
their physical property should be understood from the most fundamental crystalline
structure, such as electronic microscope, destructive dynamics, super-conductivity,
electronic conductivity, super-plasticity, dynamic recovery, dynamic aging strain
, dislocation theory, the formation and growth of crystalline nucleus, alloy phase
theory, crystal boundary free degree, nucleus and homogenization of casting product,
hardening phenomenon, solid diffusion phenomenon, destructive phenomenon and
theory, creep formation and its reason, all of these make student fully understand
the theory basis and change record of the metallic material characteristics.

description.zh: 本課程以訓練學生對陶瓷材料性質認識，並進而介紹陶瓷材料基本製程。課程重點在陶瓷粉体製備成形方法，燒結及燒結理論，除加強學生認識傳統陶瓷外，並對結構陶瓷與電子陶瓷之應用，作有系統的介紹。
description.en:
This course aims at training the knowledge of ceramics materials and to introduce
the basic manufacturing process of ceramics materials.The focus of this course is
the formation method of ceramics powder, sintering and sintering theory. Except
for strengthening the perception of traditonal ceramics, it also has a systematic
introduction to the application of structural ceramics and electronic ceramics..

description.zh: 本課程討論結晶質固體之基本概念，含晶體之幾何學及數學理論，並進一步討論結晶化學及結晶構造之原理，同時輔以電子顯微鏡法及X-射線法作結晶構造分析。
description.en: This course is to introduce Elements of Crystallography.

description.zh: 塑性加工係藉塑性變形將金屬材料變化成目的形狀之金屬加工法。本課程包含：金屬塑性變形之基礎，塑性力學之基礎及各種塑性加工法之介紹，最近之塑性加工技術的進步，並涉及與塑性加工關連之成形技術及適合各種塑性加工材料之選擇。
description.en: Plastic deformation processing is a metal processing method which based on plastic deformation to transform metal material into objective shape. This course includes the foundation of metal plastic deformation, the foundation of plastic dynamics, and the introduction of all kinds of plastic deformative processing methods. The recent technology development of plastic deformation processing is related to formation technique and suitable for alternatives to all kinds of plastic deformation materials.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

description.zh: 資源處理的主要對象為礦物，但其他有些固體與固體間或固體與液體間之分離與純化也包括在本工程之內，採用的方法：凡是各分離物間不同之物理及化學性質，皆可設法加以利用。本課程則針對其應用方法加以介紹，以期學生對資源處理有一初步及完整的認識。授課內容包括：粉粒體之簡介、篩及篩分、碎礦機之種類及應用、磨礦機之種類及應用、分級及分級機、重液選礦、浮游選礦、磁選機之種類及應用等。
description.en:
Mineral processing uses various techniques to perform 
solid-solid and soild-liguid separation and concentration 
by using physical and chemical properties between different 
minerals.  The separation and concentration methods include 
particle size analysis, screening, crushing, grinding, 
pulverizing, classification, heavy medium separation, 
flotation, magnetic separation, etc.

description.zh: 本課程針對各種資源之特性，使學生瞭解開發各類資源之方法及各種機器之應用。其內容包括：資源探勘、資源蘊藏量評估、資源開拓、資源開採、地下開採、地面開採、大型機器之應用及特殊工程施工。實習課程包括礦產品經濟分析、礦床蘊藏量計算、採礦方法評選、炸藥之化學成份設計、剝土比及露天開採界限之計算、露天開採爆破設計、邊坡穩定設計、物料 搬運機械選擇、物料搬運機械之成本分析、現場實習、捲揚系統設計、回收率之計算、排水設計、鑽進機械之選擇及成本估算、地下開採爆破設計、通風設計、開採 成本及利用之計算等。
description.en: Various mining exploitation methods and mining equipment involved are introduced in this class. It includes exploration, reserve calculation, resource exploitation, and mining operations (underground and surface). The laboratory exercises include mineral economic analysis, reserve evaluation, mining method selection, break-even analysis, surface blasting design, material handling and machines, hoisting design, recovery calculation, mine power and drainage and overall mining cost analysis.

description.zh: 探討有關無機物質的化學性質、原子結構及化學反應。討論在材料及礦物上之應用。
description.en: Chemical properties, atomic structure and chemical reactions of inorganic chemicals will be discussed. Their applications to material science and minerals will be discussed too.

description.zh: 材料科學為工程教育的重要科技，材料的性質與特性，為現代工程設計中佔有相當重要的地位，金屬材料的各種性質，都基於其內部構造的變化，其內部原子聚集成規則的結晶構造，亦或聚集成非結晶構造，其所形成的各種物理特性，由最基本的結晶構造開始了解。電子顯微鏡，破壞力學，超導性，電傳導，超塑性，動態回復，動態時效應變。差排理論、結晶核的形成與成長，合金相理論，晶界自由度，鑄造物的成核與均質化，硬化現象，固體擴散現象，破壞現象及理論，潛變的形成與原因等，充分了解金屬材料特性上的理論基礎與變化軌跡。
description.en: Properties and characteristics of materials play important role in modern engineering design.Each property of materials is based on its transformation at inner structure, its atoms inside converge either a regulated crystal structure or a noncrystal structure, their physical property should be understood from the most fundamental crystalline structure, such as electronic microscope, destructive dynamics, super-conductivity, electronic conductivity, super-plasticity, dynamic recovery, dynamic aging strain , dislocation theory, the formation and growth of nucleus, alloy phase theory, degree of freedom of crystal boundary , nucleation and homogenization of casting product, hardening phenomenon, solid diffusion phenomenon, destructive phenomenon and theory, creep formation and its reason, all of these make student fully understand the theory basis and change record of the metallic material characteristics.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 鋼筋混凝土材料及其力學性質；鋼筋混凝土構材受到軸向力、彎曲力矩、剪力、扭轉力矩及握裹力作用時之分析；依據鋼筋混凝土設計規範之規定，將理論於梁、版、柱、基腳等構物設計之概述。
基礎工程係應用土壤力學之原理於基礎問題之分析，其內容包括下列各項：(1)基礎之定義：功用及其重要性、(2)土壤調查、(3)基礎之水、防水及開挖、(4)基礎之承載力、5)基礎之應力分析與沈陷計算(6)基腳及筏式基礎、(7)樁基、(8)墩基、(9)沈箱基礎、(10)基礎穩定處理。
description.en: Subsurface investigations and synthesis of soil parameters for geotechnical design and analysis,concepts of shallow and deep foundation design,geotechnical design of conventional retaining walls,computerized analysis and design of soil/foundation interaction;case histories.

description.zh: 本課程主要教授學生力法、位法及矩陣之基本應用：(1)傾角變位法、(2)力矩分配法、(3)能與補能之觀念、(4)矩陣結構力法、(5)矩陣結構變位法、(6)直接勁度法、(7)結構穩定之介紹 。
description.en: Fundamental theory of statically indeterminate structures;analysis of indeterminate beams,frames,and trusses by stiffness and flexibility methods;study of influence lines for beams,frames,and trusses.

description.zh: 使學生了解工程管理之應用範圍，並深入研習各領域所相關之管理技能與知識；並藉由範例之演算，使學生能與實務相結合，俾能有效的將管理技巧與電腦科技靈活的應用於工程現場之中。
description.en: This course helps to develop students' skills in managing construction projects. This course may be taken at different views in a construction management program with an emphasis on residential or commercial construction. Specific contents may include schedule management, job-site safety management, cost management, and related management topic in construction. Specific computer software may be used for construction project management. Students typically obtain the real experience from the practice special talk to gain real-world experience in planning and scheduling construction projects.

description.zh: 概論,降雨,降雨逕流模擬,水文演算,水文統計(1),無因次單位歷線,基隆河流域水文分析,21世紀台灣水利事及水文發展.
description.en: Introduction,Precipitation,Rainfall-Runoff routing,Hydrological routing,Hydrological statistics,Dimensionless unit hydrograph,Case study,Future development in hydrology(21-century).

description.zh: 本課程主要教授學生瞭解：(1)流體靜力學之各種實驗、(2)流體運動現象之觀摩實驗、(3)流體能量及連續方程式之運用實驗、(4)流體動量－衝量方程式之運用實驗、(5)水力機械之測試實驗。
description.en:
The basic principles and several applications of fluid mechanics are covered in weekly laboratory sessions.
Fundamentals of fluid mechanics will be demonstrated featuring Model similitude, Pipe flow, Open channel flow.

description.zh: 模型理論,管流理論,渠流理論,渠變理論,數值理論.
description.en: Introduction,Model similitude,Pipe flow,Open channel  flow,Gradually varied flow(Backwatercomputation...),Computation fluid mechanics(ex:FDM,FEM,...)

description.zh: 環境規與管理是一門跨學科極為重要的整合性課程，討論內容包括：(1)環境問題與社會、(2)環境經濟學、(3)環境政策、(4)環境規劃原理與方法、(5)環境質量管理、(6)環境保護規劃技術、(7)環境影響評估、(8)土地利用與國土規劃、(9)區域性環境管理、(10)都市環境之管理、(11)環境保護管理制度、(12)自然資源與景觀維護以及永續發展之環境管理等。
description.en: Environmental Planning and Management aims to study the relationship between environmental problems and social, economics and ecology. The theory and technology of planning are also described. The environmental impact assessment is a major method for the approching of balance between economical development and environmental protection, therefore it is stressed to state it's contents and assessment methods. Further the National planning and City planning in the area of environmental espects are also described in the course. It intends to let the students realize how to have a sustainable development under the policy of environmental protection.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程針對各種材料（金屬、陶瓷、高分子、複合材料）之基本原理，性質及應用，做概要性的介紹。內容包括材料之晶體結構與晶體缺陷，固體材料之原子擴散，相圖與相變化，材料製程及應用，材料之物理性質（光性質、電性質、磁性質及熱性質），材料之機械性質（強度、延展性、硬度、韌性、疲勞、潛變）。
description.en: This course targets at the brief introduction to the fundamental principles, characteristics and application of the metal, ceramics, polymer and composite material. This course includes the crystal structure and defect, atomic diffusion of the solid materials, phase diagrams and phase transformation, material manufacturing process and application, the physic property (optical, electrical, magnetic and thermal property), mechanical property (strength, ductility, hardness, toughness, fatigue, and creep).

description.zh: 教授化學儀器分析原理、應用、儀器裝置及限制,準確度等。內容有紅、可見、紫外、X光 、核磁共振光譜、表面分析之電子質譜方法、熱分析以及不同的分析方法如 、液體層析等。
description.en: This text will introduce the fundamental principles and Applications of modern Analytical instruments.Measuring devices, limitations of measurements in terms of sensitivity and accuracy will also be taught. The contents are infrared, visible, ultraviolet, X-ray and nuclear magnetic spectroscopes, Analysis of sur-faces with electron beams and mass spectrometry, thermal methods and chromatography and related separation methods.

description.zh: 介紹氣體的物理性質，熱力學第一、第二與第三定律，化學反應之熱能變化與動力學，以及系統中的相平衡。
description.en: This course contents the following subjects: the physical properties of gases, the first law, second law and third law of thermodynamics, enthalpy change in chemical reaction, chemical kinetic and the phase equilibria in a system.

description.zh: 本課程包含兩個部分。一、討論各種纖維之化學組成、合成與成形之理論，同時針對纖維之性質、纖維改質與組成、合成、成形間之關係與影響因素及檢測加以講授。 二、說明纖維之形態與微觀及巨觀結構、纖維長度分佈與斷面、密度、吸水性與膨潤性、機械性質、光學性質、熱性質，黏彈性質，及電氣性質等物理性質及其測試。
description.en: This course includes two parts. Part 1: A major object of this course is to provide a background in fiber compositions, synthesis, spinning and characterization. A second goal is to introduce factors that influence fiber compositions, formation and properties and their testing. Part 2: The course interprets the following subjects, such as: (1) Morphology of the fibers. (2) Microstructure and macrostructure of fibers. (3) Staple fiber length and cross-section. (4) Fiber density and absorption. (5) Mechanical properties. (6) Optical properties. (7) Thermal properties. (8) Fiber Viscoelasticity. (9) Electrical properties etc and their testing.

description.zh: 本門授課之目的在介紹各種有機化合物之合成方法、原理及應用，並探討有機實驗室常用之有機反應及其反應機構。
description.en: The course introduces various kinds of organic synthetic methods, principles and applications.  The most commonly used organic reactions and their mechanisms are also discussed.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹各類有機材料在光電工業上之應用。包括感光性有機材料用於電子構裝及微刻蝕影、絕緣及低介電材料、光碟染料、電變色、非線性光學、LB薄膜、發光二極體材料，導電及半導電有機材料。
description.en: This course is an introduction course to introduce varied organic materials in the application of optoelectronics. It includes light sensible organic materials for electron package, photoresist, photoimaging. The advanced material of optics disc, electronic chromic, nonlinear optics, LB film, organic photodiode, and conducting polymer.

description.zh: 配合高分子化學課程的講授，教導學生親自配製試葯、操作儀器﹐進行高分子聚合實驗、檢驗分析與結果討論﹐訓練學生的實驗室合成技巧及基本的高分子材料鑑定分析儀器之技術﹐包括光譜分析 (IR, NMR, UV, PL, EL etc), 分子量量測(GPC), 熱分析(DSC, TGA)等之分析技術
description.en: Experimental techniques include: the Lab work of polymer synthesis , the charterization of polymer materials and the operation of the related instruments, including spectrum analysis (IR, NMR, UV, PL, EL etc), the measurement of molecular weight (GPC), thermal analysis (DSC, TGA) etc.

description.zh: 分子生物學主要藉由分子的方法來探討細胞的生成、組成、功能及相互間之作用。因此此課程會含概以下四大部分：1. 細胞之簡介2. 分子基因學3. 細胞之內部組成4. 細胞間之生長，交互作用之影響
description.en: Molecular Biology is chiefly concentrated with eucaryotic cells and its title reflects the prime importance of the insights that have come from the molecular approach. This course will cover the following four different parts.1. Introduction to the cell2. Molecular genetics3. Internal organization of the cell4. Cells in their social context

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh:
1. 訊號時域與須域特性的量測  7.  類比訊號的取樣與重整
2. 比式濾波器的設計          8.  脈幅調變系統
3. 雙旁波帶AM調變系統        9.  脈碼調變系統
4. 單旁波帶AM調變系統        10. 數位通頻傳輸
5. FM調變系統與解調          11. 訊號多工的傳送與接收
6. 鎖相迴路檢波器的設計      12. 通訊系統的設計與模擬
description.en:
The lab course is designed for supplementing the lecture course'Communication Systems' and 'Digital Communication Systems'.sStudents can learn the principles and practive of analog and digital communication systems from laboratory experiments and projects.The cintents include
1.measuremnts of signals in time domain and frequency domain 
2.design of analog filters
3.double sideband AM systems
4.single sideband AM systems
5.FM systems
6.dessign of phase-locked-loop detectors
7.sampling and regeneration of analog signals
8.pulse amplitude modulation(PAM)systems
9.pulse coded modulation(PCM)systems
10.digital passband transmission
11.multiplexing systems
12.design and simulation of communication systems

description.zh:
使學生熟悉，應用程式設計之環境、方法、及原則，內容含：
（１）作業系統與應用程式之關係
（２）視窗環境
（３）網路環境
（４）整合設計
學生將窗撰寫完整之應用程式
description.en:
To familiarize the student with the environments,
methodologies,and principles of application software
design.
Topics include :
1.Run-time environments
2.Window environments
3.Networking environments
4.Integrated design
The student will write application programs with actual function.

description.zh: 本課程由學生與老師共同選定題目，在特定題目下對此專題之問題定義，分析，推理，設計，製作與解決方法進行研究，以完成該專題之成品，專題完成後需撰寫書面報告並公開展示成品，以培養實務工作之能力。專題範圍包含：1.電子電路，2.電子儀表，3.控制與通訊系統，4.電子視聽系統，5.微電腦為基礎之計算機硬體（含軟體）製作，6.軟體設計與製作（PC，工作站），影像處理與計算機視覺，多媒體製作（動畫、Video、Audio及其整合），9.其他。
description.en:
In this course,students will conduct special project under the guidance of his advisor.The topic of this project,selected and decided by bath the student and his advisor,could be chosen form(but not limited to)
1.Electronic circuits
2.Electronic instrumentation
3.Communication and control systems
4.Microprocessor applications
5.Multimedia system designs
6.Computer networks
7.Computer software desgin

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 1.資料表示法：定點系統(Fixed Point System)，浮點系統(Floating Point System)，2.運算工作：定點之加減乘除，快速之運算，浮點運算，3.指令與控制：各種指令介紹，中斷，硬體控制單元設計(Hardwired Control)，微程式控制單元設計(Microprogramming)，4.記憶系統：記憶體之層次(Memory Hierarchy)，虛擬記憶系統(Virtualmemory)，快速記憶(Cache Memory)。
description.en:
1.Data representation 
2.Logic operations
3.Command and control
4.Memory organization
5.Processor organization

description.zh: 1. 傅利葉分析與訊號取樣，2. 離散時序系統之頻率響應與電路設計， 3. Infinite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Bilinear 轉換式，Impulse-invariance 方式，Step-invariance 方式，高通、帶通、帶拒濾波器轉換式，4.Finite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：FourierSeries 方法，Window 方法，5. 離散與快速傅利葉轉換：DFT、FFT等演算法。
description.en:
1.Fourier analysis and signal sampling
2.Frequcy response of discrete time system
3.IIR digital filter design
4.FIR digital filter design
5.Discrete fourier transform
6.Fast fourier transform

description.zh:
本課程探討現代通訊的基本原理，內容重點放在類比通訊的調變技巧與雜訊分析．課程大綱包括：
1.簡介
2.信號與系統
3.機率、隨機程序與雜訊
4.振幅調變：雙旁波帶、調幅、單旁波帶與殘旁波帶
5.角度調變：頻率調變與相位調變
6.脈波調變：脈幅調變、脈寬調變、脈位調變、脈碼調變與步差調變
7.數位通訊簡介
對於數位通訊有進一步興趣的同學可繼續選修『數位通訊系統』課程
description.en:
Fundamental principles of modern communication will be investigated in depth in this course, with emphasis on analog communications.Basic modulation techniques will be introduced with nosie analysis.Contents include
1.Introduction 
2.Signals and Systems
3.Probability ,Random Process,and Nosie
4.Amplitude Modulations:DSB,AM,SSB,and VSB
5.Angle Modulations:FMand PM
6.Pulse Modulations:PAM,PWM,PPM,PCM,and DM
7.Intorduction to Digital Communication 
Students who want to know more details sbout digital commmunication are encouraged to take the course Digital Communication Systems

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

description.zh: 本課程之目的為使學生瞭解生產計畫與管制的基本概念，訓練學生對於生產計畫與管制的各項方法，制度設計及改善等具有基本認識，並應用管理科學及作業研究於生產計畫與管制之研究發展。本課程包括下列主題：生產計畫與管制概論、產品設計與發展、預測、來源需求規畫、生產排程、總排程、存貨管理、豐田式管理、專案規畫與管理等。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce the fundamental concepts of production planning and control.  In addition, applications of management science and operations research in production control and planning are also provided.  This course is consisted of the following subjects: introduction, product design and development, forecasting, resources requirement planning, production scheduling, total scheduling, inventory management, Toyota management, and project management.

description.zh: 本課程的目的將藉由五個面向了解企業倫理的本質，分別為：從全球化角度認知社會可接受的商業行為，將待人和善深植於良好的企業中，企業形象再造，強化職業倫理以及投資於可持續發展和有社會責任的公司。本課程亦教導學生瞭解今日快速變化工商界，符合企業倫理的公司治理原則與方式。課程的教導將朝下列五個方向進行：（1）廠商的社會責任（如：產品綠化與環境保護），（2）消費者的保護（如：產品的安全性），（3）員工的權益（如：職業健康），（4）員工對公司的責任（如：利益衝突），（5）雇主與員工關係（如：性別平等）。
description.en: The objective of this course is to appreciate the essential of Business Ethics through five main faucets: recognizing socially acceptable business conduct from the global perspectives, embedding good business in treating people nice and fair, reengineering corporate image, enhancing professional ethics, and investing in sustainable and socially responsible corporations. This course also discusses with the students the corporate governance that follows business ethics in today's changing business society. Five major categories will be covered: (1) Corporate Social Responsibility (e.g., Green product and environmental protection), (2) Consumer protection (e.g., Product safety), (3) Employee's rights and benefits (e.g., Occupational health), (4) Responsibility of employee to the firms (e.g., Conflict of interest), and (5) Employer-employee relations (e.g., Gender equity).

description.zh: 本課程在二技為品質管理。使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。
description.en: This course lets the students understand the concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, organization and functions of quality department.  Besides, the way to manage the products or the service quality, tools and methods of quality control, the way to improve the quality, quality representation method, evaluation of quality control, related regulations and future trends are also included.

description.zh: 本課程介紹機器人技術，程式，與應用各類基礎。其中包括機器人動作分析與控制、機器人程式語言、機器人運動學、夾爪與末端效應器之運用。 根據各階段實際操作 RV-M2 、CSIRB-2000 、以及 X-YETITE 各型機器人。 實驗包括機器人重現性、動作與路徑、順應性、棧板堆疊等。
description.en:
This is an introduction course of Industrial Robot.  The course is designed principally to provide the Followings topics:
1. fundamentals of robot technology, programming; and applications,
2. robot motion ,analysis and control
3.  robot end effectors
4. robot cell design and control 
5. assembly and inspection
safety, training ,maintenance, and quality

notes: 工管大三大四與工管所合開

description.zh: 本課程提供學生學習下列技術:低成本自動化，應用於自動化之元件與設備的認識，氣壓控制技術，可程式控制器，生產線機器連線整合控制實務，自動化生產技術。
description.en: This course provides students with the following technologies: low cost automation components, pneumatic control, programmable logic controller, the practical control of integrated production line, and automation production technology.

description.zh: 本課程適用於一般大專之決策分析課程。其目的在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。本課程授課主題包括：不考慮機率之決策問題、與機率有關之決策問題、獲取額外資訊之決策分析、效益分析、遊戲理論。相關之授課內容包括：機率分配、期望值方法、貝氏分析、完全資訊與額外資訊之期望值。
description.en:
This is an undergraduate course dealing with decison making and analysis.The objective of this course is to interpret the basic concepts of decision theory and its applications on some real world decision analysis problims.The main topics of this course include decision making without probability,decision making with probability,decison analysis with additional information,utility theory,game
theory.The related studies includes prlbability distribution,expected value approach,Bayesian analysis,expected value of perfect informatin and sample information.

name.zh: VR與AR於工作環境設計概論
name.en: ntroduction of VR/AR in workspace and its design

description.zh: 此概論課程將介紹虛擬實境及擴增實境相關技術於工作環境及其設計之應用。課程中將介紹虛擬實境及擴增實境於不同工作環境及其設計之應用實例，旨在使學生了解如何將虛擬實境及擴增實境之技術運用在實際工作環境、產品及系統設計。
description.en: The introductory course gives an overview about VR (virtual reality) and AR (augmented) technology applied in different workspace and its designs. Various applications and examples of VR and AR applied in workspace design will be demonstrated. The goal of the course is to empower students in learning VR/AR applications and how to apply the techniques in actual work environments, product development and system designs..

description.zh: 排程主要在規劃與排定活動執行的優先順序，以使各項資源得到最佳的運用。本課程主要在介紹生產排程的基本理論與方法，使學生奠定排程研究與排程實務問題解決的基礎。
description.en: Scheduling consists of planning and prioritizing activities that need to be performed in an orderly sequence of operation. It is a tool that optimizes use of available resources. This course focuses on the basic concept on scheduling. The purpose of this course is to guide the students to learn the basic methodologies of scheduling, and to understand the scheduling application aspects.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 本課程之目的為使學生瞭解生產計畫與管制的基本概念，訓練學生對於生產計畫與管制的各項方法，制度設計及改善等具有基本認識，並應用管理科學及作業研究於生產計畫與管制之研究發展。本課程包括下列主題：生產計畫與管制概論、產品設計與發展、預測、來源需求規畫、生產排程、總排程、存貨管理、豐田式管理、專案規畫與管理等。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce the fundamental concepts of production planning and control.  In addition, applications of management science and operations research in production control and planning are also provided.  This course is consisted of the following subjects: introduction, product design and development, forecasting, resources requirement planning, production scheduling, total scheduling, inventory management, Toyota management, and project management.

description.zh: 本課程的目的將藉由五個面向了解企業倫理的本質，分別為：從全球化角度認知社會可接受的商業行為，將待人和善深植於良好的企業中，企業形象再造，強化職業倫理以及投資於可持續發展和有社會責任的公司。本課程亦教導學生瞭解今日快速變化工商界，符合企業倫理的公司治理原則與方式。課程的教導將朝下列五個方向進行：（1）廠商的社會責任（如：產品綠化與環境保護），（2）消費者的保護（如：產品的安全性），（3）員工的權益（如：職業健康），（4）員工對公司的責任（如：利益衝突），（5）雇主與員工關係（如：性別平等）。
description.en: The objective of this course is to appreciate the essential of Business Ethics through five main faucets: recognizing socially acceptable business conduct from the global perspectives, embedding good business in treating people nice and fair, reengineering corporate image, enhancing professional ethics, and investing in sustainable and socially responsible corporations. This course also discusses with the students the corporate governance that follows business ethics in today's changing business society. Five major categories will be covered: (1) Corporate Social Responsibility (e.g., Green product and environmental protection), (2) Consumer protection (e.g., Product safety), (3) Employee's rights and benefits (e.g., Occupational health), (4) Responsibility of employee to the firms (e.g., Conflict of interest), and (5) Employer-employee relations (e.g., Gender equity).

description.zh: 本課程在二技為品質管理。使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。
description.en: This course lets the students understand the concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, organization and functions of quality department.  Besides, the way to manage the products or the service quality, tools and methods of quality control, the way to improve the quality, quality representation method, evaluation of quality control, related regulations and future trends are also included.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education
Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh:
包括應用力學與材料力學兩大部份。課程介紹應力概念、應力與應變
、軸向與平面、扭轉、彎曲、樑的撓度、柱、能量方法等。
description.en: Topics covered in design kinematics and Materials phase include: Engineering Mechanics Dynamics, Motion, Vibration, Material Forming Process, Tension, Compression, Shear, Torsion, Bending, Beam, Buckling and Stability.Also included with in this category are the activities as sociated with the preparation of the preliminary brief and the conceptualisation of the problem sloution. The management category emphasises the inevstigation and interpretation of both management functions and principles.

description.zh: 介紹人體之形態特徵、心理期望、動作行為等人因知識，研究人因資訊應用於工業設計實務上之設計方法或準則以獲得具安全、效率與舒適之產品或環境設計。
description.en: Basic Knowledge for Ergonomic

description.zh: 講解新產品開發流程的企畫、設計、製造等知識，並演練運用解決複雜的產品設計開發問題之系統化設計方法、快速手繪以及立體電腦模型表現，延續並運用大一與大二課程所學之美學、人因工程、工學、電腦繪圖等各方面知識與技能。
description.en: Course projects are chosen to give students an opportunity to use their creative, technical and theoretical skills in a business application. The primary emphasis is on the use of a systematic process for the design and development of products.

description.zh: 整合室內設計基礎課程，如：基礎室內設計原理、基礎圖學、施工圖、手繪透視表現、電腦3D表現、建築構造學、室內建築學、裝飾材料、景觀與室內園藝等課程，以創意激發的訓練為主，透過實際設計程序的演練，習得設計的方法並培養解決問題的能力。
description.en: Integration of the interior design foundation courses, such as: basic interior design principles, basic drawings, work drawings, hand-drew perspective, computer 3D performance, building construction, interior architecture, decoration materials, landscape and indoor gardening etc. The course aims to stimulate creativity and to develop problem-solving abilities through the practices of proper design methods and the actual design process.

description.zh: 照明設計基本原理之介紹為'照明設計'之基礎先修課程.以期學生能獲得照明設計之正確觀點與知識,內容含燈具與光源之關係,光的材料特性與色彩,測光法與光源資料之解釋,以及照明對人生生理與心理上的影響.
description.en: Course Title:Design of Lighting Description:This course is designed for one-semester program in the lighting. The main purpose of this course is to introduce the softwares and hardwares of lighting. (including lightion equipements. lighting design, transmission system, and distribution system) and how to maintain these equipments.

description.zh:
了解各種珠寶種類材質、製作技術、製造流程及設備並應用設計的基
礎能力,發揮珠寶首飾的設計創意、造形表達；學習珠寶首飾描繪表現
技法及基礎製圖法。
description.en:
The course is concerned with the design and production of 
jewellery , siversmithing and related products and is 
delivered through a programme of lectures and practical 
design projects in terms of types of materials,techniques of
production , and its processes and equipments. Based on the 
foundation of design skills, the students can practice the 
techniques of presentation and drawing, and learn how to 
create new designs of jewellery and its related products.

description.zh: 實際演練室內設計工程中由生活需求分析及調查,規劃設立,施工,協調,管理等各種活動.並綜合性掌握環境中各種條件以習得室內設計的手法.
description.en: The Course is divided into five units: 1). The Nineteenth Century: The Industrial Revolution was the major influence on architectural history development. Structures of this period were marvels of engineering using materials like iron, plate glass, and reinforced concrete in new types of construction. 2). Foundation of Modernism (1890-1920) : In this period, the art community, including Cubism, Expressionism, De Stijl, Futurism and Constructivism, greatly influenced the form of building. 3).Modernism(1920-1970) : In this period, emphasises were placed on the "Less is More" , historicism and ornament were abandoned, the replacement were form and function, reason and abstraction. 4).Postmodernism (1965-1989) : Postmodernism architecture is characterized by the idea of "Less is Boring", and was inspired by Classical tradition and historical precedents. 5).Contemporary Pluralism : In the latter part of the twentieth century, an architect doesn't want to be associated with a movement, unle

description.zh: 速寫是最古老、最容易、最快速的溝通方式之一，也是充滿希望的設計師及藝術家必備的絕技。藉由大量的植物寫生，提昇觀察能力並把線條練活，進而建立起掌控「形」的基本信心。接下來的靜物寫生著重整體的構圖關係，利用黑白灰的構圖原理，著眼在傳其「神」而不是傳其「形」。將前階段的單線練習，改作分塊、分面的線群練習。再接下來是人物肖像寫生練習。到此，線條的特質、比例的嚴謹皆要掌控，肖像對象的性別、年齡、特徵以及由內在而外顯的神韻，是畫者所要表達的。
description.en:
Sketching is one of the oldest, easiest and quickest methods of communication 
and also one of the most important skills a hopeful designer and artist must master. 
The course begins with a lot of plants sketching that helps to enhance your observation and build up your confidence in mastering forms and shapes in order to make your sketches vivid. Next still life sketching focuses on the composition. You are encouraged to utilize the composition principle of black, white and gray, and emphasize more on the vividness than the form until you get rid of the habit of passive copying of the objects. Then you move from the previous linear sketching practice into facet sketching and then block sketching. At the end of the semester, you will practice human portrait sketching. Until now you should be able to handle not only the characteristics of the line and proportion, but also the gender, age, charm and expression of the model.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。

description.zh:
本課程分三年（六學期）教授，各學年課程教授內容如下：
第一學年課程視為建築設計之基礎課題，從建築美學之觀點培養基本素養、建築模樣體驗、設計實作再造，達到建築設計基本知識之體態。並結合一年級橫向課程之實作、圖學、設計理論、全能住宅改造等課程，課程規劃以多元建構為主，其養成要點如下:
1. 美學再創造：基本美學素養養成，將感知中的聽覺、視覺、觸覺等與美學體驗再度結合，用思考轉換形式。奠定日後進入空間美學基礎。
2. 建築繪圖與表現技巧：建築相關圖學與識圖展現養成，體驗空間感受與空間掌握，美學與繪圖思考整合。
3. 空間構成與思維邏輯：將2D轉為3D，藉由點、線、面、體之基本元素，將環境觀察或是感知等邏輯分析，呈現空間的比例、尺度或透過實作技術等理論，重構思維進一步與環境共構將空間再塑。
4. 設計實務養成：為因應環境友善，與環境共存之議題如何運用在設計之中，探討行為模式、機能、線安排空間組織等等，將環境之感受能力，以空間再改造展現能力，由於重於綠材料之實作特色，因此實作養成之重要關鍵之一，需配合全能改造課程。達到創作性實務，可說是實驗性實作的特色課程。
5.材料與構築實驗：體驗材料之特性，將材料之特性發揮到極限。
description.en:
This course is organized, as a three-year's program that is arranged around a pattern of six semesters. The modular teaching structure is:1. First year - An introduction to basic design problem solving : concepts of point, line, plane, and space organization : principles of unity/variety ,order ,balance , proportion ,scale , etc.; orthographic projection and axonometrics ; pattern diagramming ; and basic design consequences of human activity. 
The course as the fundamental of architectural design aims to foster basic knowledge from the perspective of architectural aesthetics, experience, and design execution. Combined with the lateral curriculum of construction, drawing, design theory, and housing renewal projects, the program built upon diversified exposures in 1. aesthetics, 2. architectural drawings and rendering techniques, 3. spatial constructs and logics, 4.  Professional training, 5.  materials and experiments, 6. communication and presentation.

Studio introduction to architect

description.zh: 本課程主要在論述以建築規劃設計者之立場如何利用建築設備系統控制建築物理環境影響因子，以及其與建築物銜接介面之統合關係。本課程為第一階段之系列課程，其內容包括：1. 地球環境變遷對環境控制系統之衝擊2. 空調設備系統3. 特殊空調節能設備4. 電氣設備系統5. 設施管理6.設備更新
description.en: This course mainly discuss issues about architecture planning how a designer uses architecture equipment system to control architecture physical Environmental Impact, and its integrate relation with Building's connecting medium.This course is the first step of a series course, its content including:1. The Impact of Earth Environmental Change to Environmental Control System2. Air Conditional Equipment System  3. Special Air Conditional Energy Conservation System4. Electric equipment5. Facility Management6. Renewal of Equipment System

description.zh: 待修正；本課程主要在講解建築物外部空間的營造方法，內容包括理論及實際案例的說明。授課主題涵蓋：1.敷地計畫之相關理論、2.敷地計畫之內容及程序、3.基地調查及分析、4.規劃方法與計畫評估（包括土地使用、外部空間、交通動線、排水、整地、植栽）、5.環境影響評估、6.案例分析。
description.en: This course introduces the theories, principles, and methods of designing and construction of outdoor spaces. Through cases studies, the courses seeks to expand the students understanding to the major components of site planning.Topics focus on six premises:1.	theories in relation to site planning;2.	design sequences of site planning;3.	investigations and analyses of the sites;4.	planning and designing methods and their evaluations;5.	environmental impact assessment;6.cases studies.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹施工圖用途及施工法，說明標準施工圖之畫法及標示說明，使學生了解建築工程各種施工法，施工次序及土地管理，加強圖面，作業與實際施工之配合。主要授課內容如下：一、施工圖標準標示法介紹、二、實際建築案例設計並繪製全套施工圖，以及各式施工大、樣圖解說、三、工地參觀、四、工作進度表演練。
description.en: 1. Graphic standards for working drawing. 2. Drawing preparation and process. 3. Selected shop drawing

description.zh: 本課程主要教導學生了解各結構系統的架構及概念，與其受地震力、風力之行為。1.作用於建築物之荷重、2.結構材料性質與結構需求、3.基本應力、4.受張及受壓結構、5.桁架結構、6.樑及構架系統、7.格子樑、平版及摺板系統、8.薄膜結構、9.薄殼結構
description.en: The main purpose of this course is training students to comprehend the concepts and behaviors of each kind of structural systems. 1.Loads on Structures, 2.Structural Materials and Structural Requirements, 3.Fundamental Stress, 4.Tension and Compression Structures, 5.Truss Systems, 6.Beam and Rigid Frames, 7.Grid, Slab and Folded-Plate, 8.Membrane Structures, 9.Thin Shells

description.zh: 本課程介紹當代重要的建築思潮、事件與作品。從代謝派到流體建築的發展，每週選定一個主題說明之。
description.en: The course attempts to give an introduction to important architectural thoughts, events and projects after 1900, except for the heyday of modernism. From metabolism to blobitecture, each week a lecture referring to one specific topic including relevant materials will be given.

description.zh: 本課程講授並實際演練針對建築設計領域中的先端數位實務技術，以增進學習者的設計操作能力及表現力。
description.en: This course offers students hands-on exercises on various advanced digital practices that have become essential in the architectural design discipline, intending to prepare students properly their ability to execute these techniques.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意學生與教授討論擬定專題研究的題目，在教授的個別指導下，進行實驗研究，並將研究結果寫成報告。
description.en: The topic of the special projects is discussed and together by the students and advisor. Under the face-to -face instruction of the advisor the student will conduct the research and experiments, and the final report at the end of the semester.

description.zh:
先修課程:4402025或負責教授同意
底盤動力系統，行駛阻力、驅動力、煞車制動傳動等之計算車懸吊系統分析（懸吊系統、汽車垂直振動分析、系統參數調整），汽車轉向系統，ABS 煞車系統，整合系統。
description.en: Traction Force, Driving Resistance, Power Balance, Performance Test, Fuel Economy, Engine and Transmission Matching, Braking Performance, Handling, Steering and Ride Characteristics.

description.zh:
先修課程:負責教授同意
先修課程：負責教授同意。自動控制數學基礎，物理系統的數學模式，控制器的種類，時域分析，穩定性分析，根軌跡法，頻率領域的分析，控制系統的設計。
description.en: Mathematical Foundation of Automatic Control, Mathematical Model of Physical System, Controller Type, Time-Domain Analysis, Stability Analysis, Root Locus Method, Frequency-Domain Analysis, Design of Control System.

description.zh:
先修課程:物理或負責教授同意
不可壓縮流體，質量不滅，非黏性流體之運動，柏努力定律，線性及角動量定理及其應用，渦流與勢流，黏性流，納維爾－史脫克斯方程式及其應用，管中壓力頭損失及增加，邊界層與分離升力與阻力及雷諾方程式之應用。
description.en:
Fundamental Concepts, Fluid Statics, Basic Equations in Integral Form for a Control Volume, Introduction to Differential Analysis of Fluid Motion, Incompressibility in Viscid Flow, Dimensional Analysis , Internal in Compressible Viscous Flow, External Incompressible Flow. Introduction
to Compressible Flow.

description.zh: 車輛電機實驗內容包括：(1)發電機、電動機與電瓶實驗；(2)二極體、電晶體與運算放大器實驗；(3)電源轉換器與電動機驅動器實驗。學生將學習車輛電機的基本要求，並練習如何應用適當工具設計與製作電路，課程著重學生實作演練。
description.en: This course aims to train students in understanding the fundamental vehicle electrical requirements, and utilizing tools to design and implement the electric circuits. Topics include: (1) Generators, motors, and batteries experiments, (2) Diodes, transistors and operational amplifiers experiments, and (3) Source converters and motor drivers experiments.

description.zh: 車輛底盤與結構實驗內容包括: (1)車輛底盤分析與實驗；(2)車輛噪音分析與實驗；(3)車輛結構分析與實驗。學生將學習車輛設計的基本要求，並練習如何應用適當工具求得車底盤與結構系統主要性能，課程著重學生實作演練。
description.en: This course aims to train students in understanding the fundamental vehicle design requirements and utilizing tools to obtain the major characteristics and performance of the vehicle. Topics include: (1) Vehicle Chassis System Measurements, (2) Vehicle Sound Quality Measurements, (3) Vehicle Structure Analyses and Measurements.

description.zh:
先修課程:負責教授同意
基本觀念及其領域、非線性代數之數值解法、聯立方程式之數值解、多項式內外插、微分、積分、常微分方程、起始、邊界值問題之數值解法。
description.en:
Fundamental Concepts and Its Scope, Numerical Solution of Nonlinear Algebraic Equations and Sets of Equations, Interpolating Polynomials, Numerical Differentiation and Numerical Integration, Numerical Solution of Ordinary Differential Equations, Numerical Solution of Boundary-Value
Problems and Initial-Value Problems.

description.zh: 字彙, 文法, 閱讀, 解讀。
description.en: Vocabulary, grammar, reading, decipherment.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 由介紹基本熱傳有關現象，配合熱力守恆有關公式之應用，討論各種熱交換環境下應考慮之因素，分析熱傳導、熱對流、熱輻射及相變熱傳之計算方法。並將要更深入地探討在各不同熱傳導系統內所可能形成之熱力分佈現象，以期學習者能以淺入深地對相關熱傳導系統工程設計上培養出最佳能力。
description.en: Introduction of basic heat transfer phenomena, using thermodynamic conservation equations to discuss the parameters under different heat exchange circumstances, heat conduction, heat convection, heat radiation and phase change are analyzed, discussion in depth on the heat transfer problems in application to cultivate heat transfer design capability.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹冷凍工程，以及其設計，內容涵蓋如下：冷凍工程原理，冷凍系統之設備，各種冷凍系統之設計，冷凍負荷計算，冷媒管路之設計與計算，冷凍庫之設計。
description.en: This course introduces the refrigeration engineering and its system design; the contents cover the following topics: the principles of refrigeration engineering, the equipment and designs of different refrigeration systems, refrigeration load calculations, design and calculation of refrigerant piping, and refrigeration storage design.

description.zh: 基本控制系統的動作方式、位置控制、比例控制、積分控制、微分控制、各種組合控制、氣壓控制裝置、電動及電子控制裝置、液壓控制裝置、空調設備上的各種控制包括溫度、壓力、風量、濕度等之控制。
description.en: To provide students with the concepts of control actions: two position control, proportional control, floating control, integral control, derivative control; to familiarize students with pneumatic control devices, fluid control devices, damper & valves, elementary control systems on HVAC & R systems, include: temperature control, humidity control, static pressure control, flow control and so on.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養各類型段落、短文的撰寫能力，包括描寫、敘述、說明及議論性質文章。
description.en: This course is intended for university-level EFL writing students with the aim of increasing their fluency in English writing. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to write varying types of English paragraphs, for instance, paragraphs of definition and paragraphs focusing on cause and effect relationships. In addition, they will have plenty of opportunities to write various kinds of short English essays, including descriptions, narratives, and argumentative writings.

name.en: Reading and Discussions on Global Affairs

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生經由閱讀與討論以了解全球共同面對的課題，包括：全球化的趨勢、文化衝突與恐怖主義、全球貧富差距、環境保護問題、基因工程所衍生的倫理道德問題等等。
description.en: Through reading and discussions, the students are guided to understand some of the most important issues that have affected the present world and its future.  These topics include globalization in world economy, health care problems, environmental protection, racial conflicts, and genetic engineering.

description.zh: 本課程旨在訓練學生公開表達之能力，內容包括語言表達基本原則與技巧、肢體語言與演講要領，備題演講及即席演講演練。
description.en: This course is designed to enable students to develop the principles and skills necessary for public speaking. Included will be guidelines for giving a speech and displaying body language, and practices for prepared speech and impromptu speech.

description.zh: 本課程介紹研究方法和論文寫作知識，期能培養學生獨立研究和撰寫學術報告、論文的基本能力。主要分為三部份：（一）研究內涵與步驟,（二）主要的研究方法,（三）如何撰寫英文論文及報告。涵蓋主題包括：運用圖書館資源選擇研究主題、研究計劃的撰寫、問卷調查法、訪問法、觀察法、田野工作研究方法、文獻資料分析法（內容分析法）、個案研究法、相關研究法、實驗法、文學研究法，研究報告論文格式與寫作要領，如何撰寫文獻探討，參考書目寫法等。
description.en: This course aims at providing students with the fundamental knowledge and competence that they will need in doing research and writing research papers.  Its main purpose is to familiarize students with methods, procedures, and techniques that are applicable to quantitative and qualitative research as well as to improve their ability to write research papers.  The main topics for instruction include: the research process; major research methods; and the structure of a research paper.  The research methods primarily studied include the experimental method, descriptive research, ethnography, case study, observation, survey research (questionnaire and interviews), content analysis/documentary analysis, and critical approaches to literature.

name.en: World Literatures and Cultures in English

description.zh: 本課程旨在藉由各種文化媒體（如文學作品，書報雜誌，期刊論文，電影等影音文字）引導學生選擇性地認識英國、愛爾蘭、美國、加拿大、非洲、澳洲、紐西蘭、印度、巴基斯坦、新加坡、香港、菲律賓、加勒比海等國家或地區的文學與文化。藉由認識上述這些國家或地區的英語文學與文化，擴展學生英語文應用的宏觀視野，並使之具備促進異國情感及文化交流的能力。
description.en: This course aims to introduce students to the selected literatures and cultures of English-speaking countries and areas such as England, Ireland, the United States, Canada, Anglophone Africa, Australia, New Zealand, India, Pakistan, Singapore, Hong Kong, the Philippines, and the Caribbean. In this course, world literatures in English, together with various cultural media (including newspaper, magazine and journal articles as well as Internet materials and films), will be examined to introduce students to Anglophone literatures and cultures. Students are expected to acquire via this course a nuanced, discriminating literary and cultural competency. With this cross-cultural literacy, they could help promote international understanding and global cultural exchange.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有進階日語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to enhance their Japanese abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the Japanese language.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有進階西班牙語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is enable students to enhance their Spanish abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the Spanish language.

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有進階德語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to enhance their German abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the German language.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education
Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

description.zh: 以實務性專題提供學生獨立研究、設計、實驗之機會。
description.en: The course uses the practical project to help students to build independent research , design and experiment.

description.zh: 經理需要以現代管理必要的 "資訊-基礎"來支持，俾使達到和滿足(相遇)他們的組織目標。管理資訊系統(MIS) 是整合使用者和機構系統，用以提供一個組織之操作支援，管理分析，和決策功能。我們以學習資訊工作者的角色，幫助經理滿足(相遇)組織目標， 以及檢查資訊系統的特徵，使經理工作更容易順暢。學習主題：透過資訊系統獲取策略優勢、透過資訊系統應用，支持經理和執行、管理固有的冒險，俾使發展和資訊系統應用、獲得和實踐技術性領導
description.en: 英文概述	The need for information-based support for managers is increasing as the modern management imperatives of reach and to meet their organization's goals. A management information system (MIS) is an integrated user + Machine system that provides information to support operations, management analysis, and decision- making functions in an organization. We will also look at the role in formation play in helping managers meet goals by examining the characteristics of information systems that make managers' job easier. Topic of learning:‧Acquiring strategic advantage through information systems.‧Supporting managers and executives through IS applications.‧Managing the risk inherent in developing and using IS applications.‧Attaining and practicing technological leadership.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹企業進行國際化策略以及多國籍企業營運與其功能性（價值鏈活動）之議題。期使學生瞭解當代企業國際化營運的重要性與其內涵，並建立整體的概念。同時，藉由精選案例之探討，提供學習者了解企業進行國際化與國際營運管理相關的實務作法。如此，將使學習者得將國企理論與概念運用於實際案例，培養分析能力。
description.en: The course is mainly for the students to understand the importance of international business strategies of MNC (Multi-Nation Company) which includes the business models, value chain and the functionality.  In the mean time, the students will have a clear picture of MNC's daily operation by well-selected case study.  The ultimate goal is to apply the theory into the real business world and to have an advanced analysis capability at the end of the course.

name.zh: 創意與創新管理事業化
name.en: How to implement innovation into realized enterprise

description.zh: 在許多場合，無論是研討會、交流會等均會有許多創意點子出現，但多數的點子有如雨水一般，如果不能蓄存，散落後就消失；反之如果有系統收集，它就成為企業創新的主要來源，而透過企業創新的多元面向，如產品創新、流程創新、行銷創新等，均可為企業帶來附加價值，提升競爭力。本課程主要內容有產品創新、流程創新、經營模式創新、行銷創新、識別系統創新、組織創新、新事業創新、創意與創新管理事業化等，有助於學生將創意和創業事業化。
description.en: In many seminar and mutual discussion cases, there are many good ideas happened. But innovation like rain fall, if we don't have reservoir to keep it, It will rain everywhere and disappeared. If we have data base to collect all the innovation, It will to be value material in enterprise innovation. Through product innovation, process innovation and marketing innovation, It will bring high value to enterprise and rises its competing ability. From "How to establish an enterprise" classes, We find many students have many good ideas, If we can give them more advanced knowledge to use such ideas, It will benefit them success in establish an enterprise.

name.en: Statistical Data Analysis Using Computer Software

description.zh: 訓練學生應用統計套裝軟體進行資料整理、陳列、分析、解釋及統計推論，以建立學生使用統計套裝軟體進行統計資料分析之能力。課程主題包括敘述統計之圖表製作、假設檢定、信賴區間、變異數分析和迴歸模型。學期末，學生應能以標準統計分析程序，分析商業資料，並根據統計分析之結果，建議可行之企業決策。
description.en:
This course reviews and expands upon core topics in probability and
statistics through the study and practice of data analysis. Topics
include numerical and graphical summaries of data, hypothesis testing,
confidence intervals, analysis of variance, and regression. Upon
completion of this course, students should be able to think critically
about data and apply standard statistical inference procedures to draw
conclusions from such analysis.

description.zh: 解析國內國家考試「會計學」之命題趨勢。並以實際國家考試考古題為案例，在解題過程中引導學生建立完整的會計理論體系，增進學生對會計理論的理解與應用能力，培養學生的邏輯思考、並增進解題技巧，順利通過國家考試。
description.en: Resolve domestic national examination "Accounting" Trend proposition. And the actual state exam archaeological entitled case in the problem solving process to guide students to build a complete system of accounting theory, enhance students' understanding of accounting theory and application capabilities, develop logical thinking of students, and enhance problem-solving skills, passed the national exam.

notes: 經管大碩與產業接軌合開

description.zh: 本課程主要在於幫助學生學習商業簡報的專業技巧。主要議題包括口語表達技巧、投影片設計、以及求職面談要領等。課程內容對於商業實務的應用部分也會在課程中討論。
description.en: This course aims to help students to develop professional skills in business presentation. Topics include (but not limited to) oral presentation skills, powerpoint designing, and employment interview tips. Implications for managerial practice will be discussed in this class.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in. description.zh: 本課程之設計，以介紹資料庫之概念與技術為主。課程重點為關聯式資料庫的相關概念與技術。本課程包括下列主題：資料庫系統簡介、紀錄儲存與檔案組織、索引檔案結構、關聯性模型、關聯性幾何及演算、SQL查詢語言、關聯式資料庫設計、功能相依性、正規化處理、查詢語言最佳化處理、資料庫系統技術。進階主題包含物件導向資料庫、多媒體資料庫、分散式資料庫、資料庫之平行操作相關問題等。
description.en: This course is designed to introduce concepts and skills essential in the database systems. Relational database will be the main focus with related topics such as relational model, design concepts, and structured query language. The topics to be covered include: introduction to database systems, record storage and file organizations, indexed structures for files, the relational model, relational algebra and calculus, SQL, conceptual and logical design for relational database, functional dependencies, normalization, query optimization and database technology. Advanced topics include object-oriented database, multimedia database, distributed database, and concurrent operations on database.

description.zh: １.電腦網路概述與網路階層結構２.路由與交換技術與協定 ３.錯誤、流量與擁塞控制 ４.媒體存取控制 ５.區域網路技術與應用６.網際網路協定與標準７.網路互連技術８.網路機制效能評估
description.en: １.Computer network overview and layered communications２.	Routing and switching protocol３.Error, flow and congestion control ４.Medium access control ５.Local area networks６.	Network protocols and standards ７.Network interconnection８.Performance analysis

description.zh: 本課程由老師指導學生選定題目，進行該題目之問題定義、分析、設計與製作。專題完成後需撰寫書面報告並公開展示成品。專題範圍包含：1.多媒體系統 2.電腦網路 3.軟體分析與設計4.影像與音訊處理 5.微算機應用
description.en: In this course, the instructor will guide the students to fulfill a special project through the phases of problem formulation, analysis, design and implementation. The final work should be demonstrated in the public along with a written report. The topics include 1.Multimedia systems 2.Computer networks 3.Software analysis and design 4.Audio and video signal processing 5.Microprocessor-based applications

description.zh: 專題演講或書報討論
description.en: Invited talk or group discussion.

description.zh: 本課程介紹連續時間與離散時間訊號與系統的基本概念。訊號與系統的分析廣泛地應用在模擬、分析、與設計實際物理過程。本課程可做為線性系統、通訊系統與數位訊號處理等較進階課程之基礎課程。授課內容大綱如下：1.訊號與系統簡介2.線性非時變系統3.週期訊號之傅立葉級數表示法4.連續時間訊號與系統的傅立葉分析5.離散時間訊號與系統的傅立葉分析6.取樣7.調變8.濾波9.拉普拉斯變換10.Z變換
description.en: This course covers fundamental concepts in signals and systems, which are broadly used for modeling, analyzing, and designing physical processes. Both the continuous-time and the discrete-time aspects will be considered. This course can be viewed as the prerequisite for the advanced courses such as linear systems, communication systems and digital signal processing.  The outline of this course is listed as follows.1.Introduction to Signals and Systems2.	Linear Time-invariant Systems3.Fourier Series Representation for Periodical Signals4.Fourier Analysis for Continuous-time Signals and Systems5.Fourier Analysis for Discrete-time Signals and Systems6.Sampling7.	Modulation8.Filtering9.	Laplace Transform10.Z Transform

description.zh: 1.介紹視窗程式語言及其物件導向特性 2.基礎視窗程式設計 3.動態連結程式庫之程式設計 4.視窗圖形使用者界面設計 5.視窗I/O界面設計 6.多媒體程式寫作 7.DDE與OLE之程式設計 8.視窗多執行緒之程式設計
description.en: 1. introduction to windows programming language and its object-oriented design 2. fundamental windows programming 3. programming with dynamic-link library 4. design of windows GUI 5. windows I/O interface programming 6. multi-media programming 7. programming with DDE and OLE 8. windows programming with multithreads.
