name.en: English practice and training for engineers

description.zh:
本課程旨在有效提升學生運用英文於工程實務之技巧與能力。主要包括： 一、撰寫個人英文履歷及簡歷。 
     二、閱讀通俗科技文章的能力(含心得報告)。 
     三、使用英文進行簡報的技巧與能力。 
     四、撰寫英文簡報資料的技巧與能力。 
     五、撰寫工作報告的技巧與能力。
本課程授課包括約三分之一的時間在語言教室練習職場英語。
description.en:
This course aims to effectively promote students' capabilities of using English for engineering issues, particularly focused on the following: 1.To write his/her curriculum vitae and resume. 2.To read scientific/technical magazines and handbooks. 3.To present his/her work by English. 4.To write and edit presentation material(s) by English. 5.To construct and write a concise report by English.
The coursed is also devised to include about one third of total teaching hours to practice English, particularly used in office or work, in the language laboratory.

description.zh: 簡介，感測器，基本驅動器，順序及計時控制，PLC，伺服驅動器及放大器，基本伺服控制系統。
description.en:
Course Title:Mechatronics Practice
Description:To familiarize students with the usage of mechatronic
techniques and corresponding parts/components

name.en: Writing and presentation in the Technical Field

description.zh:
1. 工程寫作的基本技巧
 工程寫作結構、段落、圖表的製作
 國際單位與標點符號
2. 升學與求職之寫作
 簡歷表、自傳與讀書計畫、推薦信
 碩士推甄注意事項
3. 論文與職場之寫作
 論文寫作項目與格式、參考文獻
 備忘錄、會議記錄、產品說明書之寫法
4. 口語表達之藝術
 簡報、投影片製作
 簡報面談注意事項
5. 科技人的人文寫作
description.en:
1. Basic Writing Techniques
 Structures, paragraph, tables and graphics in the technical writing
 Engineering units and punctuations
2. Writing for Application of Schools or Finding Jobs
 Writing of resume, autobiography, letter of recommendation and study plan
 Tips on application to graduate schools
3. Thesis and Work Writing
 Items and format of a thesis
 Writing of references, memo and minutes of meeting
4. Oral Presentation
 Making of films by PowerPoint
 Tips on interviewing skills
5. Literature Writing by Technical Person

notes: 大四合開/實際上課時間10:00-12:40/限48人

description.zh:
1.空間描述與數學轉換
2.機械手臂運動學
3.機械手臂反向運動學
4.賈氏矩陣
5.軌跡規劃
6.機械手臂之線性控制
7.機器人視覺
8.機器人避障
9.工業自動化應用
10.實驗項目：機械手臂及機器人操控、結合視覺感測之機械手臂自動化系統、機器人導航與控制
description.en:
1.Spatial description transformation 
2.Manipulation kinematics 
3.Inverse manipulation kinematics 
4.Jacobians 
5.Trajectory generation
6.Linear control of manipulator 
7.Machine vision 
8.Robotic obstacle avoidance 
9.Industrial automation applications 
10.Laboratory work: control of manipulators and mobile robots, automatic manipulation with vision sensors, navigation and control of mobile robots

name.en: Design and Analysis of Computer Algorithms

description.zh: 1. 數學基礎 1.1 函數成長率之漸近性質 1.2 遞迴關係之解 1.3 數學歸納法 2. 基本分析技巧 2.1 計算複雜度之上下限2.2 最差情況分析及平均情況分析 2.3 動態平均分析 3. 基本設計技巧 3.1 分擊法 3.2 貪婪法 3.3 動態規劃 3.4 隨機演算法 4. 計算複雜度 4.1 資訊理論證明法 4.2 對抗式證明法 4.3 問題之線性轉換 4.4 完全NP
description.en: 1. Mathematical background 1.1 Asymptotic growth rate of functions 1.2 Solving recurrence relations 1.3 Mathematical induction 2. Basic analysis techniques 2.1 Computational complexities -- lower bounds and upper bounds 2.2 Worst case analysis and average case analysis 2.3 Amortized analysis 3. Basic Design Paradigms 3.1 Divide and conquer 3.2 Greedy methods 3.3 Dynamic programming 3.4 Probabilistic algorithms 4. Computational Complexity 4.1 Information-theoretic arguments 4.2 Adversary arguments 4.3 Linear reduction of problems 4.4 NP-completeness

description.zh:
學習如何描述軟體需求及發展滿足特定需求之系統規格。本課程將涵蓋下列主題：
��	需求引出
��	需求分析
��	需求塑模與描述
��	需求確認與驗證
��	品質需求
description.en:
Students will learn how to describe requirements for software and develop specifications for the system that meets the given requirements. This course will cover the following topics:
��	Requirement elicitation
��	Requirement analysis
��	Requirement modeling and description
��	Requirements validation and verification
��	Quality requirements

notes: 英文授課、四資四、資工所和電資國際班合開、二教207

description.zh:
全球遊戲產業包含電腦、遊戲主機、手機遊戲等，市場產值高達上百億美元。虛擬實境和擴增實境的應用更從遊戲、影音娛樂及廣告行銷多元發展與推廣。Unity是一套支援多平台的遊戲開發工具，其強大的功能與豐富的資源，使得任何人都可以快速的進入遊戲開發的世界，更為目前各大遊戲公司所採用之遊戲開發工具。比起早期的開發方式，Unity之強大功能與易上手特性更能節省開發時間與成本。學生想要創業製作遊戲也不再是夢想。 
此課程內容會教授同學如何使用Unity遊戲引擎來開發實作遊戲。從最基礎的認識介面編輯器，到如何套用物理模擬效果，以及創建場景及調配燈光皆會依不同單元慢慢教授。課程將以每周一個Unity開發單元搭配一個小作業的方式進行。課程並包含目前最熱門的虛擬實境和擴增實境的應用程式之製作，讓同學可以在一學期內開發出完整的遊戲。
(修課須具備基礎：物件導向程式設計能力）
description.en:
This course teaches the core skills for Game Development in Unity 3D. This game development course from Infinite Skills introduces you to the fundamentals of 3D game design with the Unity engine. This tutorial is designed with the absolute beginner in mind; no prior experience with Unity is required.

You will start by exploring the Unity interface, and learning how to manipulate objects in the editor. Throughout this course, you will learn how to develop 2D/3D games, augmented reality and virtual reality applications.
You will learn how to import assets for the game, apply physics to objects in the game, and how to combine assets to create complex objects. You will add animation and manage lighting for the game. Finally you will render and build the game for distribution.
Once you have completed this course, you will have a strong grasp of the fundamentals needed to build a functional game using the Unity 3D engine.

description.zh: 本課程之設計，在介紹學生資訊安全的概念，並瞭解相關的技術與應用。本課程包括下列主題：資訊安全簡介、傳統加密法、私鑰加密技術、公鑰加密技術與雜湊函數、訊息認證編碼與協定、認證系統、電子郵件安全技術、網際網路協定安全技術、全球資訊網安全技術、系統安全技術、防火牆系統等。
description.en: This course is designed to provide students with the knowledge and techniques essential in information security. The topics to be covered include: introductions to information security, conventional encryption, private key technologies, public key technologies and hash functions, message authentication code and protocols, authentication systems, Kerberos, X.509 7, E-Mail security, PGP, S/MIME, IP security, Web security, SHTTP, SSL (Secure Session Layer), system security, and firewall systems.

description.zh:
介紹工程成本運算的各種方法，藉由不同的數學分析技巧，推估並了解
                                         不同工程資金運用方案的差異性，以為決策評估及成本控制的依據。
description.en: Introduction the methods of engineering cost calculate.

notes: 計中電腦教室/上課時間10:00-13:00

description.zh:
具有半流體特性的粉體，其在產業上之應用範圍相當地廣，可說是
涵蓋了所有的產業。其中在礦業、窯業、陶瓷業、水泥業、冶金業
等工業與粉體工程有密切關係。所以，研習本課程主要的目的是讓
學生對錯綜複雜的粉體問題，能有基本上的認識與了解。本課程安
排的內容包括：粉粒體的定義、粉體之生成、粉體之構造與特性、
粉體的物性、粉體的分離、混合、貯藏、輸送、計測與工業安全衛
生等項目。
description.en:
With the characteristics of semi-fluid, powder has a wide variety of applications,
it covers all industries. Among of them, mineral, kiln, ceramics, cement, metallurgy
industry have a very close relationship with powder industry. Therefore, the major
purpose of this course is to let student have basic perception and understanding to
the complex powder problems.The content of this course includes the definition
of powder body, the formation of powder body, the structure and characteristics
of powder body, the property of powder body, the separation, mixting, storage,
transportation and measurement of powder body, and industry safety and sanitation
.

description.zh:
一、簡介(Outline)
二、導電材料(Conductors)
三、電阻材料(Resistors)
四、絕緣材料(Insulators)
五、半導體材料(Semiconductors)
六、介電材料(Dielectrics)
七、磁性材料(Magnetics)
八、壓電材料(Piezoelectrics)
九、超導材料(Superconductors)
十、感測材料(Sensors)
description.en: This course is a special topics of Electronic Materials.

description.zh:
課程綱要：
1.半導體元件簡介
2.物理氣相沉積
3.化學氣相沉積
4.微影─光阻覆蓋，曝光，顯影
5.蝕刻─濕式蝕刻，乾式蝕刻
6.攙雜─擴散法，離子植入法
7.氧化和熱處理製程
description.en:
Course Outline：
1.Introduction to Semiconductor Device
2.Physical Vapor Deposition
3.Chemical Vapor Deposition
4.Photolithography─photoresist coating, exposure, development
5.Etching─wet etching, dry etching
6.Doping─diffusion, ion implantation
7.Oxidation and Thermal Treatment Process

description.zh: 本課程包含1.複合材料的基礎知識：如複合材質及複合過程，複合構造及組織、複合材料的力學性質等基本知識。2.各種複合材料的 介紹，如炭素纖維強化複合材料金屬等複合材料等，原理及應用之 介紹。3.對於尖端技術領域之應用。複合材料大致可區分為高分子 基複材，金屬基複材，陶瓷基複材及纖維複材四種。纖維複材中， 可依強度，韌性和成本需求而選用玻璃纖維、硼纖維、碳纖維、有 機纖維、陶瓷纖維、金屬纖維等作為強化元件。上述各種複材製造 方法，介面結構，機械性質，應用，微觀力學、巨觀力學、強度、 破裂、疲勞和設計均為討論內容。
description.en: The course includes the following items: 1.The basic knowledge of composite materials such as composite materials, composite process and composite structure and tissue, the dynamics property of composite materials. 2.The introduction of all kinds of composite materials, such as the principle and application of reinforced composite material of carbon-fiber. 3.The application of composite materials at the most advanced area.The composite materials approximately can be classified into polymer base composite material, metal base composite material, ceramic base composite material, and fibre composite material. The fiber composite material can be selected as reinforced parts according to strength, toughness and cost requirement, such as glassfiber, boronfiber, carbonfiber, organic fiber, ceramic fiber, metal fiber.The above-mentioned manufacturing method, interface structure, mechanical property, application, microdynamics, macrodynamics, strength, fracture, fatigue and design are all the c

description.zh:
生物工程和醫療技術的研究和發展，在最近幾十年中，促成明確的臨床醫學和衛生保健的進步。這些領域的發展，開啟了生物工程、臨床技術和醫學信息領域課程的蓬勃發展；目前，各大學及研究所多有提供這些領域的課程。然而，大多數參與者多來自工程背景，因此學習生物科學和醫學應用於工程思維及模式，方能使得工程師和醫生之間的科學能無礙地交流。
這項課程主要是為了使主修工程及材料的學生提供具有實用性的人體結構和組織的原則及相互依存的細胞和組織器官的生理系統進行有用的學習。雖然課程可能無法全然覆蓋所有生物醫學工程領域的基礎，但在這個學習過程中，我們將專注於大多數生物醫學工程以及生技和組織工程從事的主要研發領域作出努力。這門課程是醫學和工程及材料之間的橋樑。這將是促進各類工程及設計師和醫事人員之間文化和科學的交通和相互研習課程，促進生物醫學工程的創新發現和發展。在這個過程中，我們將提供一系列的生物學和醫學知識和方法，應用在工程、材料和電子領域，旨在幫助他們能將其整和連接，可以開始從工程進入生物醫學工程的專業，或者提供工程師期許能“簡單”理解特定臨床醫療科學和技術。經由醫學背景引導進入此領域，將結合工程及材料師長的經
description.en:
Research and development in bioengineering and medical technology, conducted during recent decades, have led to spectacular progress in clinical medicine and healthcare. These achievements have triggered an enormous increase in the number courses offered in the areas of bioengineering, clinical technology and medical informatics; nowadays, most major universities offer curricula oriented towards these fields. The majority of participants however come from engineering background and so modules dealing with basic biological and medical sciences have been included, to the detriments of scientific exchanges between engineers and medical doctors. 
This study is primarily to give those majoring in the electronic and engineering students a useful glimpse of the principles of human structure and organization and of the interdependence of cellular and organ physiological systems. Although it is no possible to cover all of the biomedical engineering domains in this course, we will have made an e

notes: 電子大三大四與電子所合開

description.zh: (A) 部分：1.基本CMOS邏輯閘設計，2.CMOS基本邏輯閘時序模擬，3.CMOS基本邏輯閘佈局，4.數位電路功能分析與模擬，5.階層式的電路組成，6.中小型電路設計，7.VHDL系統，(B) 部分：1.認識Cadence系統， 2.圖形編輯設備的操作練習，3.零件庫介紹，4.設計電路之輸入編輯，5.電路模擬實習，6.數位電路的晶片設計，7.晶片製造專題。
description.en:
(A)
1.Basic CMOS logic design
2.CMOS logic gate simulation 
3.CMOS logic gate placement
4.Analysis and simulation of digital circuit 
5.Hierachy circuit
6.VHDL system
(B)
1.Introduction to c cadence system
2.Graphic editor practice
3.module
4.Input editor 
5.Circuit simulation practice
6.Special projects

notes: 電子大三大四合開/須修過超大型積體電路導論

description.zh: 透過原理解說與系統實作，使學生熟悉雲端平台(PaaS，Platform as a Service)所提供之服務，以開發雲端應用及行動軟體。課程內容包括：雲端技術簡介，服務平台程式設計介面，ASP.NET MVC應用開發環境，Windows Azure技術架構，SQL Azure 技術架構，Windows Identity Foundation技術架構，Google App Engine技術架構，Facebook社群應用技術架構，期末專題設計等。
description.en: To provide students with the knowledge and skills to develop cloud applications and mobile apps based on typical cloud platform services.  Course spans a variety of cloud platform technologies such as ASP.NET MVC, Windows Azure, SQL Azure, Windows Identity Foundation for Cloud Security, Google App Engine, and Facebook API. Lessons guide students through a class project and take-home assignments.

description.zh: 介紹電子、半導體、績體電路及數位技術的基本原理、及其應用。期使工業設計學生能具備21世紀微電子e世代產品新科技之基本知識。
description.en: A general introduce to the principle of Electronic technology, Semi-conductor, Integrated circuits, Digital technology, and their industrial applications. In order to equip design students with the basic knowledge of Micro-electronic with in the new Era.

description.zh:
無機化學係化學三大骨架之一，日常生活中之各樣物質大部分是由無機材料製成，課程係以深入淺出方式教授，授課內容涵蓋主族元素與過渡元素。課程內容包括:原理、主族元素化學、硼族、第1, 2, 15, 16, 17 族元素、過渡元素化學、
過渡元素、第一過渡系列元素、鈦,鉻,鈷,鎳,銅
description.en: Inorganic chemistry is one of the three frames of chemistry. Various materials in our daily life are composed of inorganic materials. This course will be given in a manner of easy-getting-point. The contents comprise of chemistry of main group elements and transition elements.  The course covers the following topics: (1) Survey of principles (2) Chemistry of main group elements (A. Boron; B. Group 1, 2, 15, 16, 17 Elements) (3) Chemistry of transition elements (A. Survey of Transition Elements; B. Elements of the first transition series; C. Titanium, Chromium, Cobalt, Nickel and Copper.

description.zh: 本課程之授課目標乃教導學生如何利用各種光譜分析方法以鑑定有機化合物之結構，包含紅外光譜、紫外線光譜、質譜儀、核磁共振光譜、X-射線光譜等。
description.en: The aim of the course is to introduce various spectroscopic methods to identify structure of organic compounds. It includes：UV spectroscopy, IR spectroscopy, NMR spectroscopy, Raman spectroscopy, Atomic  spectroscopy, Mass spectroscopy, X-ray methods, Potentiometric  methods, and Thermal methods.

description.zh: 本課程包含用於移植、非移植和體外的材料。移植的材料包含縫線、人工血管、人工心臟、人工骨頭、韌帶、藥物徐放裝置、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。非移植的材料有醫療用衣服、繃帶、注射器材、診療用材料等。體外的材料包含透析膜、人工肺、人工導管等。
description.en: Biomaterials is an introductory course designed for biomaterial compositions, manufacture, functionality and implantability. Biomaterials included in the course are sutures, vascular grafts, artificial organs, artificial tissues,etc. In addition, biocompatibility, biodegradability, carcinogenicity and toxicity of biomaterials are presented in detail.

description.zh: 介紹電機、電子以及電機機械的基礎概念。內容包括(1)電機工程介紹，(2)電子電路基本原則：電荷、電流、電壓、功率、科希荷夫定律、歐姆定律，(3)電阻性網路分析：節點電壓和網目電流、重疊定理、戴維寧和諾頓等效電路，(4)交流網路分析：介紹儲能元件並分析由正弦電壓及電流所驅動的電路，(5)暫態分析：探討在不同穩態條件下，電壓及電流的行為，(6)交流電源：簡單交流電源的計算，以及電力的產生及分配。
description.en: Introduce to the principles of electrical, electronic, and electromechanical engineering. The context contains: (1) Introduction to electrical engineering, (2) Fundamentals of electric circuits: electric, current, voltage, power, and Kirchhoff's current and voltage laws, (3)Resistive network analysis: node analysis, mesh analysis, the principle of superposition, Thevenie and Norton equivalent circuits, (4)AC network analysis: energy storage circuit elements and the analysis of AC circuits excited by sinusoidal voltages and currents, (5)Transient analysis: describe the behavior of a voltage or a current between two distinct steady-state conditions, (6)AC power: simple AC power calculations and the generation and distribution of electric power.

name.zh: 半導體元件物理含實習
name.en: Physics of Semiconductor Device with Practices

description.zh: 探討PN接面之特性，能帶結構，載子遷移，費米能階，製程技術原理等基本元件物理，及微奈米尺度之元件物理知識，及本課程相關實務內容。
description.en: Basic physics of semiconductor device, characteristics of P/N junction, energy band structure, carrier transportation, Fermi-level, process, etc. The relative physical knowledge of micro-nano device is discussed as well. Some relative practice will be included in the course.

notes: 擬抵研究所不列大學畢業學分者請選研究所課號

description.zh: 本課程包括：光的傳播、光的向量特性、光的同調性與干涉、多光束的干涉、光的繞射、晶體光學、熱輻射與光子、光譜、光跡光學。
description.en: This course includes the propagation of light, the vectorial nature of light, coherence and interference, multiple-beam interference, diffraction, optics of solids, thermal radiation and light quanta, optical spectra, and ray optics.

notes: 需經面試通過才可修習/光電四與光電所合開【停開】

description.zh: 1.基本分析工具介紹(6) 2.基本光學系統--近軸光學(6) 3.光學系統元件介紹(6) 4.像差理論(6) 5.像質評估(6) 6.光學系統設計(6) 7.光學套裝軟體使用(6) 8.光電設計專題(9)
description.en: 1.The tools 2.The basic optical systems 3.Basic optical devices 4.Seidel aberrations 5.Image evaluation 6.The design of optical systems 7.The use of Zemax 8.Project on optical design

notes: 擬抵研究所不列大學畢業學分者請選研究所課號

description.zh: 操作化學相關的實驗
description.en: It covers the fundamental experiments in chemistry.

notes: B 有化工（學）乙丙級 選

description.zh: 資源工程導論為資源工程的入門學科，其範圍包括天然的金屬、非金屬、礦物與石油、天然氣、建築用砂石、石材與水等原生資源，以及工商業及一般生活的廢棄物或其附帶產生的可再生資源。期對初學者有一整體的基本概念。
description.en: This is a general introduction class to provide student basic knowledge about resources engineering which include metal, nonmetal, minerals, petroleum, natural gas, aggregates, dimension stone and water resources.

description.zh: 針對地理資訊系統 之概念與技術基礎作一基本瞭解。學習範圍包括城市資訊系統、天然資源及環境管理系統、緊急救援系統等。並學習地理資訊系統 軟體操作與技巧之訓練。
description.en: Conceptual & technical foundations of geographical information systems. Applications covered include: urban information systems, natural resources & environmental management systems & emergency response systems. Laboratory sessions focus on acquiring basic skills in using GIS software with real world data.

description.zh:
本課程以講授廢棄物之中間處理與最終處置之方法與技術為主,使學生瞭
                                         解廢棄物妥善清除處理之原理,此包括: 1.廢棄物種類與含義2.廢棄物分類
                                         收集與清運3.焚化處理4.固化處理 5.掩埋處置6.特殊處理方法7.廢棄物處理
                                         廠之規劃.
description.en:
To promote the knowledge of principle for students,the course ,Waste Treatment and
                                         Disposal,focuses on middle treatment and final disposal of waste. Contents of the
                                         course include:Definition and classification of waste.Storage and
                                         transportation,Incineration,Fixation,Landfill and Overall planning of treatmrnt plant.

description.zh: 利用化學方法進行地質探勘
description.en: ntroduction to geochemical exploration

description.zh: 1.展頻和錯誤控制碼簡介2.頻率再使用和細胞概念3.無線電傳播環境4.同通道干擾5.涵蓋6.頻譜效率和容量7.通道模型8.分集9.二代細胞式行動通訊標準
description.en: 1.Introduction to spread spectrum communications and error control codes 2.Frequency reuse and cellular concepts 3.Mobile radio propagation environment 4.Co-channel interference 5.Coverage 6.Spectral efficiency and capacity 7.Propagation modeling 8.Diversity 9.2G cellular standards

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養設計與實作軟體定義無線網路的能力。軟體定義網路由控制平面、資料平面與網路功能虛擬化等技術所構成，透過資料平面/控制平面設計，以軟體定義封包傳輸方式。本課程著重於這些軟體定義網路的技術於無線網路的設計，包含應用軟體定義網路在物聯網及 5G 通訊系統。本課程以實習方式利用 OpenFlow 實作控制器及交換器，使學生透過資料平面與控制平面技術的開發，瞭解軟體定義網路對於無線網路的影響。
description.en: This course covers theoretical foundations and applications in the design of software-defined networking (SDN) for wireless network. The outline of this course is given as follows: 1. Introduction of OpenFlow; 2. Data Plane; 3. Control Plane; 4. Network Function Virtualization (NFV); 5. SDN for Internet of Things (IoT); 6. SDN of 5G System.

notes: 電子大四與電子所合開

name.zh: 行動裝置應用程式設計

description.zh: 課程內容包括：1.行動裝置應用程式設計概觀 2.Android SDK 與 Eclipse 開發工具 3.圖形使用者介面 4.多媒體程式設計5.定位及內建感測器程式設計6.資料庫程式設計7.App Store 應用軟體及行銷 8.期末專題製作
description.en: The course content includes: 1. Overview 2. Android SDK and Eclipse Development Tools  3. Graphical User Interface 4. Multimedia Application Design  5. Location and Sensors Application Design 6. Database Application Design 7. App Store and Applications Marketing 8.Final Project

name.zh: 高科技產業專利佈局與專利策略
name.en: Patent Strategy and Patent Portfolio of High Technology Industry

description.zh: 高科技產業的專利攻防已變成產業策略之一，越來越多的訴訟案件逼使廠商進行專利迴避設計。事實上台灣的產業界對於迴避設計、專利策略與專利佈局理論上並不陌生，但在實務上卻很少實際執行，所以每年仍然付出數十億美金的權利金。本課程將從專利申請策略開始，告訴同學專利申請上常見的錯誤，如何以較低的成本取得、維護我國專利，並利用我國專利進行全球專利佈局。
description.en: Patent litigation, either initiation or defense, has become one of the high-tech industrial strategies, and more and more patent suit cases have forced the manufacturers to undertake patent design around. In fact, the industrial fields in Taiwan, theoretically, do not feel strange on design around and patent strategies. However, in practice, they perform much less. That is the reason why Taiwan still has to pay more than five billion US dollars each year for royalty. This course will start from patent filing strategy, getting patent claims well known, then following with introduction on orientation of patent strategies, and providing theory and practice on patent strategies. The outline of this course is given as follows: Patent claim interpretation; Process of patent infringement analysis; Requirements of patent design around; Patent strategy analysis; Practice on patent strategies; and Study on patent cases.

notes: 光電四、光電所、智財所合開

description.zh: 本課程以衣食住行、飲食男女等日常活動、交往、思維為主軸，考察一般人的歷史活動與日常生活在各時期的變化。當歷史不再只是帝王將相的豐功偉業或名流大家的傳奇生活，升斗小民的日常生活看似微不足道，點點滴滴的匯聚而成的正是一個社會的大歷史。
description.en: This course focuses on different aspects of daily activities of ordinary people throughout historical periods trying to explore the development and structure of their culture including clothing, housing, foods, family functions, and transportation. By taking a close look at their interactions, concerns, manners and customs can the students gain an insight into the other side of history far beyond kings and queens, wars and struggles that construct orthodox historical accounts and documents.

description.zh: 從回顧己發展180多年攝影術的藝術歷程,啟笛學子去體悟、不同的年代攝影思潮的轉換及美學價值;並進的實務操練與當代數位科技的應用結合,帶領學子更務實去瞭解及面對,當代攝影美學在後數位時代洪流中,可能的發展面相。
description.en: From the development of 180 years of photography has been the development of the artistic process, Leading students to understand the different era of photographic changes and aesthetic value; and practical practice and the application of contemporary digital technology combined to lead the students more pragmatic to understand and face , Contemporary photographic aesthetics in the post-era era of torrent, the possible development of the facade.

description.zh: 讓學生學習文獻之蒐集方法與整理，以便瞭解學術論文製作方式，培養學生獨立自主探討一個理論或技術上的問題，並經由實驗設計及資料之判讀更深入專業領域。
description.en: A course allows students collect and oranize literature information and them design their own experiments. An independent research capability can be developed through out this learning process.

name.en: New Frontiers of Unit Operation Lab.

description.zh: 本課程目標為傳授學生對於化學程序工程、生化與生醫工程、材料與奈米工程、光電能源與環境相關關產業所需之核心製程技術及實務學能。實務訓練包含1.超臨界流體萃取分離、結晶濃縮、氧化反應、染色技術等；2.現代微生物發酵製程及後續的破菌、分離、純化等；3.真空鍍膜技術，電漿蝕刻技術，化學氣相沈積鍍膜技術以及半導體材料檢測技術等；4. 以超重力旋轉填充床進行氨氮氣提實驗與生質柴油反應製程實驗。
description.en:
The objectives of this course are to provide the professional training in core chemical process engineering, biochemical and biomedical engineering, material and nano-engineering, optical energy and environmental industries.
These courses include: 1. the supercritical fluids extraction, separation, crystallization, oxidation and dyeing technologies. 2. microbial fermentation and the following purification process, including cells breakage and separation. 3. semiconductor sputtering technique, plasma etching, chemical vapor deposition, and characterization tools. 4. ammonia stripping and biodiesel production processes by using rotating packed bed.

name.zh: 軟性電子材料與元件應用
name.en: Soft Electronic Materials and Device applications

description.zh: 本課程目的在於建立學生有關於軟性半導體與元件應用之相關技術與知識，並在學期中讓學生實際動手製備與量測有機半導體元件，以對於有機半導體應用有更深入的認識。課程主題主要(1)有機半導體物理介紹；(2) 有機半導體元件製程與封裝技術；(3)有機發光二極體(OLED)元件應用；(4) 有機場效應電晶體應用；(5)有機太陽能電池；(6)有機記憶體元件應用；(7)有機感測器應用；(8) 奈米碳材元件。
description.en: The goal of this class is to build basic knowledge about organic semiconductors and device applications. Students will also learn how to fabricate organic electronics and have further understanding. The main topics of this class include (1) physics of organic semiconductors; (2) device fabrications and processes; (3) organic light-emitting diodes; (4) organic field-effect transistors; (5) organic solar cells; (6) organic memory; (7) organic sensors; (8) carbon nanomaterial devices.

notes: 化工大三、四及化工所合開

description.zh: 本課程主要在講述工業催化製程開發之基本原則，管理方法，技術突破的執行要領及策略運用，並探討數個工業催化製程開發成功與失敗的實際案例。授課內容從化工產品的生產技術演變特性及組織架構，歷史經驗的分析開始。產品以石化產品為例，論及原料來源的轉變，工廠設備技術的進步。進而講述工業催化製程在工業催化劑功能開發及製程技術革新下，雙管齊下，如何達成工業催化製程開發的目標。
description.en:
This course is designed to introduce the basic principles, management, skills to reach technology break-through, and strategy for the development of industrial catalytic process. Real cases of the success and failure of development of industrial catalytic process in chemical industry will also be reviewed.
 Contents of the lectures will start with the analysis of 
the evolution, the industry structures and historical experience of chemical industrial products.     
 Using petrochemical products as examples, we will discuss the shift of the raw materials, the progress of plant equipments,  and how chemical engineers simultaneously address the developments of improved catalyst and process technology to accomplish the mission of the development of catalytic process in chemical industry.

notes: 化工大三、四及化工所合開,初選人數限制12人

description.zh: 本課程將簡介醫學基礎與臨床知識，並對目前臨床使用之生醫材料作廣泛的介紹，與現今生物科技相結合，激發學生對於基礎研究及臨床科學的創意與思考。涵蓋科別將以牙科、骨科及整型外科為主。
description.en: This course will introduce basic medical and clinical knowledge. Those biomaterials that have been clinically applied will be focused. The aim is to inspire students' innovation and thinking about clinical science, through combining concepts of biotechnology with biomedical knowledge. Dentistry and orthopedics will be the major departments summarized.

notes: 化工大四及化工所合開

description.zh: 為增進本校工程相關科系學生之基礎數學能力，本課程希望在18小時中，能使學生對基礎數學有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習微積分之數學基礎。課程內容包括：1. 數與式、2. 不等式、3. 直角坐標系、4. 直線、5. 圓錐曲線、6. 指數與對數、7. 三角函數、8. 向量。
description.en: With the purpose for improving the comprehension in fundamental mathematics for students who major in Engineering, and for building up solid background of Calculus for students' future training, it is planned to have this course. This 18 hours course aims at developing comprehension of basic mathematics、activating capabilities of Logic、strengthening the abilities of computing with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1. Numbers、Functions and Equations, 2. Inequalities, 3. Rectangular Coordinates, 4. Lines, 5. Quadratic Equations, 6. Exponents and Logarithms, 7. Trigonometric Functions , 8. Vectors.

notes: A班,每週一、四18:30~21:10(開學第二週開始上課)

description.zh: 本課程旨在透過流行文化的閱讀與討論，厚植英語文實力，並深入了解英美當代社會文化現象。課程選材涵蓋通俗文學、電影、音樂、體育、電視、網路等各種流行文化議題，著重修辭分析，文本摘要，以及批判式閱讀技巧的訓練，期能以多元互動的方式深化英語文能力。
description.en: This course aims to enhance students' competence in English through reading popularculture. The reading will cover a wide variety of "texts" in popular literature, film, music, sports, television and on the Net.  Special emphasis will be put on rhetoric analysis, text summarization, and critical comprehension skills such as identifying themain ideas and supporting details, recognizing context clues, drawing inferences and making critical judgments

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

description.zh: 本課程係以提高學生新聞英文閱聽能力為主， 使得學生能廣泛熟悉各類新聞媒介的文章專論. 學生將建立各領域的常用/專用字彙, 了解分析寫作風格與技巧, 並增強聽力能力.  透過日日變化更新的世界時事, 學習英文將是切身相關, 生動活潑的經驗.  除了英語能力提升或知識增長豐富之外, 更可以奠定未來繼續獨立學習的基礎. 教學材料來源取材自China Post, Time, Newsweek, CNN, 民視英語新聞等新聞媒體。
description.en: The aim of this course is to guide students into the world of modern English in a wide range of writing styles and subject matters.  It intends to build up confidence and competence of students who are interested in reading a variety of topics in the newspapers and magazines as well as other media. The first focus is to enrich vocabulary tank by learning key words in realms like business, economic, politics, entertainment, art; the second is to help master the writing skills and styles in journalism; the last is to enhance listening ability via broadcasting materials on audio/video channels like ICRT and CNN.

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

description.zh: 本課主旨在培養學生職場英語文溝通能力，如提案、企劃案提寫、時事討論、公司產品行銷、書信寫作，希冀能夠藉由本課程之修習，加強學生進入職場前的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to provide students with a firm foundation in business communication skills. Students will learn how to present a proposal, start a discussion, and promote company products in English. It is hoped that by the end of this course, students are equipped with sufficient knowledge of general and business English.

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

description.zh: 本課主旨在培養學生職場英語文溝通能力，如提案、企劃案提寫、時事討論、公司產品行銷、書信寫作，希冀能夠藉由本課程之修習，加強學生進入職場前的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to provide students with a firm foundation in business communication skills. Students will learn how to present a proposal, start a discussion, and promote company products in English. It is hoped that by the end of this course, students are equipped with sufficient knowledge of general and business English.

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於培養學生書寫各式專業書信書寫 (如簡歷、提案、會議紀錄等) 的能力，並提供各種共同合作的機會，訓練學生在未來工作上所需之團隊配合能力。搭配本課程充分的練習，學生將能夠準確且有效地運用所學之專業書信形式來達成職場上的溝通需求。
description.en: This course aims to develop students' skills in performing selected types of professional written discourse (e.g., resumes, proposals, meeting minutes). Various opportunities for students to collaborate with their classmates will also be provided as they will often be required to do so in an actual workplace. With sufficient practice, students will finish this class with the ability to communicate clearly and effectively in written forms.

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

description.zh: 本課程的目的在於培養學生書寫各式專業書信書寫 (如簡歷、提案、會議紀錄等) 的能力，並提供各種共同合作的機會，訓練學生在未來工作上所需之團隊配合能力。搭配本課程充分的練習，學生將能夠準確且有效地運用所學之專業書信形式來達成職場上的溝通需求。

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

name.en: Course in English language Proficiency Tests

description.zh: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize the students with various kinds of language proficiency tests such as GEPT, TOEFL, TOEIC and many others to the same end. It is our hope that the students who finish taking the course will go on with their enthusiasm on studying foreign languages; besides, through the acquisition of the certificate when the students pass the tests, they are sure to enhance their capability in the increasingly competitive job markets.

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

name.en: Course in English language Proficiency Tests

description.zh: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize the students with various kinds of language proficiency tests such as GEPT, TOEFL, TOEIC and many others to the same end. It is our hope that the students who finish taking the course will go on with their enthusiasm on studying foreign languages; besides, through the acquisition of the certificate when the students pass the tests, they are sure to enhance their capability in the increasingly competitive job markets.

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

name.en: English Presentation for Academic Purposes & Discussion

description.zh: 本課程旨在講授學術簡報要點、介紹常用句型和字彙，主要加強學生英語口語表達流暢及準確度。透過認識簡報流程與架構提昇學術及工作所需之英文簡報能力。
description.en: A course for students giving oral academic presentations in colleges and universities. Learner outcomes include general academic vocabulary development, listening skill improvement in an academic setting, development of effective note-taking skills, and improved academic discussion and presentation skills. Activities include formal presentations, discussions, and reports.

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫

description.zh: 本課程為每學期建築設計輔助配套課程，目的在協助同學加強必要的設計能力與技巧，並提升專業設計能力。同學也因此得以藉此課程加強自身的建築表現能力，例如表達、繪圖與獲得更進一步的構築知識。
description.en: As a parts and accessories to Architectural Design course, the goal of this seminar is to help students enhance their design proficiency superior to the excellent skill level of design. A student who completes this course will be able to perform a good presentation works such as oral, drawing, construction processing, etc. And will have better understanding in design presentation.

description.zh:
臺灣是位於亞洲太平洋的美麗島嶼，居住著各種族群，原住民族就是其中的一個族群，約有49萬人，佔總人口數的2%。目前經政府認定的原住民族有14族，各族群擁有自己的文化、語言、風俗習慣和社會結構。
原住民是臺灣歷史的重要根源，也在台灣多樣性中扮演重要的角色。透過本課程的講授，希望能讓學生對原住民文化有更進一步的認識和了解。
description.en:
Taiwan is a beautiful island located in the east of the Pacific Ocean. There are various of races living in the island. At present, the aboriginal races that our government has identified are fourteen ones. Every one of them has its own culture, language, customs and social structures.
  The aborigines not only are major sources of Taiwan’s history, but play an important role in the multiple cultures of Taiwan. Via this lesson, the aim is to let students have a deeper understanding in aboriginal culture.

description.zh: 地質工程為一新興科學，原來為解決全球變遷等大尺度問題而提出。基本上可以土木及環境工程兩大方面。本課程將從地質背景出發，結合工程問題及其處理對策，提供學生一個整合性的思考及基礎的地質知能。
description.en: Geoengineering is planetary-scale environmental engineering, particularly engineering aimed at counteracting the undesired side effects of other human activities. Geoengineering covers a wide range of engineering disciplines related to geo-materials, such as foundation engineering, slope engineering, tunnelling, rock engineering, engineering geology and geo-environmental engineering. This course interests range from geological to geomorphological concept, to provide a firm fundamental background for the civil engineering and environmental engineering, and to manage and mitigate of natural hazards. Implicit in these pursuits is the stewardship of the earth, and the quest to harvest the most advanced fruits of scientific achievements as tools for our graduates to work with.

description.zh: 環境生態學主要講述基本生態學之原理原則，進而應用於土木建設工程的方式主要內容包含：(1)環境生態系統、(2)生態學之基本法則、(3)質與能傳遞、(4)汙染物對生態之影響、(5)台灣地區之生態保育、(6)工程開發生態系統造成之影響、(7)環境影響評估、(8)交通及營建工程之環境問題、(9)全球環境變遷、(10)環境品質與法規。
description.en: How to use the national sources in a way to have sustainable development is the main purpose of this study. Improper usage of resources will bring a serious disaster from the natural feed back. Construction should take care of the ecology system and the methods of carefulness would be studied in this course.

description.zh: 由於近年來電腦科技發展迅速，在透過地理資訊系統的幫助下，圖文整合的資料庫型態，已有相當完整成熟的作業方式。本課程將針對地理資訊系統的應用功能方向，分別剖析其主要架構與理論。同時配合相關地理資訊系統軟體，建立學員實作能力。
description.en:
Operational and management issues in planning management analysis,locational decision making,and design implementation of GIS.Lab project emphasizes student's
specialization.

description.zh:
先修課程:4402012或負責教授同意
介紹各種不同方法分析（如能量法及 Castigliano 定理），破壞理論，材料選用，可靠度概念，軸及軸承，離合器及煞車器，傳動元件（如皮帶、鏈條、齒輪），軸聯接器，飛輪，彈簧等。
description.en: Introduction to Analysis Methods (Energy method & Castigliano theorem), Failure Theory, Material Selection, Introduction to Reliability, Shafts and Bearings, Clutches and Brakes, Power Transmission Elements (Belts, Chains, Gears), Couplings, Flywheels, Springs.

name.en: Special Topics on Clean Power System

description.zh: 介紹各種潔淨且高效率的先進車輛動力系統的型式及其工作原理並分析技巧。項目包含車輛能源所面臨的一些問題及可能的解決方案、優良動力源的特性、電動系統、複合電動系統、複合氣動系統、氫燃料電池動力系統、金屬燃料電池動力系統、各種替代性燃料的特性及優缺點、太陽光電輔助動力系統等。
description.en: This course introduces various kinds of clean and high-efficiency vehicular power systems, their operation principles, and analytical skills. Topics include: problems and possible solutions the vehicular power system faces, characteristics of a good vehicular power system, electric power system, hybrid electric power system, hybrid pneumatic power system, fuel cell power system, metallic fuel-cell power system, substitutive fuels, and solar-energy auxiliary power system.

notes: 與車輛所及在職碩班合開

description.zh: 先修課程：無。本實習內容為汽車引擎實習，包含汽油及柴油引擎拆裝，引擎實驗，引擎量測與調整，點火、燃油、冷卻及潤滑系統之檢測及故障排除，定期調諧保養及引擎排氣檢測。
description.en: Automobile Engine Service Shop Practice ,Gasoline & Diesel Engine Assembly, Engine Test, Engine Tune-up and Repair, Trouble-shooting and Instrument Adjustment on: Ignition System, Fuel System, Cooling System, Lubrication System, and Starting System, Routine Engine Tune-Up and Engine Exhaust Emission Check .

description.zh: 先修課程：無。本實習內容為汽車引擎實習，包含汽油及柴油引擎拆裝，引擎實驗，引擎量測與調整，點火、燃油、冷卻及潤滑系統之檢測及故障排除，定期調諧保養及引擎排氣檢測。
description.en: Automobile Engine Service Shop Practice ,Gasoline & Diesel Engine Assembly, Engine Test, Engine Tune-up and Repair, Trouble-shooting and Instrument Adjustment on: Ignition System, Fuel System, Cooling System, Lubrication System, and Starting System, Routine Engine Tune-Up and Engine Exhaust Emission Check .

description.zh:
先修課程：負責教授同意．
肇事之形成因素，重建之定義及過程，數學物理及動力學應用於肇事重建，了解車輛碰撞行為，肇事之理解認知及反應，肇事之動量功能原理應用．車速估算．及轉向過度修正，轎車．機車．行人．及卡車肇事重建．
description.en: Causes & Contributing Factor in traffic accident, Process of Traffic Accidetn Reconstruction, Apply Math. Physics and Dynamics in Traffic Accident Reconstruction., Understanding Vehicle Collision Behavior, Perception & Reaction in Traffic Accident, Principle of Momnetum、 Work and Energy、 Speed Estimates for Vehicle, Steering Over-correction in Traffic Accident, Vehicle-Pedestrian, Motorcycle and Heavy Truck Traffic Accident Reconstruction。

description.zh:
先修課程:4402012或負責教授同意
介紹各種不同方法分析（如能量法及 Castigliano 定理），破壞理論，材料選用，可靠度概念，軸及軸承，離合器及煞車器，傳動元件（如皮帶、鏈條、齒輪），軸聯接器，飛輪，彈簧等。
description.en: Introduction to Analysis Methods (Energy method & Castigliano theorem), Failure Theory, Material Selection, Introduction to Reliability, Shafts and Bearings, Clutches and Brakes, Power Transmission Elements (Belts, Chains, Gears), Couplings, Flywheels, Springs.

description.zh: 先修課程：無。本實習內容為汽車引擎實習，包含汽油及柴油引擎拆裝，引擎實驗，引擎量測與調整，點火、燃油、冷卻及潤滑系統之檢測及故障排除，定期調諧保養及引擎排氣檢測。
description.en: Automobile Engine Service Shop Practice ,Gasoline & Diesel Engine Assembly, Engine Test, Engine Tune-up and Repair, Trouble-shooting and Instrument Adjustment on: Ignition System, Fuel System, Cooling System, Lubrication System, and Starting System, Routine Engine Tune-Up and Engine Exhaust Emission Check .

description.zh: 應用設計手繪工具與技法於各種設計作品圖面呈現，培養學生對空間、形體、材質、介面、裝置、比例等簡潔繪畫技巧與圖示性設計圖表達能力。
description.en: Students will learn to sketch by hand in various tools and technologies on design drawings. The simple painting tips as, spatial perceptive, presentation of form and materials, interfaces media types and installations, and proportion as well as abilities of the infographic design presentation will be taught in this class.

description.zh: 掌握形式從屬機能旨意，熟悉施作技術限制與創意可行性，學習從設計到實作的落實，透過各種機械設備操作、加工技術學習，實際接觸及操作真實材料，了解材料種類、性質、加工過程、組裝知識、技術與美學等，以呈現設計作品之原型與成品。
description.en: Based on “Form follows Function”, student will learn interacts and limitations among technology feasibility and creative application, in order to master sequential implementations form design ideas to real works. Students are required to operate various mechanical equipment and processing technologies, thus to realize the types and nature of the materials, processing procedure, as well as the assembly of knowledge, technologies and aesthetics to format intended design prototypes and establishments.

description.zh:
講授工程圖之基本原理及規則，並佐以必要之工程設計知識與AutoCAD
繪圖技巧,培養學生具備熟練與有效率地將設計構想以工程圖方式正確
表達的能力。
description.en: An introductory course providing the student with fundamental information, understanding and skills mainly in orthographic projection. Theories and principles of engineering drawing will be specifically introduced and concurrent with the practice of drafting for industrial design.

description.zh: 讓學生習得3D 材質編修電腦軟體之技能，俾能將工業設計產品進行材質模擬與色彩計劃。
description.en: The study of materials edit computer software which could apply materials simulation and color plan on industrial design products.

description.zh: 本課程從基礎聲學開始介紹電聲元件的原理，進而講授電聲元件揚聲器及麥克風、電聲元件的類比電路分析法、音箱設計、電聲元件的量測方法以及音箱設計軟體的應用，帶引學生進入電聲學的領域。
description.en: This course first introduces principles of electro-acoustic transducers from fundamental acoustics. Then topics in the lectures including introduction of moving-coil loudspeaker and microphone, analog circuits analysis method for electro- acoustic transducers , loudspeaker enclosure design, measurement test of electro-acoustic transducers and the application of loudspeaker enclosure design software. The aim of this course is to bring students into the field of Electro-Acoustics.

name.zh: 工程監測與非破壞性檢測

description.zh:
本課內容將從最基本的量測觀念,理論,推導主工程實務的應用.例如:
應力與應變的關係,應變計的種類(Foil type以及半導體),應變計的電路及按裝,溫度及非線性效應,LVDT量測原理,荷主儀的製作原理,非破壞性檢測的種類及原理,超音波檢測原理及實例.
description.en: This course will introduce the basic concept and theory of measurement,and engineering application.such as:stress-strain relation. types of strain gange(foil and semicondust),basic circuits.effects of temperature and nonlinearity,theory and applocation of LVDT and load cell.theory of nondestructive testing and its application.

description.zh: 隨著人類對於工程技術的省思，以及環境倫理的變遷，兼顧生態、安全、景觀等面向生態工法逐漸受到重視。我國自2002年起，全力推動生態工法的落實及應用上的困難。有鑑於此，特開立「生態工法概論」，建立全盤性的了解，使土木工程能迎合時代的需求，提升相關智識水準。因此，將分別就基本精神、案例、應用範疇等議題進行探討。
description.en: This is intended as brief introduction to the subject of Ecological Engineering Methods(EEM), which is a whole new concept in the field of civil engineering. The Advantages of EEM is not only to satisfy the demand of safety(i.e. natural hazards control)but also that of protecting ecosystem and landscape aesthetic. In 2002, related government agencies try to pormote the application of EEM , and attempt to adopt this specific measure. However, the lack of basic understanding and knowledge has been the main reason why engineers are struggling in introducing EEM into reality. Therefore, including fundamental theories, cases study, and practical apects of application will be taught in this course. The optimal goal is to inspire students to learn more about new philosopgy and techniques in the world of civil engineering.

description.zh: 隨著台灣農工型態的轉變以及越來越高的生活品質要求,地下水所扮演的角將日益重要,地下水的領域涵蓋水量,水質及防災三方面,修習此一學科,可以了解地下水水文及水力學之基本原理,進而掌握地下水水理與污染傳輸之特性,以作為規劃與管理地下水資源之依據.
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the theory and application of groundwater flow modeling, focusing on MODFLOW. The topic is including numerical methods, discreteness and boundaries, parameterization and calibration, problems and case-histories.

description.zh:
國文，是運用本國語言文字，蘊釀於欣賞文藝作品，充實文化內涵，增進思維能力與人文素養的一門課程。
本課程分為大一上學期2學分，大一下學期2學分。大一上學期的授課內容，以文學名篇為範圍；希望藉此擴建學生深入品味文學趣味的能力，鍛鍊靈活的語文敏感度，默契文學創意，甚而嘗試創作。大一下學期的授課內容，以思想名篇為範圍；希望藉此啟發學生透轍分析各家學說思想，漫步哲人的宇宙天地，跟隨哲人的心路歷程，進而念茲在茲，從容內化，共饗取之不盡用之不竭的先驗與風範。
description.en:
"Chinese" is the course where we make full use of our native languages to enjoy literary works, to enrich our cultural taste, to develop our thinking and even to elevate human cultivation.

This four-credit course is set for the freshman students: with 2 credits in each of the two semesters of the school year. In the first semester, the course covers important articles in literature, in the hope for the student learners to cultivate better ability to taste literary works when they have more vivid sense on the language. With fuller knowledge on what literature is about, they are expected to try creative writings. For the second semester, the course is mainly focused on the writings on thoughts. It is our expectation that throughout the reading and analysis of various great schools of philosophy, the student learners are given the opportunity to explore the huge minds of philosophers, who will thus be imitated and followed. Through the internalization, the students might benefit themse

Through the internalization, the students might benefit themse

description.zh:
透過分析創新成功之實際個案，讓修課同學了解創新的本質。課程中將介紹不同類型的創新個案，包括：技術創新、產品創新、服務創新與管理創新。本課程也擬搭配邀請成功之創業顧問與談，提供實務經驗，分享創業者該有的認知以及創業的重要理念，當然也包括分享他們在邀創業過程中所面臨的各類挑戰。
創業是每個人都曾經懷抱過的夢想，透過創新成功之個案的分析，可以了解到個案公司是如何有步驟的循序漸進。針對每個個案，我們要求每位同學於課前完成個案的閱讀，並於上課前交出本次課程的課前預習心得。我們希望每位參與的同學都能在討論時充分表達意見，遇有不清楚或不同意見時能夠勇於提出他們的看法。本課程擬營造出一種研究的環境，讓學生可以針對個案盡其所能清楚的提出建議並來說服同儕。
description.en:
The course enable participant to realize the essential features of innovation via cases study. Various types of innovation cases are included, such as: technology innovation, service innovation and management innovation. We also plan to invites some successful constants to give participants talk and share their experiences, including the challenge and their resolving process.
The real case study enables participants to understand the entrepreneurship and the steps to start a business. The participants are required to complete the case reading and a preview report is required in advance the class. We hope that every participant can propose their opinion and persuade others colleges of their viewpoints.

notes: 限外籍生修讀；創創向度

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration, 11.Infinite Series.

description.zh: 講授各種電機機械的工作原理及特性，內容包含：磁路分析、變壓器、旋轉電機原理、直流機、多相感應馬達、單相感應馬達、同步機、伺服及步進馬達。
description.en: To teach the principles and characteristics of electrical machinery, this course includes the subjects of analysis of magnetic circuits, transformers, principles of rotating electric machinery, direct-current machines, multiple-phase induction motors, single-phase induction motors, synchronous machines, servo and step motors.

description.zh:
先修課程：數位電路與微處理器

工業自動化基本控制元件的設計觀念、使用方法與應用規劃；內容包含人機介面裝置(Human Machine Interface, HMI)、可程式邏輯控制器(Programmable Logic Controller, PLC)、交流伺服馬達(AC Servo Motor)的原理解說與應用設計實作課程。
description.en:
Pre-requisites：Digital Circuit, Microprocessor

The fundamental design concepts、operations and application development of industrial automation controllers are focused. Architectures and applications design of Human Machine Interface(HMI), Programmable Logic Controller(PLC) and AC Servo Motor are introduced. Hands-on work and exercises are included.

notes: 綜科327、先修機電整合學，限36人

description.zh: 室內設計在3D場景的應用，包括模型的建立，燈光材質的設定以及整體設計之搭配。
description.en: The Application of interior design in 3D scene, including the setting-up of model, establishment of the light material and matching of integrated design.

description.zh: 以國內外設計競賽為主軸，輔導與協助學生積極的參與國內外設計競賽，訓練學生獨立思考與問題解決能力。
description.en: This course aims to focus on domestic and international design competitions, guide and help students ' active, and let students have independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

description.zh: 以國外設計競賽為主軸，輔導與協助學生積極的參與國內外設計競賽，訓練學生獨立思考與問題解決能力。
description.en: This course aims to focus on domestic and international design competitions, guide and help students' active, and let students have independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

description.zh: 課程主要藉由Rhinoceros曲面軟體之泛用性，針對產品外觀造形設計之實務需求、學習正確之曲面軟體建模技巧與觀念、並能應用在其它相關設計領域；幫助學生創意發想與造型創作不設限，並大大縮短產品開發時程並提升工作效率。
description.en:
To be an effective designer today, you need tools to quickly develop your designs and accurately communicate them to everyone in the product research, development, marketing, and manufacturing or construction process.
This course introduces the computer aided modeling design，teach students how to use Rhinoceros software to create accurately and high quality surface model and document your designs ready for rendering, animation, drafting, engineering, analysis, and manufacturing or construction.

description.zh: 泰勒多項式，求根法，數值微分與積分，差分式，誤差分析，矩陣分解，微分方程數值解，數值解軟體應用
description.en: Taylor series, equation solving, numerical differentiation and integration, difference equations, error analysis, matrix equation solving, solving differential equations, numerical code application

description.zh: 無塵室之構成、恆溫恆溼控制、粉塵控制、過濾系統、環境測定、操作管理、針對電子工業之應用。
description.en: Clean room system, temperature and humidity control, particle control, filtering system, testing and measurement, operation and maintenance. This course focuses on the application in the electronic industry.

description.zh: 各種冷凍空調用熱交換器之介紹，熱交換器應用分析，熱交換增強簡介，鰭電分析，熱交換效率分析及熱交換器結垢問題分析。
description.en: Introduction to the heat exchangers used in HVAC & R, application of heat exchangers, heat exchange enhancement analysis, fin analysis, heat exchange efficiency analysis, and discussion on fouling of heat exchangers.

description.zh: 「全民國防教育法」自民國95年2月開始施行，以國際情勢、國防政策、全民國防、防衛動員、國防科技五大主軸作為全民國防教育的課程規畫。「國際情勢」單元，主要論述區域安全與兩岸情勢發展，培育學生宏觀的國際視野；更進一步說明在全球化浪潮下，國際重要的安全議題及我國的因應之道。「國防政策」單元，在論述我國國防政策內涵及大陸政策的發展，使學生認識當前國防政策施政方針，增進國防安全知識；並介紹我國國家安全法制與危機管理機制，藉此體認國家安全的重要性，加強全民國防意識。「全民國防」單元，主要論述國家意識及全民防衛的概念、內涵與重要性，並介紹國防與經濟、文化、心理的關聯，讓學生理解國防事務其實與生活息息相關，加強全民國防意識，增進對國家的認同。「防衛動員」單元，在探討全民防衛動員的意義與功能，說明全民防衛動員對國家安全的重要性；並介紹青年服勤動員內涵，讓學生體會自己在全民防衛動員體系中所扮演的角色，進而涵養愛國意識，深化全民國防共識。「國防科技」單元，主要使學生了解武器系統概況，並認識國防科技發展與我國國防產業現況，引發對國防科技的興趣，進而認同國防、支持國防。
description.en: In order to meet the requirement of Act of All-Out Defense Education that put into action in February 2006, the curriculum of All-Out Defense Education Military Training planned by Ministry of Education is divided into five sections: International Situations, National Defense Policies, Civil Defense, Defense Mobilization, and Military Technology. In International Situations, the object is to cultivate students’ broader international perspectives through discussing Asian-Pacific regional security and the development of cross-strait relation. In Civil Defense, the object is to make students aware that national defense affairs are closely related to their daily life. In Defense Mobilization, the object is to let students recognize their roles in all-out defense mobilization system. In Defense Technology, the main object is to let students overview the development of weapon systems, and understand the current development of the nation’s defense technology and defense industry.

description.en: In order to meet the requirement of Act of All-Out Defense Education that put into action in February 2006, the curriculum of All-Out Defense Education Military Training planned by Ministry of Education is divided into five sections: International Situations, National Defense Policies, Civil Defense, Defense Mobilization, and Military Technology. In International Situations, the object is to cultivate students’ broader international perspectives through discussing Asian-Pacific regional security and the development of cross-strait relation. In Civil Defense, the object is to make students aware that national defense affairs are closely related to their daily life. In Defense Mobilization, the object is to let students recognize their roles in all-out defense mobilization system. In Defense Technology, the main object is to let students overview the development of weapon systems, and understand the current development of the nation’s defense technology and defense industry.

description.en: In order to meet the requirement of Act of All-Out Defense Education that put into action in February 2006, the curriculum of All-Out Defense Education Military Training planned by Ministry of Education is divided into five sections: International Situations, National Defense Policies, Civil Defense, Defense Mobilization, and Military Technology. In International Situations, the object is to cultivate students’ broader international perspectives through discussing Asian-Pacific regional security and the development of cross-strait relation. In Civil Defense, the object is to make students aware that national defense affairs are closely related to their daily life. In Defense Mobilization, the object is to let students recognize their roles in all-out defense mobilization system. In Defense Technology, the main object is to let students overview the development of weapon systems, and understand the current development of the nation’s defense technology and defense industry.

description.en: In order to meet the requirement of Act of All-Out Defense Education that put into action in February 2006, the curriculum of All-Out Defense Education Military Training planned by Ministry of Education is divided into five sections: International Situations, National Defense Policies, Civil Defense, Defense Mobilization, and Military Technology. In International Situations, the object is to cultivate students’ broader international perspectives through discussing Asian-Pacific regional security and the development of cross-strait relation. In Civil Defense, the object is to make students aware that national defense affairs are closely related to their daily life. In Defense Mobilization, the object is to let students recognize their roles in all-out defense mobilization system. In Defense Technology, the main object is to let students overview the development of weapon systems, and understand the current development of the nation’s defense technology and defense industry.

description.en: In order to meet the requirement of Act of All-Out Defense Education that put into action in February 2006, the curriculum of All-Out Defense Education Military Training planned by Ministry of Education is divided into five sections: International Situations, National Defense Policies, Civil Defense, Defense Mobilization, and Military Technology. In International Situations, the object is to cultivate students’ broader international perspectives through discussing Asian-Pacific regional security and the development of cross-strait relation. In Civil Defense, the object is to make students aware that national defense affairs are closely related to their daily life. In Defense Mobilization, the object is to let students recognize their roles in all-out defense mobilization system. In Defense Technology, the main object is to let students overview the development of weapon systems, and understand the current development of the nation’s defense technology and defense industry.

description.zh: 本課程在介紹電資（電機、電子、資訊及光電）領域之課程及基本知識 與技術。課程內容包含: 1.邀請產、官、學、研界人士，對電機與資訊科 學相關議題作演講；2.論文研讀及報告；3.電機、電子、資訊及光電等電 資領域課程簡介；4.電資領域之基本知識與技術介紹與研討；5.校外參觀。
description.en: The goal of this course is to introduce the basic concepts and techniques about the area of electrical engineering and information technologies (electrical engineering, electronic engineering, computer science and information engineering, and electro-optical engineering). The outline of this course includes: 1. to invite speakers from the academia, industry and government to lectures on topics in electrical engineering and information technologies, 2. to read and present technical papers, 3. to introduce the course structures of the area of electrical engineering and information technologies, 4. to study the basic concepts and techniques about the area of electrical engineering and information technologies. 5. off-campus visit activity.

notes: 限資工一學生選(非資工一本班學生不得選)

notes: 107級生電資學院必選課程, 未修過者無法畢業~

description.zh: 本課程介紹軟體開發流程中所需要的關鍵軟體工程技術，包括(1)軟體設計、(2)安全軟體程式開發、(3)軟體品質與測試三大主題。軟體設計內容包括物件導向設計原則則、軟體重構、與設計樣式。安全軟體程式開發包括安全軟體開發生命週期、安全程式設計國際標準、與安全程式撰寫實務。軟體品質與測試包括DevOps軟體開發流程、程式碼版本控制、軟體測試，以及軟體品質保證。課程中特別著重軟體開發技術與實務之練習以及相關開源軟體工具的應用。
description.en: This course introduces the key software engineering techniques and practices that are essential in the software development process, including (1) software design, (2) security software programming, and (3) software quality and testing. Software design mainly includes the object-oriented design principles, refactoring, and design pattern. Security software programming includes the development life cycle of security software, security programming standards, and security programming practices. Software quality and testing includes the DevOps process, version control, software testing, and software quality assurance. The course also focuses on the hands-on exercises and the uses of various open source software tools for applying the software development techniques and practices.

description.zh:
介紹審計準則與查核報告、職業道德、專業責任的保持：查核人員的監管和法律責任、審計證據、審計業務承接、內部控制、資訊科技環境下的審計、審計抽樣的應、查核工作底稿、收入循環、採購支出及付款循環等。
本課程參考最新國際準則公報並依照現行教學及考試方向調整原有架構之外，更針對鑑識審計、公司治理、審計業務承接、查帳和客戶之間的關係、風險評估以及資訊科技環境下的審計等做了更多的著墨，而近更動之審計公報也於本版一併進行更新，以求更符合趨勢。
description.en:
Introduction auditing standards and audit report, maintaining professional ethics, professional responsibility: the regulatory and legal responsibility to check personnel, audit evidence, audit business undertaking, internal control, information technology audit environment, audit sampling should be to check the working papers, income circulation, procurement spending and payment cycle and so on.
The course reference to the latest international standards and adjust the original architecture communique teaching and examination in accordance with current direction, it is more for the forensic audit, corporate governance, auditing business undertaking, under the audit and the relationship between the customer, risk assessment and information technology environment audit done more inked, and audit bulletin of recent changes in this edition also be updated in order to be more consistent with the trend.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹專利檢索及專利地圖的觀念，課程包含以下兩部分：一、為什麼需要進行專利檢索以及如何有效率地找到相關前案，二、如何建構專利地圖及相關資訊的應用。
description.en: This course will introduce the concepts of patent search and patent map, including the followings: 1. Why to do patent search and how to find a prior art efficiently, 2. How to construct a patent map and its applications.

notes: 2週/科法學程與產業接軌合開/0925【停開】

description.zh: 近年來，網路社群迅速發展，電子商務經營已經是每個企業必要的市場競爭與顧客經營中，不可或缺的重要工具。因此，本課程中將以如何設計及管理其中的多媒體內容為課程主要內容。
description.en: The content of this course will teach  how to design the multimedia in the e-commerce.

notes: 工管大二合開/計中電腦教室

name.zh: 雲端應用程式開發與應用

description.zh: 雲端運算所衍生出的商機有軟體服務（SaaS，Soft as Service）、平台服務（PaaS，Platform as Service）、設備服務（IaaS，Infrastructure as Service），相關的架構及服務也不斷地被提出，未來如智慧型手機、智慧家庭、工業4.0及大數據分析等都可以透過雲端運算，發展出更多的應用服務。希望可以透過此課程，能讓學生獲得雲端運算的基礎技術，以及雲端應用程式開發與服務建置。
description.en: This is an introduction course of cloud-based computing. The course is designed principally to provide the Followings topics: 1. fundamentals of cloud technology; and applications, 2. Cloud-based application development 3. Cloud-based platform Introduction

notes: 工管大二合開/計中電腦教室/上課時間12:10-15:00

description.zh: 由於網路的發展迅速，電子商務已經是必然的趨勢。本課程中介紹經營電子商務所需的各種重點技巧，包括產品規劃，通路規劃，商業網站設計、行銷網站建置與管理、網路行銷工具、行銷資訊系統、Google管理工具的應用、關鍵字廣告、商業部落格、電子郵件與會員電子報廣告管理，網路行銷企劃案實務等重要議題，讓同學對經營電子商務有一個整體的了解。
description.en: This course will teach how to management the e-commerce.

notes: 工管大三大四與工管所合開/計中電腦教室

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training. description.zh: 本課程內容包含：線性斷續時間系統，差分方程之解，迴旋合，系統之脈衝響應，連續及斷續時間富利葉轉換，取樣及假像，重建及內插，DFT 與FFT，頻譜估計，z轉換介紹，極點及零點，FIR濾波器設計，IIR 濾波器設計，有限字元長度之問題，及多取樣率信號處理。
description.en: This course covers the following topics: introduction to discrete-time linear systems, review of solutions to difference equations, finding impulse response of a discrete-time system, linear convolution, review of continuous-time and discrete-time Fourier transform, sampling and aliasing, reconstruction and interpolation, DFT and FFT, spectral estimation, introduction to z-transform, poles and zeros, design of FIR filters, design of IIR filters, issues of finite word-length, and introduction to multi-rate signal processing.

notes: 新聘教師，英文授課，四資四、資工所和電資國際班合開

description.zh:
(1)簡介
(2)FPGA系統
(3)FPGA結構
(4)組合邏輯設計
(5)順序機設計
(6)FPGA雛形系統設計
(7)FPGA雛形系統驗證
(8)大型系統設計
description.en:
(1)Introduction
(2)FPGA-Based Systems
(3)FPGA Fabrics
(4)Combinational Logic Design
(5)Sequential Machines Design
(6)FPGA Prototyping Systems Design
(7)FPGA Prototyping Systems Verification
(8)Large-Scale Systems Design

description.zh: 應用快速手繪觀念結合數位技術等工具軟體，使設計作品之發表及簡報方式能達到視覺上更豐富而生動的表達效果。
description.en: Teaching student to use digital software to simulate design proposal for a perfect presentation.

description.zh: 21世紀的工業設計師已不能再靜待市場研究及產品企劃人員提供產品設計規範，而應以使用者代言人、及企業產品開發整合者身分，主動參與產品策略與企劃，並以視覺化技術協助相關人員作橫向溝通。因此，「產品創新設計策略與企劃」課程主要目標在教導學生以「前瞻性的視野」，透過創新設計的步驟與方法，策劃出符合企業技術及經營體質，並且能滿足市場及使用者使用情況需求的產品。本課程將以理論、方法、案例研討及個案研究方式進行。
description.en: The function of industrial design in the 21st century, will no longer waiting for the product definition from the marketing and product planning, It will become a integrator and visualizer during the product innovation strategic phase, and concerning to the user's needs. Product Innovation Strategy will guide the enterprise looking beyond their current operation to match their technologies and the distinct competencies with emerging the user and the market needs. The contents of this topic will include theory, methodology, and practical case study.

notes: 一教101；工設三四與日職創新所合開

name.zh: 創新講座-創意與創新思維(一)

description.zh: 本課程經由邀請產官學界專家蒞校進行講座課程演講及論壇之方式，進行創意與創新思維之實例教學，使學生能儘早瞭解企業創新之模式及相關理論，以啟發學生之創意，促進學術與產業之互動與交流，縮短產學距離。
description.en: This course conducts the instances teaching of creativity and innovate thinking by invite industry, government and academic experts to give lectures and forums. The mine objective is to enable students to understand about the innovation model and related theories of enterprises as soon as possible, and to inspire students’ creativity. Furthermore, promote interaction between academic and industry; and to shorten the distance between academic and industry.

notes: 共同演講廳；工設四與創新所合開

description.zh:
計算機系統之基礎觀念介紹及應用。主要內容包括：1.計算機系統簡介 2 .資料的
表示法、數字系統、邏輯 3.周邊裝置及儲存體 4. 程式語言與程式設計 5.作業系
統 6.檔案與資料庫
description.en:
This introductory course covers the fundamentals and applications of computers,
including, 1.introduction to computer systems, 2.data representation, number systems,
and logic 3.peripherals and storage, 4.programming languages and programming 5.
operating systems 6..Files and database system

description.zh: 為配合課程使學生有實際操作的經驗以獲得完整的知識，實習課程包括：篩析法、碎礦實習、磨機實習、自由沈降實習、安氏吸管粒度測定、重液選礦、濃集實習、薄水層選礦、靜電選礦、磁選、浮選、脫水及乾燥等實習項目。
description.en: The laboratory section of the mineral processing classes are designed to have student obtain hand-on experiences of various mineral processing operations. The lab. includes screening, crushing, grinding operation, settling, size analysis, heavy medium separation, classification, sluicing, electrostatic and magnetic separations, flotation, dewatering and drying.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在於讓學生從設計的角度學習運算思維。透過生活中的案例分析及設計決策一步步引領學生了解運算的邏輯，使學生具備其基礎觀念以及進行創作或程式撰寫之能力。課程內容包括基本運算思維的本質、大數據的思維、演算法設計、數據分析延伸至資訊視覺化的介面設計等等。教學以課堂講授與作業練習為主要方式，並以報告、分組討論與發表為評量依據。
description.en: The aim of this course is to learn the computational thinking from the view point of design. Through the case study from our daily life and decision making, the course will lead students to understand the logic of computing, and make student have the ability to program their own works. The contents involve the introduction of defining computational thinking, big data, algorithmic design, data analysis, and information visualization. The teaching method include lectures, homework, and presentation based on the course assessment of assigned project.

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

name.zh: 新聞英語及聽力訓練（一）

description.zh: 本課程利用新聞教材加強英語字彙能力及聽力技巧, 	內容採用電台、報紙、電視的時事、深度報導和全球議題以增強學生英語知識。同時, 學生亦可獲得各種有用的聽力技巧以加強英語聽力。
description.en: This course is designed to increase vocabulary power and develop listening skills in English through up-to-date news. Current events, in-depth reports as well as global issues from radio, newspapers and T.V are provided to enrich the student's English knowledge. Effective listening skills are reinforced to enhance the student's listening comprehension.

description.zh: 本課程分為兩部分：（1）英文文法觀念的溫故知新，並引導學生將正確的文法觀念運用在閱讀與寫作上，學生可加強基本句型練習、句子改正及句型修正。相關討論包括直述句、引述句、句型變化與修飾;（2）英語修辭法：聽講溝通的有效原理原則。課堂討論主題包括：指稱、一致、倒裝等修辭觀念。修習本課後，學生對出現在相同邏輯意義語境中， 利用不同表達方式以凸顯各種語意的方式與內涵，當有更進一步的體認。
description.en: This course is divided into two parts: (a) The first part is designed for the students to  familiarize themselves with English grammatical framework in relation to reading and writing. A review of grammatical ideas at high level is reinforced by correcting sentence errors, and revising awkward usage of words or sentence structures. The main subjects include English sentence structures, verbal usages, conjunctions, and sequences. Related topics for class discussion cover direct and indirect speech, sentence transformation and modification of sentences; (b) The second half of the course focuses on English rhetoric--principles of effective written and spoken communication. Topics for class discussion include reference, coherence, reverse structures and some related rhetorical concepts. It is hoped that the students will know better the significance brought about by the variations of different expressions that occur in the similar linguistic contexts.

description.zh: 本課程分為兩部分：（1）英文文法觀念的溫故知新，並引導學生將正確的文法觀念運用在閱讀與寫作上，學生可加強基本句型練習、句子改正及句型修正。相關討論包括直述句、引述句、句型變化與修飾;（2）英語修辭法：聽講溝通的有效原理原則。課堂討論主題包括：指稱、一致、倒裝等修辭觀念。修習本課後，學生對出現在相同邏輯意義語境中， 利用不同表達方式以凸顯各種語意的方式與內涵，當有更進一步的體認。
description.en: This course is divided into two parts: (a) The first part is designed for the students to  familiarize themselves with English grammatical framework in relation to reading and writing. A review of grammatical ideas at high level is reinforced by correcting sentence errors, and revising awkward usage of words or sentence structures. The main subjects include English sentence structures, verbal usages, conjunctions, and sequences. Related topics for class discussion cover direct and indirect speech, sentence transformation and modification of sentences; (b) The second half of the course focuses on English rhetoric--principles of effective written and spoken communication. Topics for class discussion include reference, coherence, reverse structures and some related rhetorical concepts. It is hoped that the students will know better the significance brought about by the variations of different expressions that occur in the similar linguistic contexts.

description.zh: 本課程目的在介紹東西方傳統工藝的本質及現代的演進歷程，並配合工藝設計名作介紹，認識當代工藝發展思潮。從講解文化設計美學與工藝鑑賞的理論基礎，幫助學生瞭解文化設計未來發展趨勢，培養對於傳統工藝的鑑賞品味。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to introduce the modern evolution of the traditional crafts in the East and the West, and to introduce the trend of contemporary craft design development. This course explains the theoretical basis of cultural design aesthetics and process appreciation to help students understand the future development trend of cultural design and cultivate the appreciation and taste of traditional crafts.

description.zh: 傳統彩繪是一門貼近生活的民俗工藝，宮廟、佛寺、老宅院皆可看見這門傳統藝術，但國人對此並不熟悉，這些均可以是在地文化，文化創意產業的發源。透過本堂課希望學生能重新認識台灣這門珍貴的民間藝術，也透過實際操作更了解傳統彩繪的作法與精神。
description.en: Traditional painting is a close to life folk crafts, temple temples, Buddhist temples, old houses can see this traditional art, but people are not familiar with this, these can be in the cultural, cultural and creative industries originated. Through this lesson, we hope that students will recognize the precious folk art of Taiwan and understand the practice and spirit of traditional painting through practical operation.

description.zh: 金屬工藝應用是一門以實作應用為主，概念講述為輔的金工課程，透過實際工藝技術進行教學，提供學生具基礎金工器物的製作能力，進而設計應用於生活物件，引導學生具系統性設計及製作能力，轉化概念成實技製作的專業，希望學生藉完成金屬工藝作品，將生活經驗中的價值與意涵融入，創造出屬於個人風格之設計。
description.en: The course ?Metalwork and Design? focuses mainly on practical application, while employing concepts thereof supplementary. The class is taught through demonstration and actual execution of arts and crafts techniques, thus providing students with the basic skills for utensil manufacturing. Followed by designing applicable day-to-day objects, the ultimate goal is to equip students with systematic designing and manufacturing aptitude, hence transmuting concepts into solid expertise. What we desire to achieve is that the students' completed work of art will be a blend of personal significance and practical value derived from everyday experiences.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在促進學生進一步瞭解檔案策展與加值應用之概念與方法，並著重於檔案典藏單位及其所典藏檔案之展示規劃及應用。透過本課程之授課內容，學生可培養以下幾個能力：（1）認識檔案策展之基本概念；（2）理解檔案加值應用之原則與倫理；（3）具備檔案評估、規劃及檔案資料應用之專業素養。
description.en: This course will introduce the basic concepts and practical issues in archives curating and value added. And then, focus on the exhibition planning and application of archives and archival material. By attending the class students will: (1) Understand basic concepts and methods of archives curation. (2) Gain in-deep understanding the principles and ethics of archives value added. (3) Possess the archival intelligence to use, evaluate and curate the archival material.

description.zh: 本課程從全球化觀念來探討品牌在公司經營中所應扮演的策略性角色，課程中以全新研究的品牌理論來探討全球品牌的重要關鍵議題，其中包括全球品牌與公司策略的關係與整合、整合品牌概念、新經濟時代的品牌觀念與全球營運模式、整合品牌的執行與評估。
description.en: This program is designed to help students learn about and apply the concepts and practices of global branding as they are used in a wide variety of settings in product and service firms, consumer and business markets, profits and non-profit organizations, domestic and global companies, and small and large business. Global Branding Management builds on Global branding Strategy, focusing on the major tactics and tools used by international marketers in managing their global marketing plans.

name.zh: 嵌入式智慧影像分析與實境界面
name.en: Embedded Computing Systems for Intelligent Image Analytics and Interactive Systems

description.zh: 本課程主要內容為：1.嵌入式智慧計算系統、2.嵌入式影像處理技術、3.影像辨識技術、4.人工智慧辨識技術、5.實境互動界面技術，並整合實務議題之專案開發。
description.en: The course contents include: 1. Embedded Computing Systems; 2. Embedded image processing techniques; 3. Image recognition techniques; 4. Artificial intelligence techniques for image analytics; 5. AR-based interactive systems; 6. Practical Projects

description.zh: 國內半導體資訊、自動化、化學、精密工業等與日本關係非常密切。日本為世界第二大經濟大國，日文方面科技資料甚多，如能培養學生閱讀科技日文資料，對國內未來科技與工業之發展有莫大助益。本課程內容在於如何收集與閱讀日文方面科技資料，學習時分兩段，基礎篇與應用篇。
description.en: This course has been designed to provide students essential Japanese language ability for reading technical information. The course covers: (1)Basic Japanese grammar (2)Japanese technical phrase(3)Technical terminology: semiconductor, information technology, automation, biotechnolpgy, and polymer chemistry.

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生撰寫結構完整段落和短文之能力, 並著重如何重寫、摘要、 轉述、 陳述、筆記、編排、起草、修改等相關技巧。
description.en: This course is expected to expand students' writing capacity and experience by helping them to formulate, organize, and present ideas clearly in well-formed paragraphs and compositions.  Students will learn about rewriting, outlining, paraphrasing, synthesizing, documenting, note-taking, writing the draft and editing their own work.

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生撰寫結構完整段落和短文之能力, 並著重如何重寫、摘要、 轉述、 陳述、筆記、編排、起草、修改等相關技巧。
description.en: This course is expected to expand students' writing capacity and experience by helping them to formulate, organize, and present ideas clearly in well-formed paragraphs and compositions.  Students will learn about rewriting, outlining, paraphrasing, synthesizing, documenting, note-taking, writing the draft and editing their own work.

description.zh: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力。經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論，與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
description.en: This course is designed to develop oral communication skills at a higher level. Stimulated theme-based scenarios and authentic content will be used to engage students with the purpose of generating lively conversation, and video films. Activities include task-based pair and small-group discussion for maximum practice and personalization.

description.zh: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力。經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論，與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
description.en: This course is designed to develop oral communication skills at a higher level. Stimulated theme-based scenarios and authentic content will be used to engage students with the purpose of generating lively conversation, and video films. Activities include task-based pair and small-group discussion for maximum practice and personalization.

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養各類型段落、短文的撰寫能力，包括描寫、敘述、說明及議論性質文章。
description.en: This course is intended for university-level EFL writing students with the aim of increasing their fluency in English writing. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to write varying types of English paragraphs, for instance, paragraphs of definition and paragraphs focusing on cause and effect relationships. In addition, they will have plenty of opportunities to write various kinds of short English essays, including descriptions, narratives, and argumentative writings.

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養各類型段落、短文的撰寫能力，包括描寫、敘述、說明及議論性質文章。
description.en: This course is intended for university-level EFL writing students with the aim of increasing their fluency in English writing. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to write varying types of English paragraphs, for instance, paragraphs of definition and paragraphs focusing on cause and effect relationships. In addition, they will have plenty of opportunities to write various kinds of short English essays, including descriptions, narratives, and argumentative writings.

description.zh: 本課程旨在訓練學生公開表達之能力，內容包括語言表達基本原則與技巧、肢體語言與演講要領，備題演講及即席演講演練。
description.en: This course is designed to enable students to develop the principles and skills necessary for public speaking. Included will be guidelines for giving a speech and displaying body language, and practices for prepared speech and impromptu speech.

description.zh: 本課程介紹研究方法和論文寫作知識，期能培養學生獨立研究和撰寫學術報告、論文的基本能力。主要分為三部份：（一）研究內涵與步驟,（二）主要的研究方法,（三）如何撰寫英文論文及報告。涵蓋主題包括：運用圖書館資源選擇研究主題、研究計劃的撰寫、問卷調查法、訪問法、觀察法、田野工作研究方法、文獻資料分析法（內容分析法）、個案研究法、相關研究法、實驗法、文學研究法，研究報告論文格式與寫作要領，如何撰寫文獻探討，參考書目寫法等。
description.en: This course aims at providing students with the fundamental knowledge and competence that they will need in doing research and writing research papers.  Its main purpose is to familiarize students with methods, procedures, and techniques that are applicable to quantitative and qualitative research as well as to improve their ability to write research papers.  The main topics for instruction include: the research process; major research methods; and the structure of a research paper.  The research methods primarily studied include the experimental method, descriptive research, ethnography, case study, observation, survey research (questionnaire and interviews), content analysis/documentary analysis, and critical approaches to literature.

description.zh: 本課程著重分析中英文之句型, 語法, 慣用語等表達方式及比較其異同之處,並以密集練習及詳細解說交替, 使學生在兩種語言思考間運用自如。
description.en: This course focuses on the presentation of basic syntax, common expression, sentence structure, and an analytical comparison between the methodologies of English and Chinese translation, accompanied with frequent writing practice on students' part.

description.zh: 本課程著重分析中英文之句型, 語法, 慣用語等表達方式及比較其異同之處,並以密集練習及詳細解說交替, 使學生在兩種語言思考間運用自如。
description.en: This course focuses on the presentation of basic syntax, common expression, sentence structure, and an analytical comparison between the methodologies of English and Chinese translation, accompanied with frequent writing practice on students' part.

description.zh: 本課程旨在強化學生口語表達及溝通能力，開拓知識領域以及培養學生的國際觀。由逐步短句，段落至長途步口譯，循序漸進。從入門訣竅如讀稿技巧，筆記要領密集訓練及模擬演練。範圍涵蓋經貿，金融，時事，科技，產業等。
description.en: This course aims to strengthen students' oral expression and communicative abilities in English, broaden knowledge and international views. The course is designed to train the students gradually by using the techniques of Consecutive Interpretation, which starts from short sentences and paragraphs and leads to longer passages. For example, the techniques in sight translation, note-taking and various simulation drills are intensely practiced in class. It ranges from commercial & trade, banking affairs, current events, technologies and production.

description.zh: 本課程主要著重於讓學生瞭解在日常生活中，食衣住行育樂等活動與化學之相互關係。尤其對在生活中所接觸之食品、衣著、環境與用品應有所認識，並以化學觀點了解其與人體之關係。此課程主要內容包括(1)食品化學(Food Chemistry)，(2)衣著化學 (Cloth Chemistry)，(3)環境化學(Environmental Chemistry)，(4)核化學(Nuclear Chemistry)，(5)水化學 (Hydrochemistry)，(6)界面化學 (Interface Chemistry)，(7)家庭用化學品 (Household Chemicals)，(8)化粧品學(Cosmetic Chemistry)，(9)電化學 (Electrochemistry)
description.en: This course focuses on chemistry related to People`s Livelihood, including: Food Chemistry, Cloth Chemistry, Environmental Chemistry, Nuclear Chemistry, Hydrochemistry, Interface Chemistry, Household Chemicals, Cosmetic Chemistry, and Electrochemistry. Topics concerning about the manufacturing processes, application principles and recent developments of People`s Livelihood chemicals are also discussed in this course.

description.zh: 本課程係以提高學生新聞英文閱聽能力為主， 使得學生能廣泛熟悉各類新聞媒介的文章專論. 學生將建立各領域的常用/專用字彙, 了解分析寫作風格與技巧, 並增強聽力能力.  透過日日變化更新的世界時事, 學習英文將是切身相關, 生動活潑的經驗.  除了英語能力提升或知識增長豐富之外, 更可以奠定未來繼續獨立學習的基礎. 教學材料來源取材自China Post, Time, Newsweek, CNN, 民視英語新聞等新聞媒體。
description.en: The aim of this course is to guide students into the world of modern English in a wide range of writing styles and subject matters.  It intends to build up confidence and competence of students who are interested in reading a variety of topics in the newspapers and magazines as well as other media. The first focus is to enrich vocabulary tank by learning key words in realms like business, economic, politics, entertainment, art; the second is to help master the writing skills and styles in journalism; the last is to enhance listening ability via broadcasting materials on audio/video channels like ICRT and CNN.

class.name: 專業職場英文銜接計畫
