The contents of the course will cover both theory and practice, providing cases and examples related to our daily life so as to help students handle problems when getting along with the opposite sex.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh:
一、教學目標：幫助同學把毛筆字練好，進而培養欣賞能力。
二、其教學內容包含1.鑑賞相關知識。2.名碑帖之認識3.篆刻、裱褙    之簡介4.行書、楷書之臨模與創作5.書論之研讀。
三、評量則以整學期先後習作之比較出情訂定其成績。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to improve students' ability of appreciating Chinese calligraphy as well as the practice of handwriting skill. The contents include: 1. The knowledge of appreciation 2. Introduction of masterpieces. 3. Introductory studies of seal carving and traditional Chinese picture mounting. 4. Chinese calligraphy practice 5.reference materials study. Grading will be based on the improvement of students` works through all semester.

description.zh: 人的身體一接觸自然界，便開始各個器官的功能，人不如機器，無法汰換零件，加上身體機能遇到問題之後，許多人往往不知如何處理應對，甚至身體出現徵兆也渾然不知。所以此科目最主要的目的是希望藉由對醫學的認識，讓大學生們更瞭解自己的身體，進而保護並時時自我偵測身體是否正常運作，要培養健全的大學生，而不是只會讀書的大病貓。
description.en: Once the human body contacts the natural environment, the organs of the body begin to function.  But the human body can not change it's organizational like machine.  So when our body's function is in trouble, we always have no idea how to solve it, either to find out.  One of these course's objection is to let college students understanding their own body by learning some important medical concepts.  We hope that our country both has excellent and healthy college students,  and not all sick.

description.zh: 為建構多元化台灣社會的民主觀念，並拓展台灣政治發展的時間深度，以加強傳統與現代的有機聯繫，本課程擬從以下方向發展：政治生活與社會生活、政治文化與政治社會化、民粹主義與政治生活、公共意見與投票行為、民主憲政與人權保障、司法正義與司法革新、憲政運作與政治發展、政治秩序與政治發展、中國歷代政治得失等。
description.en: To study the time length of the political development of Taiwan and strength of the relationship between the traditional and modern period. Also the establishment of democracy in a multilateral society is to be studied. This class will study the basis of Taiwan society, and explore the following items: political and social life, political culture, socialization, populism. Also included are public opinion and voting orientation, constitution and human rights, the justice and reformation of judiciary, the operation of the constitution and political development, political order and development and an analysis of Chinese politial development.

description.zh: 倫理學(Ethics)是討論「應不應該」的一門哲學分支。倫理學可分為「微觀倫理學」：探討個人性之行為的應不應該的問題，以及「宏觀的倫理學」：探討整個社會的政治、經濟、法律、社會等方面的問題。倫理學亦可區分為「規範倫理學」及「應用倫理學」兩大類，前者探討善的定義與判斷準則、動機論與結果論、人的意志是否自由、決定論與責任、自律與他律、幸福與快樂、哪些德行(virtue)值得追求等等課題，後者則是運用倫理學觀點探討諸如安樂死、墮胎、環保、複製人等種種課題。本課程主要目的是在對倫理學課題與種類作一個基本的介紹，訓練及培養學生在倫理問題上思考的能力，期能讓學生在作道德問題的判斷與抉擇上能夠有所進步。
description.en: This course will introduce basic ideas of Ethics to students. The topics will include: the definition and criterion of good, motivation and consequence, the problem of free will, determinism and responsibility, autonomy and discipline by others, happiness and pleasure, and virtues. This course will also touch upon those issues in applied Ethics, such as abortion, environment, business ethics, death sentence, etc.

name.zh: 勞動影像與當代台灣社會
name.en: Labor Images in Contemporary Taiwan Society

description.zh: 本課程與台北市勞動局合作，以歷年來勞動金像獎獲獎作品以及勞動局推出的勞動紀錄片為主要影像教材，從勞動社會學的觀點出發，對當代台灣社會的勞動相關議題進行介紹。課程涵蓋範圍兼顧理論與實務，除了以影片來進行課程講授與集體討論外，並指導同學以拍攝短片的方式，於學期末呈現他們對於日常生活裡的勞動議題觀察。
description.en: This course is intended to employ the award-winning works of the "Labor Awards" and the "Labor Documentary" launched by the Department of Labor, Taipei City Government over the years to introduce labor-related issues in Taiwan society from the perspectives of labor sociology. In cooperation with the Department of Labor, teaching with film and collective discussion constitute the main methods in this course which covers both the theory and the practice dimensions. In addition, students will be instructed to make a short film to present their observation on labor issues in daily life.

description.zh: 創業與財務概論課程的主要目的是要使學生了解如何在企業創立的時候，透過財務技術，來評估企業的經營績效與價值。本課程將介紹以下內容：(1) 公司創業的財務報表與科目報導與分析 (2) 基本創業財務分析理論 (3) 公司的償債能力、獲利能力、經營能力、資本結構、現金流量的分析 (4) 特殊行業的財務報表分析 (5) 探討我國最近發佈的會計準則公報對企業與投資人的影響。
description.en: The goal of the introduction to entrepreneurship and finance course is to help students, when the company is in the stage of entrepreneurship, evaluate the performance and measure the values of firms by financial statements. The topics of this course includes (1) entrepreneurship financial reports and analysis; (2) basic entrepreneurship financial statement analysis; 3) solvency, profitability, business performance, financial structure and cash flow analysis; 4) financial statement analysis of special industries 5) recent developments of GAAP.

description.zh: 本課程以理論及個案為出發點，分析知識管理的基本概念知識管理在實務上的應用，知識管理在策略上的重要性，以及企業如何進行知識管理。課程主題包括，組織學習，組織創新，市場導向理論，知識管理概論，知識創造與轉移，知識管理個案，知識管理與資訊技術。
description.en: This course will use case study to analysis how knowledge management impacts on the competitive advantage and its method of implementation.  It will include the followings: organizational learning, innovation, market-orientation, knowledge creation, knowledge transferring, knowledge diffusuoion, and information techunology impact on knowledge management.

description.zh: 本課程主要在從人生內在活動面向使學生明瞭宗教與人生的關係。首先探究人生的意義與特性，次則經由對宗教哲學，比較宗教學與宗教現象學的瞭解，來分析人生的問題。內容特別強調文化對人生的影響，宗教乃是深層文化原則所繫，同時人生問題也能引發宗教的適應與發展等等。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to approach of " Action Immanent ", enabling students to realize the relation of religions and life. First, to study the issues on the meaning and characteristics of life. Second,through the understanding of "Philosophy of Religion "、" Comparative Religion " and "Phenomenology of Religion ", to analyze the problems of life. Emphasis is on culture and the influence of life, as religion is a foundation supporting culture where problems of life can stimulate the adaptation and development of religion.

name.en: The Cultural History of Chinese Medicine

description.zh: 本課程結合考古發現、出土文物、傳世圖書及近人研究，討論中國這塊地域自有文字出現以來的醫療文化變遷。經由本課程學生可以瞭解傳統中國社的醫療知識和社會、文化與政治間的可能關係。
description.en: The contents of this course include archaeological discoveries, unearthed artifacts, written documents and recent literature, and focuses on the medical and cultural changes in Chinese history. Students who take this course will be able to comprehend the medical knowledge as well as the interrelations among social, cultural and political dimensions in traditional China.

description.zh: 現代人的健康問題50％以上導因於生活型態與行為模式，傳統以疾病治療為主的醫療模式已無法因應目前民眾的健康需求，健康促進、危急救護等觀念正被廣泛應用，本課程內容包含三大部分，包括「健康及其影響因素」、「健康促進相關議題」、「安全教育與急救」，藉由系統性健康教育與資訊傳播，使學生能習得正確健康知能及技能，幫助學生建立健康行為模式，使其健康能獲得更好的自我控制。
description.en: More than 50% of modern men’s health problems attributes from living style and behavior. The tradition way for curing illness has failed to fulfill people’s requirements. Conceptions such as health promoting and emergencies dealing are now being wildly used. This course mainly focuses on three issues, including “health and its affected cause,” “related issues on health promotion”, and “safety education and emergency treatment.” Through systematical health education and information spreading, students acquire the correct health knowledge and skills, to help students lead a healthy life and to get a better self-control on own health.

description.zh: 二十一世紀是中國人的世紀，全球最多的人口，第三大的土地，與台灣如此的近，政治、經濟、軍事、文化發展對台灣均有一定的影響。統一？台獨？無論如何，身為今日在台灣的知識份子，應對它有所瞭解。課程內容包括：中國共產黨的建立與發展、政制體制、教育科學文化發展、經濟展望、國防軍事建設、兩岸關係等。
description.en: This course is designed lets our students have a comprehensive understanding of the Mainland China. Introduced the developing history of Chinese Communism Party ; the organization of political ; the status of economics ; the development of science &　eductaion;the military construction; the policy of one country two systems;and the relationship of two - sides of straits ---。

description.zh: 人類社會中的經濟活動愈來愈錯綜，人與人之間的經濟關係也愈來愈複雜，但無非都是為求經濟問題的解決。如何將有限的資源在諸多可行的途徑中，選擇最有利、最能發揮滿足人們慾望的效果，乃是身為「經濟人」的萬物之靈所努力的目標。本課程提供學習者分析經濟現象的工具，掌握經濟發展的脈動，以便在現代經濟社會中立於不敗之地。
description.en: In human society economic activity is getting more and more complicated and economic relationship between people is also getting more and more complicated but all are to seek for the solution of economic problems. Among a number feasible ways how to choose the best way that can make best use of limited resources to satisfy people's desire shall be the goal for human being as "economic persons" making effort to fulfill. The course enables students to learn the tools for the analysis of economic situation, the way of grasping the wave of economic development in Taiwan so as to win in the modern economic society.

description.zh: 本課程教學目標係為激發學生對戲劇的興趣，提高其鑑賞能力，豐富生活內涵，增進學生對各類劇場的認識，使其具備戲劇基本知識，擴充對藝術的認知，開發學生戲劇創作之潛能，讓學生實際參與劇場實務，學習團體合作之機會，發揮其個人表現力及創造力。授課內容：1.認識戲劇 2.認識當代劇場 3.中國劇場 4.世界劇場介紹 5.實務操作。
description.en: This course aims at fostering students' interest in drama, developing their appreciation and understanding of drama, enriching their lives, increasing their knowledge about various kinds of plays, expanding their knowledge about drama as a performing art, exploring their potential for drama production, involving them with practices concerning theater performance, providing them with cooperation opportunities, and developing their individual creative and artistic expression abilities.  This course focuses on the following topics: (1) introduction to drama; (2) introduction to modern theater; (3) Chinese theater; (4) introduction to world theater; (5) practices in theatrical performance.

description.zh:
通識教育之核心精神為「博雅」，其中「博」指的是知識廣度。
是以建構多元認知及探討，正是拓展知識廣度的重要方法。
本講座課程係以「單一主題」統領「多面知識」的方式進行授課。課程領域為社會科學，由六至八個相關單元組成，不同專家學者授課。除課堂授課外，得實行「實地體驗教學」，安排參觀與實習。
description.en: "Erudition & Refinement" is among the most essential in the field of General Education. "Erudition" refers to the width of knowledge-also a very important approach in enriching human experience by building multi-dimensional recognition of culture. The Lecture focuses on a "single theme" through the teaching/learning of "a diversity of knowledge. The course areas cover social science. The lecture will consist of six to eight units, which will be taught by different experts and scholars. In addition to the classroom teaching, there may also be "Experiencing Teaching On the Spot"-or rather, a visit to the location in question or practicum.

name.en: The History of Daily Life in Pre-Modern China

description.zh: 本課程透過專題的演講、史料的研讀與討論，探究中國古代庶民的生活特色，並培養學生閱讀與分析史料的能力。
description.en: This course aims at exploring the history of daily life of intellectuals in pre-modern China. Lectures focus on selective important aspects of socio-cultural life. Students are required to do reading and discussing in class.

description.zh: 人類社會中的經濟活動愈來愈錯綜，人與人之間的經濟關係也愈來愈複雜，但無非都是為求經濟問題的解決。如何將有限的資源在諸多可行的途徑中，選擇最有利、最能發揮滿足人們慾望的效果，乃是身為「經濟人」的萬物之靈所努力的目標。本課程提供學習者分析經濟現象的工具，掌握經濟發展的脈動，以便在現代經濟社會中立於不敗之地。
description.en: In human society economic activity is getting more and more complicated and economic relationship between people is also getting more and more complicated but all are to seek for the solution of economic problems. Among a number feasible ways how to choose the best way that can make best use of limited resources to satisfy people's desire shall be the goal for human being as "economic persons" making effort to fulfill. The course enables students to learn the tools for the analysis of economic situation, the way of grasping the wave of economic development in Taiwan so as to win in the modern economic society.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh:
使同學具備良好的造形能力，對於今後從事各類型之設計、繪製圖表等均有幫助。教學內容包括筆法及明度練習，室內靜物寫生，室外樹木、建築物之寫生。
教學方法：先練習運用鉛筆，使其表現各種筆觸、輕重，再要求造形之準確度，達到形態和質感的表現正確，以及構圖有美感的能力。先由老師示範，而後同學練習
description.en:
Equip students with the ability of styling so that their designing and drawing ability can be improved. 
The teaching material used for this class includes stroke and chiaroscuro, drawing of still life, and nature painting outside. Teaching method: Practice how to use a pencil for the demonstrating various touches in light and heavy strokes.  Students shall learn how to perform  precise styling,  correct expression of formation and personality, and a beautiful configuration. The instructor will give a demonstration first and then students shall follow and learn.

description.zh: 本課程教學目標係為激發學生對戲劇的興趣，提高其鑑賞能力，豐富生活內涵，增進學生對各類劇場的認識，使其具備戲劇基本知識，擴充對藝術的認知，開發學生戲劇創作之潛能，讓學生實際參與劇場實務，學習團體合作之機會，發揮其個人表現力及創造力。授課內容：1.認識戲劇 2.認識當代劇場 3.中國劇場 4.世界劇場介紹 5.實務操作。
description.en: This course aims at fostering students' interest in drama, developing their appreciation and understanding of drama, enriching their lives, increasing their knowledge about various kinds of plays, expanding their knowledge about drama as a performing art, exploring their potential for drama production, involving them with practices concerning theater performance, providing them with cooperation opportunities, and developing their individual creative and artistic expression abilities.  This course focuses on the following topics: (1) introduction to drama; (2) introduction to modern theater; (3) Chinese theater; (4) introduction to world theater; (5) practices in theatrical performance.

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹世界上最新的光電科技發展及在台灣的相關光電產業。時間上規劃以第一小時介紹基本光電理論，第二小時介紹應用技術與實例。課程內容包括：1.雷射光與原理與應用， 2.雷射光與精密量測， 3.雷射光與機械人， 4.光電技術與半導體製造， 5.光資訊與光儲存， 6.光纖通訊系統， 7.紅外系統， 8.紫外線系統， 9. 雷射醫學應用， 10雷射光與國防， 11.光學設計與光學設計軟體， 12 光電科技與未來。
description.en: The course gives the outlook of the technology of Opto-electronics and the industry of Opto-electronics in Taiwan. The contents of this course are constructed as following：1. The principles and applications of Laser, 2. Laser and precise measurements, 3. Laser and robot, 4. Opto-electronics technology and semiconductor magnification, 5. Optical information and Optical storage 6. Optical fiber communication, 7. Infrared system, 8. Ultraviolet system, 9. Medical applications of laser, 10. Laser and defense 11. Optical design and software. 12. Opto-electronics and future.

description.zh: 勞動法包括與勞動市場、個別勞動關係及集體勞動關係等方面有關勞工工作權益的法律規範，透過本課程可以學習正確的勞動法律觀念和知識，同時培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，來保障並維護自己或他人的職場權益。
description.en: The legal specialty called Labor Law can be define as “the legal regulation of the labor market , individual labor relations and collective employer-employee relations. “labor market” pertains to market in which employers and workers exchange labor . Through this course , students can not only get correct concepts of " Labor Law " , but learn to protect their / others' rights in work place.

description.zh: 人類從尚未有文字的歷史以來，就有各種不同規模的戰爭，戰爭很吊詭的以你死或我亡，相互毀滅之態勢，爭奪「活著」的條件。古今中外，爆發戰爭的因素或為爭奪領土、權位、或為族群之戰、為意識形態之戰、或為物質資源之爭奪。在視覺影像發達的今日社會，有關戰爭的歷史影像的紀錄片與劇情片數量龐大、並有許多可觀之處。本課程將利用這些描寫戰爭影像資料，帶領同學瞭解相關戰爭與戰役爆發的歷史及其經過。
description.en: Throughout human history, even prior to written record, various types of warfare and scales of battles have existed for various purposes of domination or survival by all means of cruelty and destruction. The arousal of violent conflicts might be an attempt at fighting for territorial dominion or material resources economically or altering another species ideologically. In today's modern societies, bountiful documentaries and films concerning historical warfare have been accumulated. This course will aim at giving students a broad understanding and profound knowledge of the causes, process, and effects of significant warfare in human history with the aid of visual images in different media.

name.zh: 創業之品牌管理與行銷
name.en: The Brand Management and Marketing of Entrepreneurship

description.zh: 創業者在新創事業時，同時須考慮新創事業之品牌建構，如果能在創業之初建構一個定位明確的品牌，可使新創事業立即享有良好的品牌權益，提高創業成功的機會。品牌建構完成後，須設計行銷方案，對消費者進行行銷活動，向消費者推銷新創公司之品牌，以塑造良好的品牌權益。此時，消費者對新創公司之品牌會有良好形象之認知，進而提升顧客對新創公司品牌忠誠度，增加創業者創業成功之機會。
description.en:
When entrepreneurs are building a startup company, they also need to consider its brand building. If they can construct a clear positioning of the brand in the beginning, they are able to have their new business with a better brand equity immediately, and improve entrepreneurial chances of success.
After the completion of construction of the brand, entrepreneurs need to design marketing programs for consumer marketing activities, and promote its brand to create good brand equity. In the meantime, consumers will have a better brand awareness of these new companies, enhancing customer loyalty and increasing opportunities for entrepreneurs’ entrepreneurial success.

name.en: The Romance of Three Kingdoms and The Chinese Culture

description.zh: 本課程之設計係針對非歷史系學生研習之用。基本上，以眾所熟知的歷史小說《三國演義》為主軸，來探討中國文化的發展過程中，其在歷史上所扮演角色地位。在文化精神上，它結合了儒、墨、道、法、縱橫家的智慧結晶，開創了新時代的思維視野，對映著儒家文化的另股反思力量，擴展了豐富的文化精神，具有著人生啟示作用。準此，來充實學生文化素養，課程方面包括《三國演義》的文化心理結構，倫理觀，儒、墨、道、法、縱橫家的政治思想，與人物形象之塑造等，藉以幫助學生清晰地認識《三國演義》文化精神在中國文化內涵中之特色。再授課方面，以師生共同討論為主，書面報告為輔，期使學生在短時間內認識《三國演義》的時代精神，並對日後生活有所助益。
description.en:
This course is designed for non-history majors. It is chiefly intended to interpret the role and significance of the historical fiction The Romance of the Three kingdoms in the development of the Chinese culture.
In the spiritual aspect, The Romance of the Three kingdoms demonstrated the intellectual essence of Confucianism, Mohism,Taoism, the legalist school, and the political strategist school of ancient China. It also innovates new visions and new horizons in the traditional Confucian milieu, thus enriching the spirituality of the Chinese culture. The course includes the following topics of The Romance of the Three kingdoms ：the cultural psychological structure, the ethic view, the political views of Confucianism, Mohism, Taoism, the legalist school, and the political strategist school, the characterization, etc. The class activities include lectures and discussions; students are also expected to submit written reports.

description.zh: 介紹台灣地區近五百年以來之開發與變遷，其中歷經西班牙人、荷蘭人、明鄭、滿清以及日本等不同階段之治理，可就政治、經濟、社會、教育及文化等問題分別予以探討，特別是對中華民國政府遷台後之重大建設予以詳細論述，以便對整體台灣歷史之發展得有清晰之認識。
description.en: The course is to introduce the development and evolution of the Taiwan region in the past 500 years. The various stages of the reign by Hollanders, Spaniards, Cheng Ch'eng-kung, Manchurians, and Japanese will be discussed in relation to their politics, economics, social structures, educational systems, and cultural phenomena. The main focus is on the major construction under the reign of the Republic of China.

description.zh:
本課程首先說明人在宇宙中的定位、生命的可貴、一生的方向；接著說明如何鍛鍊自己成為生命的勇士；最後強調如何與天地萬物和諧相處和真愛的永不止息。
課程進行方式是透過體驗活動、交流分享和有次第的講授人類共同的智慧，並安排數次的校外教學，以深入瞭解社會脈動，並運用多媒體影片教學以提升學習效果，學生每天做身心觀察學習紀錄，更可以看到生命進步的軌跡。
description.en:
This course covers topics such as: the role of human beings in the universe, the dearness of life and the pursuit of life-long goals. We then discuss ways to train the students to become brave and to harmonize human beings with the nature, leading to an access to the discovery of true love.
The course is realized through activity involvement, experience sharing and lectures on human wisdom. We have some extramural visits in order to understand social pulses. Multimedia teaching materials are fully utilized to enhance the teaching and learning effects. We request that all the students take note of their mental and physical improvements on a daily basis so that they could examine the progressive path of life.

description.zh: 創業者通常無經營企業之經驗，多數創業者在擁有很好的產品時創業，同時必須要能規劃出商業經營模式、經營規模、經營團隊、行銷策略、損益兩平點、現金流量、預期投資報酬率、資金需求、可能風險等事項，才能評估創業成功機率，設定創業經營的停損點，創業者才能提高創業的成功率。對於理工科系人員，而具有優良技術能力，且有志於創業者，本課程為增強上述人才創業素養的重要課程之一。
description.en: Entrepreneurs often do not have enterprises experience. Most of entrepreneurs start their business with very good products, at the same time, they must be able to plan out the business model, business scale, management team, marketing strategy, break-even point, cash flows, expected investment rate of return, capital requirements, possible risks and other matters, in order to estimate the probability of success and set a stop-loss point. Then entrepreneurs are more possible to succeed in their enterprise. For science and engineering personnel with excellent technical ability who want to become entrepreneurs, this course is one of the important courses to enhance the abilities for enterprise.

description.zh: 藥膳在中醫理論指導下，將中草藥與實務相配合，運用傳統烹調技術和現代加工方法製成味、色、形俱佳的、更有保健和治療作用作之食品，其內容廣泛，迄今已有三千年之歷史。所謂藥食同源更是集中而深刻的體現了藥膳之重要性。本課程共分：湯膳概論、穀物湯膳、蔬菜湯膳、果品湯膳、畜肉湯膳、海鮮湯膳、藥草湯膳和美容養生湯膳等。
description.en: The Applied Nutrition of Life is two credit hours course and design especially for technology students. This curriculum emphasizes on the clinical applications and action mechanisms of various food cooking of Chinese drugs. The curriculum trends will start from more details and bring a completely concepts. The subjects include some Chinese food cooking contain Chinese herbal and some skill to how to select a good quality Chinese herbal.

description.zh: 介紹台灣地區近五百年以來之開發與變遷，其中歷經西班牙人、荷蘭人、明鄭、滿清以及日本等不同階段之治理，可就政治、經濟、社會、教育及文化等問題分別予以探討，特別是對中華民國政府遷台後之重大建設予以詳細論述，以便對整體台灣歷史之發展得有清晰之認識。
description.en: The course is to introduce the development and evolution of the Taiwan region in the past 500 years. The various stages of the reign by Hollanders, Spaniards, Cheng Ch'eng-kung, Manchurians, and Japanese will be discussed in relation to their politics, economics, social structures, educational systems, and cultural phenomena. The main focus is on the major construction under the reign of the Republic of China.

description.zh:
植物與人類生活息息相關，人類選擇植物加以栽培生產，用來提供食、衣、行、及健康所需，而農耕的發達則與人類文化及社會的演變互相影響。本課程將由各種不同角度介紹，包括植物特性、栽培管理技術、自然環境、地理、人文、社會、政治、經濟等方面，與植物生產
的關係。主旨希望同學能了解人類與植物間相依相存的關係，並進一步關懷人類、植物、與自然環境之間的相處之道。
description.en: Plants supply major food for all kinds of living organisms.  This lecture is prepared to introduce the relationship between the crop plant and modern food  production.  The whole spectrum will be viewed from the aspect of the chacteristics of platns, the nature environment, science, human civilization, society, politics and economics, etc..  Hope students can concern and respect the mutuality between plants and human.

description.zh: 近百年是台灣政治、社會、經濟、文化劇烈變動的時代。從清季西洋勢力的大舉進入，清廷推動自強新政以應變；爾後台灣淪入殖民統治，在近代化及同化政策下台灣的變革更為迅速；而從台灣光復迄今，不論是經濟發展、政治民主、教育普及等等，使台灣進入已開發國家之林。這些變革與發展，是台灣民眾集體努力的總成績，但其間也有許多引領風騷的人物，他們分佈於各個不同的領域，歷史家對他們的評價或正或負，成就與貢獻的多寡也有爭議，不過透過這些人物事蹟的探討，可了解個人與群體、時代、環境的互動關係，也更能掌握近百年台灣史發展的脈絡。
description.en: Never has Taiwan experienced so big changes in politics, social structures, economics and cultural movements as in the last century. In Ching Dynasty, the Westernized power entered and the Ching court initiated innovative campaigns to work against; then Taiwan under the colonial rule by Japan, modernization  and colonialism changes Taiwan a lot ; in past half century KMT's rule has advanced such great deal in the fields of economic development, democracy and education as to stand among the developed countries. Though it is the collective efforts of the Taiwanese people that contribute to the alteration and development, there exist some of the outstanding figures in various fields, who might receive positive as well as negative comments from the historians and who might initiate a controversy concerning their contribution. This course explores the most influential individuals and the events that happen around, in the hope to understand the interaction between each of them and the groups

description.zh: 面對日益複雜的社會現象與社會組織，生活規範已由傳統的道德習俗，逐漸代之以法律倫理，生活在現代化的社會，有必要從認知法理、遵守法律，進而要求落實法治。俾政府施政依法而治，社會倫理得以重建，個人權益亦獲得確實的保障。本課程兼顧理論與實例的探討，包括法律的理念與概念、法律與社會生活各層面的關聯性、現行法體制的基本認識、法治生活的檢視與展望。
description.en: Facing increasingly complicated social phenomena and organization, norms of life are governed by laws instead of traditional moral customs. Living in modern society, it is necessary to have a better understanding of the law, so that people will abide by the law and further thoroughly implement the legal system to ensure that the government administration may be performed in accordance with the law. In this way, social ethic may be re-established and individual's benefit may be protected. The discussion in the course covers theory and examples, including the concept of the law, law and politic, law and society, law and life, etc.

description.zh: 婚姻是一般人所必經的過程，家庭是生活的場所，關係著人生的幸福與美滿。本課程強調美滿婚姻與幸福家庭是一門學問，因此，課程內容包括：對婚姻與家庭有正確的認知、積極的態度、完整的規劃，並培養有認真努力去實踐的方法與能力。如何追求真正的快樂與幸福？除了在婚姻與家庭中追求平等化、合理化、自由化、公平化外，自我成長、相互尊重都是本課程的學習目標，以協助學生思考婚姻與家庭的終生大事。
description.en: Marriage is a process that most people will go through.  Family is where you belong to, and where the satisfaction and happiness come from. We believe that it is a kind of scholarship to have a high-quality marriage and a wonderful family.  The contents of this course include having the correct understanding of marriage and family, cultivating positive attitude, developing complete plans, and realizing them with all efforts. This course will help students think totally about marriage and family, learn to pursue equality, reasonableness and liberty, keep growing and respect each other, so that we can obtain the real delight and happiness.

description.zh:
本課程講授媒體、企業與政治三者之間競合的互動關係，教你看透媒體新聞背後的意識形態、商業利益與政治操作。深入瞭解由傳統紙媒到當代電子媒體、網路媒體、各種新媒體通路中，大數據與內容的製作該如何結合運用。新聞媒體在企業與政治體系中的特殊角色與效應也是探討焦點。課程中將會針對海峽兩岸新聞媒體與綜藝節目製作做對比分析。
    本課程結合理論與實務導向的專題，以培養學生對當代傳播媒體現象與體制深入分析探究的能力;更引導學生具體認識在數位新媒體的時代中，如何利用新媒體來進行廣告、行銷、公關等實務操作的策略及步驟。
description.en:
This course focuses on the interactive relationship between media, business, and politics, thereby helping students understand the political ideology, business interests, and political manipulation behind news and media events. The course also presents an in-depth analysis of the combination of big data and media content, in the complex production network of paper media, electronic media, internet media, and various other new media. The role and effects of news media in contemporary business and political establishments will also be explored. The course brings in a comparative and critical analysis of news and entertainment programming in both Taiwan and mainland China. 
This course combines theoretical framework and professional practice in order to cultivate the ability to intelligently analyze and explore the dynamics of various media phenomena and media institutions. The students will also be expected to learn the basic concepts of practical strategies and operating skills of new

description.zh: 「社會心理學」主要探討的重點在於日常生活，社會刺激以及情境如何影響個人行為，它需要經過科學的方法進行研究，藉以預測一個人在某種情境下，可能會出現哪些行為。其涉及的學科相當廣泛，除了一般心理學的理論之外，尚包含社會科學哲學、文化人類學、倫理學、環境心理學、團體動力學等相關論述。課程強調理論與實務結合，提升學生參與社會的知能。
description.en: Social Psychology is focus on social stimuli and how situations affect individual behavior everyday life. In order to predict a person’s behavior in a situation, we need to research by scientific methods.  It covers a wide range of professional areas, not only the theories of social psychology but also philosophy of social science, cultural anthropology, ethics, environmental psychology, group dynamics. This course emphasizes the combination of theory and practice to enhance students’ abilities to participate in society.

description.zh:
透過點子激發、設計思考、Hook Model 的學習、假設驗證的過程以及 Business Model Canvas 等方法，學會如何驗證與思索創業計畫，進而撰寫簡潔而有效的創業計畫書。
當今時代有許多創業發想，均花費許多時間在撰寫創業計劃書，然而最近的矽谷創業圈已經不再流行一本又一本的創業計劃書（Business Plan / Business Proposal），更重要的其實是如何透過假設的驗證、市場的調查（或理解），以及仔細的規劃設計一個有效的創業計畫，比創業計劃書的撰寫更重要。
如同奇點大學所教導 – 如果能改變十億人，那麼必能產生十億元的價值。反之，如果要能產生價值十億的「創業計劃書」，必要先能產生價值十億的「創業計畫」。「書/寫」乃是本門課程的附屬建物，實體建築乃有效「創業計畫」之生成、驗證是也乎。
description.en: A good business plan is build upon a good innovative idea and a good storytelling first; then it will also need certain reasonable structure that can be well understand and clearly present the business idea and its roll out plan. That’s the spirit of BP (Business Plan / Business Proposal). In this course, we will NOT focus on the representation of BP, but focus on the business idea/plan itself.

description.zh: 音樂概論以透過此課程讓學生對音樂有總體認識，了解音樂的元素、技術理論及文化背景，同時在探索音樂美感構成上的標準，我們可以從探索不同歷史時期的人文思想背景，了解對於當時音樂創作理念與風格發展的影響，以及音樂審美觀念的發展演變之影響，立基於探索音樂的發展方向、藝術本質及審美意涵，對音樂藝術概念及美學思想之延伸探討。
description.en: Through this course—Introduction to Music, students would have a general understanding of music, understand the elements of music, technical theory and cultural background, at the same time in the music aesthetic to explore the composition of the standard, through exploring the different historical periods of humanistic background, to understand for the time that the idea of music composing and the impact of musical style development, as well as the development of music aesthetic concept of the evolution of the impact, based on discussing the development of music, the essence of art, and aesthetic meaning, to develop the concept of musical art, as well as a probe into the extension of aesthetic thought.

notes: 限外籍生修讀；美學向度

name.en: The History and Culture of Taiwan

description.zh: 台灣位處東南亞與東北亞島弧的中介點，是亞洲大陸與太平洋的接點，因此，歷來有許多不同族群移居，因而形成多彩多樣的多元價值觀並容兼蓄的文化觀。本課程將論述介紹台灣南島文化、荷西殖民時期的基督教、漢人文化、日本文化和近代文明等在台灣社會產生的影響。
description.en: The island of Taiwan is located in the middle of the island arc of Southeastern and Northeastern Asia. Further, it is the intersection of the Asian continent and the Pacific Ocean. Since many different ethnic groups have migrated in together, a multi-dimensional view of value-colorful in itself has thus been formed. This course will make a first-step introduction and discussion on the impact over the Taiwan society processed by the cultural mix of the Austronesians, the Christianity under the occupation of the Netherlands and Spain, the Hans, the Japanese and the modern civilization.

notes: 限外籍生修讀；文史向度

name.zh: 國際貿易實務與關務解析(一)
name.en: Application of international trade and customs declaration resolution I

description.zh:
目的：協助同學通過我國「關務特考」、「報關專責人員特考」、「國際貿易大會考認證考試」等國家考試中「國際貿易」之相關考科。
內容：解析國內國家考試「關務實務」之命題趨勢。並以實際國際貿易中實務操作為案例，在解題過程中引導學生建立完整的關貿概念，增進學生對貿易實務與關務理論的理解與應用能力，培養學生的邏輯思考、並增進解題技巧，順利通過國家考試。
description.en: Purpose: To assist students to pass the relevant examinations of "International Trade", such as " National Special Examination for Customs Specialized personnel", " National Special Examination for Customs Officers", "International Trade Examination for IEAT" and other national examinations. Content: By introducing the practical applications to the students, which guiding students to get a full understanding of International Trade Practice System while solving the problems by using real cases. It reinforces students’ knowledge and understanding on the International Trade, and helps students to think logically and also increases their problem-solving skills that help students to pass the national examinations successfully.

name.en: Lecture: Increase capacity for career exploration

description.zh: 本校為強化學生的就業能力，加強學生的職場競爭力，開設「職涯進擊講座」之課程，藉由業界主管與人員分享面試技巧、溝通表達、職場自我行銷、生涯規劃及介紹不同種類的工作模式，如派遣、公職、舒活族、獵人頭公司、國外企業等，提升學生對於國內外職場的認識，並進一步提升學生的就業率與競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance student’s competitive ability in the workplace. The course contents include tips of interview, self-marketing in the workplace and the planning of the career life etc. By the topics, students will be equipped with a variety of presentation skills that needed in the workplace to raise the employment rate.

name.zh: 創業講座—創新者跟你想的不一樣
name.en: Entrepreneurship Lectures-  Innovators are different from what you think

description.zh: 隨著科技的發展與產值快速成長，網路、電商、商業新模式等各式創業大行其道，成為許多創業者的新選擇，本課程邀請國內知名創業楷模或創業成功典範之企業經理人分享創業成功之經驗。以真實具體的創業經驗為教材，讓學生更深刻體驗創業家之精神。希冀以觀摩學習典範企業的具體經驗，帶領學生學習企業創新與創業的思維，進而激發學生追求成就的渴望，強化青年學子對人生願景的規劃。
description.en: Along with the prosperous development of Internet, the output value of E-commerce is growing fast. Launching a business on the internet has become a new choice for many entrepreneurs. We invite the domestic business manager, as the model of outstanding and successful enterprise, to share his experiences of achievement with students. By offering the real and specific examples, business manager will make students learn further about the enterprisers' entrepreneurship. Through their experiences, we hope students can learn innovations and creations of enterprise; furthermore, students can be inspired to pursue their ambition to strengthen their wills to plan the future.

description.zh: 本課程目的為培養大學生未來創新創業時所需具備的基礎能力與知識。本課程將針對以下幾個面向來授課。1. 觀察聯想力；2. 創新思考；3. 發現問題與解決問題；4. 人際關係；5. 價值主張；6. 商業模式。
description.en: The aim of this course is to build up students’ abilities and fundamental knowledge of innovation and entrepreneurships. The following topics are introduced: 1. Observation and associating. 2. Creative thinking. 3. Questioning and problem solving. 4. Human relation. 5. Value proposition. 6. Business model.

name.zh: 企業智能化營運實務與應用
name.en: Enterprise Information and Intelligent Enterprise Applications

description.zh: 採混成教學，透過面授了解企業，從產業、行業到組織，及資訊系統應用實務。藉由數位課程學習企業內各職能作業流程及ERP系統功能。配合上機實作及老師案例引導，強化系統運用與企業流程整合。
description.en: By mixed teaching methods, help students to learn enterprises from their industries, organizations and information system applications; Use digital learning courses to introduce tasks of roles in business and ERP system functions. Besides, online practices will be provided. With case studies guided by our instructors, students might learn how to integrate the system with actual enterprise operating procedures.

notes: 經管大碩與產業接軌合開

description.zh: 本課程以“智能工業生產教學工廠”為學習場域，是一間無人的關燈工廠，這間智能工廠的建置完全與廠商實際生產需求結合，全球最大高階自行車變速器製造商美商速聯公司(SRAM)林孟輝總廠長擔任建廠諮詢顧問，整間工廠完全由北科大跨系所老師帶領學生自行建置，這是一間全國大學第一條由老師帶領學生團隊自行建置完成的智能化生產製造產線，產線包括加工區、精密量測區、線上品管區、組裝區、自動倉儲，從接受訂單到智能化排單、加工、量測、品管、組裝、倉儲，所有雲端伺服器與程式軟體完全由學生自行架設與撰寫，是一條完全無人化的關燈展示生產與教學工廠。上課方式是廠商針對智能工廠各個工作細節具體提出實務需求，再由上課老師帶學生助教以此些問題作為上課基礎，教導學生共同解決，學生以班級為單位進入工廠實作學習，課程由負責建置“智能工業生產教學工廠”的老師依其專長領域分工合作開課，依據老師負責建置的部分及其專長進行分工教學，學生分組由個別老師帶領指導，學生將可依序學到完整工廠技術，學期結束再由各專長老師依照學生分組指導學生進行專題報告，學生的專題報告將以個別老師專長協助解決的問題撰寫報告，這樣的設計可以讓學生深入了解與探討如何解決問題。
description.en: This course is based on the intelligent manufacturing system education factory which is an unmanned and turn off the light factory. The intelligent factory is completely built by ourselves and is the only one self-built factory in Taiwanese universities. Building the intelligent factory is cooperated with SRAM, a global bicycle parts manufacturer, and their director Jacky Lin is our technical consultant. The intelligent manufacturing system has seven areas, central server, reception, automatic warehouse, manufacturing, measuring, on-line quality control, and assembly. In process, we receive the raw materials and scanned by QR code scanner. After scanned, the raw materials are transported to the warehouse and wait for producing order. If the producing order received, the raw materials will be sent through all seven machines, where a finished component will be manufactured. One component from that batch will be sent to measuring area for complete quality control and the remaining compone

description.zh: 本課程以機械製造結合工業4.0技術為主，包括近代製造技術概論、E化製造、物聯網基本介紹、巨量資料於製程優化的應用、智慧型演算之原理與應用、機器視覺檢測應用、彈性製造系統、網宇實體系統、智能化工廠應用實例、應用APP撰寫等，增進學生對現代製造技術內容之理解、內化、與判斷應用能力，並加強工業4.0相關最新科技之介紹與應用，以期培養對應用聯網技術、大數據、雲端運算、及人工智慧於製造相關課題有技術與能力之工程師。
description.en: This course is based on integration of mechanical manufacturing and industry 4.0, which is made of the modern manufacturing, the computational manufacturing,the internet of things, the optimization of manufacturing using big data, the intelligent calculation, machine vision measurement, flexible manufacturing, CPS system, smart factory, APP, etc.. This course can improve student’s knowledge of modern manufacturing, judgment, and industry 4.0, which will further create engineers with networking technology, big data, cloud calculation, and artificial intelligence in manufacturing.

name.en: Introduction to network and information security

description.zh: 本課旨在研討網路與資訊安全概念與技術，內容包括：網路與資訊安全簡介、資訊中心管理與實體安全、使用者身份識別、作業系統安全、秘密、公開金鑰密碼系統、文件訊息驗證、網路通訊協定(TCP/IP)安全、電子商務安全、資料庫安全及系統安全等。
description.en: This course provides an introduction and practical survey of network and information security. This course including network and information security basic introduce, information management and entity security, identification mechanism, public-key encryption, digital signatures and authentication protocols, internet protocol (TCP / IP) security, e-commerce security database security, and system security.

description.zh: 本課程為財務會計領域之進階課程，針對已具初級會計學之學生深入講授財務會計之理論、觀念、方法及程序。本課程全面納入國際財務報導準則(IFRS)，內容包括：介紹財務報導觀念架構、主要財務報表編製、講解資產負債表中有關資產、負債、股東權益以及現金流量表與租賃會計等，修習本課程可使學生對IFRS有全面整體了解及運用之能力。亦有助於將來參加會計乙級、記帳士及公務人員高考等證照考試。
description.en: This course is an advanced course for financial accounting. It is to teach the financial accounting theory, concept, method and procedure for students with some basic accounting knowledge. The course covers all the materials to understand financial accounting based on IFRS. The course will help students for preparing advanced license examinations for accounting.

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在提供行動裝置的基本概論，並讓同學了解行動裝置的應用，課程內容包括: 行動裝置的工作原理、行動商務、生活應用、技術發展、通訊及資訊安全等。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basic concepts of mobile devices and equip students the ability to apply the mobile devices. The course includes the working principles of mobile devices, mobile commerce, life applications, technology development, communication and information security of mobile devices.

description.zh: 本課程主要闡述財務管理中最重要的投資決策、融資決策與短期資金管理決策之基本架構及企業經理人之財務決策，配合各項相關議題進行個案研討，結合資訊工具與軟體運用、以深入淺出方式介紹財務管理之基本觀念及理論架構，並搭配財務軟體、財金資料庫、與財金資訊網站的應用。藉由這些資訊工具與技術，將財務管理的觀念與原理加以運用於重要的融資與投資決策制定。本課程結合財務管理實務並融入財務決策研討，以培育理論與實務兼備之財務管理人才。
description.en: The course focus on the three most important decisions of the financial management: the investment decisions, the financing decisions and short-term capital management and financial decisions of corporate managers, and various related topics with case studies. This course combines information and software tools to use; the major goal of this course is to help students understanding the basic principles and theories of investments. By mixing explanation and implementation using financial software and database, it can give students the skills to conduct a sophisticated assessment on investment decisions. This course combines business management practices and financial strategies into the discussion, in order to foster both theory and practice of financial management personnel.

notes: 科研243教室 / 非資財二甲必修課，請勿選課

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹大數據技術在金融方面的應用，課程內容包括資料準備、大數據分法、金融決策介紹、大數據在金融的應用、金融資料介紹、金融大數據分法、金融大數據專題實作。
description.en: This course is to introduce the use of big data techniques on financial applications. The course will cover data preparation, big data methods, introduction to financial decision, big data applications on finance, financial data preparation, financial big data methods, project implementation on financial big data.

notes: 科研240教室 / 與碩士班合開

description.zh: 本課程中包含下列主題：1.簡介；2.電子商店的行銷策略；3.電子商店的建 置；4. 電子商店的經營與管理；5. 電子商店的法律問題；6.案例介紹；7.結論。
description.en: In the course, the following topics will be discussed：1.Overview of EC；2.The marketing strategies of EC；3.How to install an EC；4.The management of EC；5.The current problems of EC；6.Cases study；7.Conclusion.

description.zh: 本門課程是財務、電腦、與數學的結合，其主要目標為啟發學生如何設計電腦演算法來解決財務或經濟上的問題。一開始，此課程會複習一些基本的知識，如利率期間結構、選擇權評價理論、隨機過程模型、數值方法、與寫程式時所需的資料結構。之後，會講到一些新奇選擇權的演算法，包括亞洲式選擇權，障礙選擇權、回顧選擇權、重設選擇權、彩虹選擇權、可轉換公司債。
description.en: The major goal of this course is to provide students with complete understanding of many financial markets and products. Topics such as forward and futures, swaps, and options will be fully covered. In addition, the basic pricing methods of these innovative products will be emphasized in this course. Finally, even to a MBA student, the knowledge mentioned in this course is sure to be helpful for his (or her) future career.

notes: 科研243教室 / 與碩士班合開

description.zh: 本課程適合一般大專行銷管理之授課。其目的在尋求優良的產品行銷管理方法，以求企業之良好利潤。本課程授課內容在使學生瞭解行銷管理之觀念，產品設計、產品運銷、促銷及訂價。相關之授課內容包括：市場區隔、市場組織、購買行為、產品開發、零售、批發、促銷、廣告及訂價程序等。
description.en: The marketing course is suitable to college student. The purpose is to find good method of product marketing, in order to pursuit good profit of enterprise. The course contents' goal makes student understand the idea of marketing, product design, product transportation, promotion and price setting. The related course includes: market segmentation, market organization, the behavior of buying, product development, retailing, whole-saling promotion, advertising and price setting process.

description.zh: 本課程分為上下學期，介紹如何將金融操作方式，以明確演算法去定義、描述，進而用R語言、XQ、或MultiChart去模擬、執行。內容包括: 程式交易概論、交易策略研發、回測系統、資金管理。此外，本課程邀請創富創投團隊與嘉實資訊擔任業師課程指導。創富創投董事長 張智超 先生為國內知名冠軍操盤人，曾在富邦與國票證卷10年賺逾過20億。其團隊開授課程主題如下：基本面研究、產業面連結、交易面訓練、操盤面實戰。嘉實資訊為國內最大財金資訊軟體公司，其業師將帶領同學接觸XQ交易系統，撰寫XS語法。
description.en:
This course is divided into two semesters. It introduces how to use financial operations to define and describe clearly the algorithm, and then uses R language, XQ, or MultiChart to simulate and execute. Contents include: Introduction to program trading, trading strategy development, backtesting, and fund management.
. In additions, this course invites the Chuang Fu Venture Capital Team and  SysJust company to serve as a professional mentor. Mr. Zhang Zhichao, chairman of Chuangfu Venture Capital, is a well-known trader and has earned more than 2 billion NTD in Fubon and Waterland Securities in 10 years. The theme of the courses offered by the team is as follows: Fundamental research, industrial connection, trading surface training, practical trading, and actual operation of company funds. 
SysJust company is the largest financial information software company in Taiwan. Its industry lecturer will lead students to contact the XQ trading system and write XS grammar for financial tradin

notes: 科研243教室 / 資財四資財所與產業接軌合開

description.zh:
本次更利用業界常用之光學模擬軟體RSoft以及COMSOL進行光學元件與系統設計，主要探討近代光學之應用，如光通訊，光敏材料和奈米光學結構等主題進行設計與討論。
課程最後使用專題來檢驗學生學習成果，可探討題目有一維光子晶體：薄膜干涉、抗反射膜設計，二維/三維光子晶體，微結構之穿透反射頻譜、能隙分布（BandGap）計算，Meta-materials：微結構天線、光學抗反射結構（隱形斗篷），基礎波動光學：雙狹縫干涉、單狹縫繞射、散射（Rayleigh Scattering、Mie Scattering）等。
description.en:
The used tool for this class is RSoft and COMSOL, common-used optical simulation software in industries. 
Students should present their work through final project presentations to examine their learning outcomes. The topics for final project include one-dimensional photonic crystals: thin film interference, anti-reflection film design, 2D/3D photonic crystals, transmission spectrum of microstructure, Bandgap calculation , Meta-materials: Micro-structured antennas, optical anti-refl

notes: PBL, 光電四與光電所合開/計中電腦教室

description.zh: 各種冷煤壓縮機簡介，容積式壓縮機效率分析，離心式壓縮機分析，各種送風機簡介，送風機應用，泵之應用分析。
description.en: Introduction to refrigerant compressors, efficiency analysis of volumetric compressors, analysis of centrifugal compressors, introduction to fans, applications of fans, and application of pumps.

description.zh: 本課程探討企業管理之基本課題，除了作業面外，也包含管理策略面。
description.en: This course discusses the fundamental issues regarding the business management.  Both the operational and managerial levels are covered.

description.zh: 邀聘專家開設就業模擬課程模組，演繹各行業職人百態，以職場實例進行雙向互動，讓同學增進肢體及口語表達能力，並建立正確的工作態度和職場EQ。
description.en: Outstanding industrial professional is invited to organize the career simulation program, where scenarios are designed for students to tackle the issues that are possibly faced in the future career. Proper attitude and interpersonal skills at work and be built up through the diversity of themes and scenarios, such as team building, communication and collaboration, and leadership enhancing. The body language and the communicative skills of the students are also strengthened through the programs.

description.zh: 介紹多媒體各項基礎技術，包括文字、圖像、影像、動畫與音訊，以及各項技術的整合應用。
description.en: This course introduces the elements of multimedia design, including text, graphics, video, animation, and audio, as well as the applications of the integration of those elements.

description.zh: 本課程著重於中英文口頭報告能力之培養，在模擬發表過程中，培養學生使用正確的表達用法，並建立適當之應對方式。
description.en: This course offers opportunities for students to develop their oral presentation skills in both Chinese and English languages via simulated presentations in class. Students will learn how to present their papers precisely and how to engage a conversation properly.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在於介紹個體經濟學理論及其相關應用，課程內容涵蓋主題包括：消費者行為與決策、不確定性與資訊不對稱、外部性與公共財、廠商行為與決策、產業型態與市場結構、生產要素市場、賽局理論、一般均衡與經濟效率、以及其他個體經濟的相關議題。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the main methods of systematic economic reasoning. It provides a rigorous treatment of microeconomic theory and its applications. Topics covered in the course will include the theories of consumer behavior; the economics of uncertainty and information; the economics of the public sector; firm behavior and the organization of industry; the economics of labor markets; game theory; and selected topics in general equilibrium and welfare economics.

description.zh: 本課程以建築專業回應社會需求為依歸。針對台灣原住民部落之返鄉青年之居住與生產模式提出各項議題討論。藉由社區總體營造與民眾參與等方式，以一學期的進程發展新的部落建築形式與配置計畫，並在永續發展與保育並重的前提下，提出實質開發與營造施工的前期規劃。
description.en: his course introduces the theories, principles, and methods of designing and construction for local social issues in Taiwan. In this year, Focuses on the Settlements of aboriginal people, through cases studies and design practice, the courses seeks to expand the students understanding to the major components of site planning. The topics also focus on six premises:1.theories in relation to site planning;2.design sequences of site planning;3.investigations and analyses of the sites;4.planning and designing methods and their evaluations;5.environmental impact assessment and countermeasures.

notes: 建築三四與建都所日職合開

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh:
中文課程共分四年三階段授課。
第一年以華語教學為主，授課重點為：（一）華語基本句型句法；（二）華語基本會話；（三）生活語言；（四）標音系統。
第二、第三年，除延續第一年華語授課重點外，以段落朗讀和基本認字為主要訓練，並給與中國文字書寫訓練。
第四年，加強會話能力，認字與閱讀能力，並傳授中國文化。
description.en:
The course of Chinese is categorized as three individual stages for four years. 
In the first year, the course focuses on : (a) Basic Sentence Patterns, (b) Basic Conversation, (c) Languages in the Real Life and (d) the phonetic system for the Chinese language.
In the second and the third year, the training focuses on paragraph reading and term/character recognition-in addition to the teaching themes set in the first year. Writing courses are also added during this stage. 
In the fourth year, we add more emphasis on the conversational ability, term/character recognition and reading ability. More culture-related information will be included.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是為了：1.驗證物理理論之真實性，2.培養同學認真的科學態度與方法，3.培養同學數據處理的能力，4.啟發同學自行設計解決量度問題的方法。課程之施行分為上下兩學期，每一學期為一學分三小時。上學期的內容偏重力學、波動、熱力、流力之實驗，下學期的內容則偏重電磁、光學、近物之實驗。
description.en: In this course there will be 1 credit for each of two semesters, and 3 laboraborial hours per week. The first semester experiments involve mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, and waves, etc.. The second semester experiments contains electromagnetics, optics, and modern physics, etc.. The purposes of this course are 1: to identify the physical laws, 2:to cultivate the ability of data reduction of students, 4: to instruct the students solving the problems of measurements of measurements by self-designments.

description.zh: 本科目所探討的內容包括: 1. 集合與命題, 2. 計數、排列與組合, 3. 關聯與函式, 4. 基礎圖論,  5.樹狀結構, 6. 有限狀態機, 7. 演算法分析介紹, 8.生程函數, 9. 遞迴式10.群, 11. 布林幾何。
description.en: Covered topics include: (1) Sets and Propositions, (2) Counting, Permutations, and Combinations, (3) Relations and Functions, (4) Graphs, (5) Trees, (6) Finite State Machines, (7) Analysis of Algorithms, (8) Generating Functions, (9) Recurrence Relations, (10) Groups, and (11) Boolean Algebras.

name.zh: 影視音產業實務與技術應用
name.en: Introduction to Practices and Technology Applications in TV, Broadcast, and Popular Music Industries

description.zh: 本課程介紹影視、廣播、與流行音樂產業之實務相關技術，著重於基本概念的應用。課程採用「問題導向學習」(Problem-based Learning, PBL)模式，除理論介紹外，亦藉由資料整理、分組討論、實地參訪、實作練習、與成果觀摩及報告等方式，激發學生之創造與創新能力。
description.en: This course introduces students to the practices and technology applications in TV, broadcast, and popular music industries. The content of this course is designed with the Problem-Based Learning (PBL) method. In addition to the theoretical study, students are guided to survey the related references, discuss by group, visit the companies cooperated with Taipei Tech, conduct the practice projects on the issues defined by the cooperated companies, and report their practice results, so that the capability of creativity and innovation can be developed or enhanced.

description.zh: 為了鼓勵以及幫助學生用技術或者商業模式，聯合學校老師或是跨校同學，用商業的手段共同解決社會或者商業問題，本課程將以衝刺班的形式，邀請有創業經驗的老師、業師，透過工作坊的形式，幫助學生逐週的推進創業進度以及創業競賽演練，目標是幫助學生落實創業想法，應用在社會中並且帶來改變。
description.en: To encourage and help students using new technologies or new business models to solve problems in the society and the business world, this intense, pre-accelerator, 18-week course invites different professors and mentors with entrepreneurship experiences to help students develop their start-up ideas through workshops and startup competitions. The goal of this course is to help students realize their ideas and create actionable business solutions that can change the society.

description.zh:
本課程透過判決案例的研討瞭解勞資爭議處理與經營管理實務?幫助修課同學提早瞭解職場狀況?企業內人事管理運作實務，以及熟悉勞動法規、函釋判決等實務資料的查索、分析、運用技巧，以期作好就業生活準備，縮小學用落差。
全部課程18小時的授課，將分6主題(每主題3小時)邀集人資工作業界講師與開課老師共同進行研討。
description.en: This course, through discussing cases of trial verdict to understand labor disputes and the practice of management, can help students in advance realize the career conditions, human resource management within industries, and being familiar with labor laws, as well as inquiry, analysis, and application of judgement of interpretation letters. It is expected to well prepare for work career, and reduce gap between learning and application. The course has 18 hours and will be divided into 6 topics (each for 3 hours), by inviting human resource lecturers in industries to discuss with the instructor.

name.zh: 中高齡人口社會休閒分析

description.zh: 該課程特點在於提高學生走出教室，以社會學概念觀察並分析社會現象。同時也包含課堂討論以及觀察報告，建立社會學知識與社會生活的連結。培養學生社會學想像的能力，以文字、圖片或影像紀錄方式，從休閒活動的探討巨觀結構以及微觀社會互動的連結。
description.en: This course emphasizes learning from outside of classroom, applying sociological concepts to observe and analyze social phenomena. It also includes class discussions and presentation of observations in order to build the link between sociological knowledge and social life. It cultivates students’ ability of sociological imagination, and allows students to investigate the association between macro structure and micro social interaction by the way of recording scripts, photographs, and videos.

description.zh: 本講座旨在促進學生對「社會設計」的認識，主題分為樂齡福祉、居住正義與文化創意三個方面，透過案例介紹進而掌握台灣和國際間社會設計的發展動態，從而更深刻地理解為社會而設計的意涵並思考可能的樣貌。
description.en: The course is aimed to promote students’ understanding of “social design.” A series of case studies including elderly welfare, housing justice, and cultural creativity will be introduced by lectures, which may make students further realize the meaning of “designing for society” and its possible development in Taiwan.

description.zh: 本講課程結合攝影、城市導覽、社會學講座與策展的多元方式來進行，旨在結合理論與攝影創作來推動多元文化、開啟學生攝影思考與創作的社會性思考、並促進大眾對台灣的東南亞族群與文化的認識。
description.en: This course combines photography, city tour, sociology lectures and curating to promote multiculturalism in Taiwan. Besides, how to employ the sociological thinking in photography will be explored by this innovative teaching method and further understanding on ethnic groups of Southeast Asia in Taiwan will be brought forward as well.

name.en: Living A Beautiful Life with Music

description.zh: 本課程旨在提供已有器樂或聲樂基礎的學生，透過同儕間的互相學習與實作，發掘音樂演奏的樂趣。在授課教師指導下，同學將進行室內樂分組，探討不同作曲家和各種曲風，並學習如何詮釋樂曲，增進演奏技能。期末將在校內和公益機構舉辦成果發表會，將音樂的美妙與幸福帶給周遭的人。
description.en: This course opens to students who already know the basics of instrumental or vocal playing. Through ensemble practices with classmates and group lessons, students will discover the fun of music-making. Under the teacher’s guidance, students are grouped to form ensembles, explore various composers and musical styles, learn about music interpretation, and improve their own performance skills. At the end of the semester, there will be presentation concerts at school and non-profit organization, bringing the beauty and happiness of music to people around us.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:探索自我，接軌國際
name.en: Feast for the global perspective - Explore yourself & Integrate with the WorldFeast for the global p

description.zh: 本課程藉由邀請校內外之社會、政治、經濟、文化等專家學者與莘莘學子們進行相互交流，透過「全球議題」、「文化學習」等主題之進階探討，培養學生世界公民之意識，提升學生跨文化溝通能力、適應全球化生活與國際競爭力。
description.en: We invite the domestic speakers, as the outstanding scholars of cross-cultural communication, to share their knowledge and experiences with students. By exploring the global issues such as social, cultural, political or economic studies, the course makes students learn further about the world, and inspires students to strengthen their independent thinking and global perspective.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:印尼文化與語言
name.en: Development of global perspective:Indonesian culture and language

description.zh: 為了迎接全球化的亞洲國家與東南亞國家之間的經濟發展,藉由傳授印尼語言,讓學生掌握印尼語同時也了解印尼文化作為兩國的經濟橋樑，以此來協助學生前往印尼就業。本課程是培養學生的溝通能力，以運用印尼語來跟印尼母語者打招呼、建立人際關係、購物、敘述事物…等。
description.en: In order to embrace economic development of globalization, especially in Asian and Southeast Asian countries, there is a need to teach Indonesian (Bahasa Indonesia) and equip students not only with the language but also to understand the culture as an economic bridge between the two countries. And, it is hoped that assisting students in employment in Indonesia. This course will aim to help students to develop communication skills by utilizing Indonesian language to speak to native speakers in terms of greeting, business contact establishment, interpersonal communication, and descriptive usage…etc.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:馬來文化與語言
name.en: Emerging Market Series: Getting to know Malaysia

description.zh: 課程藉由傳授馬來西亞語言以協助學生拓展東南亞的就業版圖，旨在培養學生的馬來西亞語基本溝通能力，運用馬來語與當地母語者打招呼、了解馬來文化、建立人際關係、購物、敘述事物等，以此來協助學生前往馬來西亞就業，作為兩國的經濟橋樑。
description.en: In order to embrace economic development of globalization, especially in Asian and Southeast Asian countries, there is a need to introduce and equip our students not only with the basic local language but also to understand the local culture so as to strengthen the economic tie between Taiwan and the Asian countries and to enhance the employment opportunities of our students in these Asian countries. This course aims to help students to understand and develop basic communication skills by utilizing Bahasa Malaysia (Malaysian language) to communicate with Malaysian in terms of greeting, business contact establishment, interpersonal communication, etc. Historical and geographical backgrounds of Malaysia and their local cultures will also be introduced.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:泰國文化與語言(一)
name.en: Development of global perspective: Thai culture and language I

description.zh: 1. 在臺灣與東南亞交流日益增加的情況下，東南亞語言的學習需求也會隨之提高。而「泰國」所擁有的社會經濟條件優勢，以及泰國政府有意推動的文化創意產業，相信也將為臺灣帶來一陣「泰語學習風潮」。 2. 課程以培養基礎泰語溝通能力、激發學習泰語興趣，以及跨文化理解為宗旨。課程架構包括泰國語言教學及元化議題討論，使其在具備泰語溝通基本實力之外，更能對泰國各方面情勢與文化、思想、禮節、風俗習慣、宗教禁忌等，都具有深度認識。 3. 泰語教學方面，秉持聽、說、讀、寫同時並進的教學理念，由字母的發音、寫法、唸法、聲調、順序及拼字系統的學習開始，奠定良好的泰語基礎，搭配最常用的單字、句型、文法與日常實用會話，使學生可以拼寫、閱讀泰文短文，並能以泰語進行日常對話。 4. 泰國文化方面，以專題的方式，講述政治、經濟、社會、地理、歷史與文化等各個層面的泰國，呈現出不同於一般刻板印象中的泰國，培養學生對泰國的正確認識及態度。本學期先針對泰國目前的經濟與文化面進行概說；下學期則探討泰國歷史、地理、政治與社會。
description.en: 1. With the interaction between Taiwan and Southeast Asia getting more and more frequent, the need for learning Southeast Asian languages has been highly increasing. Thailand owns the advantages of social economy; moreover, Thailand government intends to promote cultural creativity industries. Hence, learning Thai definitely becomes a new trend in Taiwan. 2. This course aims to help students build the foundation of speaking basic Thai, and arouse students’ interests in learning Thai. Also, it helps students get to know cross-cultural differences. In addition to learning Thai, students have to discuss the issues related to Thai culture. Accordingly, students are not only able to make conversations, but have further understanding of Thai culture, thinking, manners, customs and religious taboos etc. 3. In terms of learning Thai, listening, speaking, reading and writing, these four skills are equally important. Student will be trained to learn all these four skills together. At first, s

name.zh: 國際觀培養:越南文化與語言
name.en: Development of global perspective: Vietnam culture and language I

description.zh: 在全球金融海嘯後，已開發國家經濟成長趨緩，新興亞洲國家-東協國家經濟成長迅速，本課程將以越南語教學為主，越南經貿、觀光文化及越語字母拼音教學，讓學生在學習越語的同時，深入了解越南文化，協助學生拓展東南亞的就業版圖。
description.en: This series of courses aim to provide students with opportunities to understand emerging markets in a global context. Global economy in the post-recession world relies heavily on emerging economies, in particular countries in Southeast Asia known as ASEAN. Seeing the greater potential for economic gains and development, we build up the courses from introducing the fundamentals, including but not limited to, their economy, culture, tourism and people with special emphasis on the use of the language for communication along with its relevance to Taiwan as a trading partner.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:日語與文化(一)

description.zh: 本課程提供學生養成基本日語聽說讀寫技能，並能夠面對在各種情境下，表達出適當的日語，足以應付日常生活簡單狀況。此外，並運用多媒體等工具，介紹日本文化，歷史，人文等多種面向，讓學生能更多元地了解日本，有效提升學習興趣及效率。
description.en: This course provides a comprehensive approach to developing the four basic language skills (listening, speaking, reading, and writing) in order to cultivate your overall Japanese language ability to a level sufficient for various occasions and everyday life.In addition , using multimedia to introduce a variety of Japanese culture, history , and humanities. The students can learn more about Japan in many different perspectives, and effectively enhance interest in the learning process.

name.en: Development of global perspective: Korean I

description.zh: 本課程將教導學生韓文字母結構、發音方法及基礎詞彙、文法與句型、韓國現況及文化等，透過文化與語言的習得，培養學生與韓籍人士溝通或在韓國生活所需要的最基本的溝通能力。
description.en: This course aims to introduce beginners to basic spoken and written skills in Korean. Students will develop basic skills with a focus on effective communication and enjoyment through listening, speaking, reading and writing. By the end of the course, students will be able to hold a simple conversation in Korean, comprehend basic Korean texts and write about their everyday lives.

name.en: Feast for the global perspective: German Ⅰ

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎德語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic German abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the German language.

name.en: Feast for the global perspective: French Ⅰ

description.zh: 本課程為基礎法文, 主要是幫助學生學習從字彙, 文法, 到日常會話的法文能力。
description.en: This class introduces basic French vocabulary, grammar, and conversation to the students.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:泰國文化與語言(一)
name.en: Development of global perspective: Thai culture and language I

description.zh: 1. 在臺灣與東南亞交流日益增加的情況下，東南亞語言的學習需求也會隨之提高。而「泰國」所擁有的社會經濟條件優勢，以及泰國政府有意推動的文化創意產業，相信也將為臺灣帶來一陣「泰語學習風潮」。 2. 課程以培養基礎泰語溝通能力、激發學習泰語興趣，以及跨文化理解為宗旨。課程架構包括泰國語言教學及元化議題討論，使其在具備泰語溝通基本實力之外，更能對泰國各方面情勢與文化、思想、禮節、風俗習慣、宗教禁忌等，都具有深度認識。 3. 泰語教學方面，秉持聽、說、讀、寫同時並進的教學理念，由字母的發音、寫法、唸法、聲調、順序及拼字系統的學習開始，奠定良好的泰語基礎，搭配最常用的單字、句型、文法與日常實用會話，使學生可以拼寫、閱讀泰文短文，並能以泰語進行日常對話。 4. 泰國文化方面，以專題的方式，講述政治、經濟、社會、地理、歷史與文化等各個層面的泰國，呈現出不同於一般刻板印象中的泰國，培養學生對泰國的正確認識及態度。本學期先針對泰國目前的經濟與文化面進行概說；下學期則探討泰國歷史、地理、政治與社會。
description.en: 1. With the interaction between Taiwan and Southeast Asia getting more and more frequent, the need for learning Southeast Asian languages has been highly increasing. Thailand owns the advantages of social economy; moreover, Thailand government intends to promote cultural creativity industries. Hence, learning Thai definitely becomes a new trend in Taiwan. 2. This course aims to help students build the foundation of speaking basic Thai, and arouse students’ interests in learning Thai. Also, it helps students get to know cross-cultural differences. In addition to learning Thai, students have to discuss the issues related to Thai culture. Accordingly, students are not only able to make conversations, but have further understanding of Thai culture, thinking, manners, customs and religious taboos etc. 3. In terms of learning Thai, listening, speaking, reading and writing, these four skills are equally important. Student will be trained to learn all these four skills together. At first, s

name.en: Feast for the global perspective: German Ⅰ

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎德語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic German abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the German language.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:基礎西班牙語1(A1上)

description.zh: 本課程專為初學西班牙文之學生設計，毋需任何西班牙文基礎。本課程著重在學習西班牙文發音及了解基礎文法架構。課程結束前，學生將可以閱讀基本的西班牙文文句、自我介紹及西班牙文的基礎對話。
description.en: This is course is designed for first time students of Spanish. No previous knowledge is required to enroll this course. The focus of this course is to provide a basic knowledge of the pronunciation and grammatical structures of Spanish at the beginner level. By the end of this course, the student will be able to read basic texts in Spanish, self-introduce himself and start a basic conversation.

description.zh:
本課程以講授營建工程之污染公害為主,使學生經由該課目的學習以了解其防治方法與原理,此課程內容包括:
1.諸論                 2.營建施工的種類及其污染形式
3.營建管理的相關法規   4.噪音防治
5.逸散性粒狀物防治     6.廢土及廢棄物污染防治
7.施工作業的環境測定   8.施工現場的環境管理與環境評核.
description.en: To promote the knowledge of principle for students,the course,Prevention of Public Disaster for Activities,focuses on pollution cintrol in construction area.Contents of the course include:Sources and classification of pollution.Management regulations . Fugitive dust,Soil waste,Measurement of pollutants and Safety management.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為訓練有志於教學服務的學生，提供參與教學協助之服務實習環境，學習運用自身系所專業知能與訓練溝通表達解說能力，輔助教師教學進行，體驗學習到熟稔課程基本理論、課程教材教具準備及歸位、課堂協助教學活動或演示操作教具、帶領討論、課後協助進行課業輔導、解說試題、學習如何批改作業報告、協助監督測驗等實際行動，透過教學相長過程，增加協助教學實務經驗。
description.en: This course is designed for students who are interested in teaching. It provides opportunities to the students to put their academic training in a practical teaching environment. They will participate in various aspects of teaching, e.g. assisting the teacher in the classroom. They will be allowed opportunities to foster their communication skills and the ability to express and explain themselves in order to facilitate class discussion. They will be able to familiarize themselves with the principal theory of the course, preparation of course materials, teaching aids, demonstration of the teaching aids and materials and leading the class discussion. They will also participate in the after class assistance, e.g. academic counseling, reviewing and explaining questions with the students. They will also learn how to mark or grade reports, have the practical experience in supervising tests. The overall goal is to increase and enhance student’s teaching ability through the practical teaching

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 北醫大/博雅選修文史/教師曾齡儀/2201教室

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 北醫大/博雅選修自然/教師許政成/遠距教學

name.zh: 看見女科技人與生涯規劃

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生可以利用暑期或其它時間至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習總累計時數不得低於320小時。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占50%，輔導老師占50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to elevate an all-round ability for the students at NTUT. During the summer break　or other periods of time, students are required to go to government-based organizations or industry/business-oriented agencies with respect to promoting practice of ability. The course takers will need to stay in the same individual organization or agency with an accumulated amount of time of no less than 320 hours. After the students complete the requirements in question, these organizations and agencies will offer them certificates -- or proof of any kind -- in accordance with the real performance on site. The grading principle will be equivalently decided by the thesis advisor (50%) and the on-site organization or agency (50%), respectively. The individual department or graduate institute may make proper adjustments according to the situations in need.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生可以利用暑期或其它時間至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習總累計時數不得低於320小時。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占50%，輔導老師占50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：History

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

notes: 北大/博雅選修文史/教師陳淑惠/社203教室

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：History

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

notes: 北大/博雅選修文史/教師洪健榮/文2F08教室

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用暑假至機械相關機構實習（實習實際天數依「校外實習」實行辦法另訂之），參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Participation in one of the corporative mechanical engineering company during summer vocation, practice and learn the real operation of the mechanical engineering related fields . A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

notes: 機械系  四二上選修

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Philosophy

description.zh: 哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth.  The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us.  These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions. These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions.  Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

notes: 海大/博雅選修文史.自然/教師胡雲鳳/人社院BOH403教室

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Philosophy

description.zh: 哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。

The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us. Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

description.zh: 哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth.  The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us.  These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions.  Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

notes: 海大/博雅選修法治/教師郭慧貞/人社院BOH601教室

Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

notes: 海大/B班/博雅選修社哲.法治/教師周維萱/人社BOH401教

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Philosophy

description.zh: 哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth.  The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us.  These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions.  Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.
